After about 5 minutes of torture, Kiba decided to take a break, pulling his foot out of Naruto’s mouth, and after leaving it hanging so that it could be dried, he got up, turning to see how his victim was, hoping to see him fully exhausted. However, although the Uzumaki boy had been weakened by the unexpected counterattack of his rival, he was not yet defeated.

“You’ll pay for this, Kiba! You must be crazy if you think you can beat me with a strike!” Naruto exclaimed as he tried to get off the ground.

Kiba on his part was not impressed, but Uzumaki words encouraged him to continue the match, so before the boy could move, he sat on Naruto’s chest, pulled out some wire from his ninja pouch using it to tie his hands tightly; And once Naruto’s arms were stuck on the floor; Kiba lifted his left foot off the ground and tried to stick his toes in the boy's mouth, but without success. Naruto, as his last defense, had closed his mouth, Kiba’s toes stroke several times against the lips to force them open, but it was useless, Naruto held them firmly while with his eyes gave a defiant look at the dog boy, like saying: “Just wait for me to recover my strength and you’ll see.”

“So, you want to play smart boy? Well, let's see if you keep your big mouth shut after this!” Kiba said as he brought his feet to Naruto’s face, landing his sticky arches over the boy’s nose. "As you can see, or rather smell, dear friend, you are not the only one who has been trained here, I have been running between missions like crazy and to save time, I slept without taking off my sandals, so you will have an idea of how my feet smell.” Continued Kiba, scrubbing his smelly soles in Naruto’s face, filling it with sweat and grime. “I'm dying to see if you can seriously fight my own stench, you fool” Kiba thought as he curved his feet until the soles formed a tunnel and the arches hold over Naruto’s nose.

After the first whiff of Kiba’s big feet in his nose, Naruto wanted to shout out of disgust, but he managed to restrain himself in time, knowing that the Inuzuka boy observed him carefully, waiting patiently for the first slip he had to put their huge toes back inside his mouth. "This is disgusting, but I can handle it, as long as there is fresh air between Kiba’s feet, I will not have to worry," Naruto thought as he slowed his breathing, so that he could recover completely. Unfortunately, Kiba did not miss his efforts, feeling with his butt as Uzumaki's chest was going up and down slower, so seeing that his technique was not working so well, he said:

“Time for level two, Naruto”. And after that, the dog boy began to squeeze his big feet together, narrowing the tunnel and cutting off the fresh air flow, replacing it with a rotten smell that intensified once Kiba’s huge soles stuck together, smothering Naruto’s nose among its sweaty surface. "And now I have him trapped, no one can tolerate this stench for long”. He thought with an evil smirk, Naruto, who already had his face green with disgust, tried to endure, but he reached a point where the unpleasant smell and perspiration of Kiba’s massive soles began to make him dizzy and before he turned purple, he decided to open his mouth and take a breath of fresh air, Kiba, seeing this, took advantage of his opponent's slip, removing his left foot from Naruto's nose and shoved all of its toes into his mouth.

“Big mistake pal, one more minute and I would have left you alone.” Kiba said mockingly as he wiggled his toes inside Naruto’s mouth. “But now that I have you right under my foot, I've decided you need a deeper lesson” Kiba went on talking, and when he said the word “deeper” he began pushing his foot even further into Naruto’s mouth, excited to see the Uzumaki boy's reaction.

Naruto was in trouble again, he could not close his mouth in time to prevent the dog boy from teased him again with his foot and now he had to endure the humiliation of feeling the huge foot penetrating deeper into his mouth, squeezing his tongue and again limiting him fresh air.

“This is because you closed your big mouth before, I hope you are enjoying, Naruto”, said Kiba with excitement to see how his enemy was being dominated with only one of his feet, and encouraged by it, continued to push his foot slowly through the mouth, without stopping until his toes reached the boy’s throat. “Let's see if you can handle this as well.” he continued with a wide grin and began twisting his toes.

Naruto on his side was desperate, feeling like Kiba’s huge toes were brushing through his throat, limiting the air, as his toenails were getting closer and closer to his skin and even, suddenly, like the whole foot was trying to get even deeper into his throat, “Now I'll see if this foot can go further than the other, no problem, right buddy?” Kiba said as he tried to squeeze his big heel completely into Naruto’s mouth, but he could not get more than half of it, and after several attempts, the dog boy said naughtily:

“Apparently this needs a little thrust, or better yet, several thrusts, what do you think?” And after removing his foot from Naruto’s mouth, he shoves it back inside, this time quickly, until his big toes hit the back of the boy’s throat, from there the dog boy had a good time by pulling out and squeezing his foot Inside Naruto’s mouth applying more and more pressure and increasingly hurting his lips with the strength of the big heel, his mouth with the grip of the whole foot and the back of his throat with all the huge toes and even with the toenails, which were scratching the throat with each push, and so, Kiba did not stop torturing Naruto this way until the large heel came full into his mouth and the huge toes were tightening the inside of his throat, only in that moment and after seeing that the Naruto was turning purple, Kiba decided to finally remove his foot and give him a break.

"So I signed it because I love her, and I truly believed we were at least friends, but it turns out it was a slavery contract that would allow her to seal my chakra if I disobeyed her. Then she turned me into her dog...HER DOG! I had to lick her feet, and dog biscuits, eat dog food..." Naruto was freely crying at this point and Sakura's mother was very disappointed in her daughter.

"Shh, it's ok Naruto. I'm sorry Sakura did that to you, but I'll fix it." Haori said with a kind smile.

"Thank you so much Haruno-san." Naruto sniveled. Kaori was disgusted with her daughter that she could push this poor boy to such a state. From a very young age, Naruto decided to stop crying, and Kaori hadn't seen a single tear in his eye since he was a 5 year old.

"Now...let's see where Sakura put that nasty contract so I can destroy it... Oh, you can use chakra right? Why don't you break out of that cage? Sakura most likely attached it to the same key chain as her house keys, and she's at the hospital right now working."

Naruto nodded and broke out of the cage with a rasengan.

"Found it!" Kaori said with a bright smile. She carefully started reading through the contract and let out an impressed whistle.

"Wow... my daughter didn't leave a single opening for you to escape." Kaori continued reading and was happy to find that nothing would happen to Naruto if the contract was destroyed.

"Ok, let's get rid of this." Kaori pressed a finger to the contract and it suddenly erupted in a burst of flames. In a matter of seconds that terrible contract was no more.

Kaori smiled kindly at Naruto. "Ok, you're free to go Naruto. Why don't you go home and get some sleep in your bed?"

Naruto nodded. "I will. Thank you for saving my life Haruno-san, I'll make this up to you."

"No no," Kaori grinned. "My little girl would most likely be dead by now if it weren't for your intervention, consider thi part of my repayment to you. Now shoo shoo. I don't want you to be here when Sakura gets back. And I hate to say this, because I would be overjoyed if Sakura started dating you, but you might want to be careful around her. You may love her, but she's proven that she doesn't deserve you trust. You might want to even start getting over her and moving on."

Naruto nodded sadly and leapt out the window to go home.
121221211221111.title: Sakura's Mom Frees Naruto from Slavery

1212212112211111.title: Follow Naruto- does he make it home ok?

She goes to Ino's house
1212212112211112.content:
It had been an extremely long day at the hospital, and everything that could go wrong seemed to go wrong. Sakura lost a total of four patients today...four. She had never lost more than one patient in a shift before today. Really the only thing that kept her going through the day was the knowledge that she had a new Naruto slave dog to play with when she got home.

She walked into her house and tiredly called,

"I'm home mom." She went to walk into her room where Naruto would still be in his cage waiting for him to let her out, but her mom's angry voice stopped her.

"Stop right there missy, we need to have a talk."

"Not now Mom, I've had a terrible day, I just want to go to my room."

"Yes now Sakura-chan. I had an interesting morning today when I entered your room."

Sakura froze. She locked her door, how did her mom get in her room...

"I discovered Naruto locked in a cage..."

"He's my slave now mom, he signed a contract with me to become my slave." Sakura said tiredly.

"So he told me. He told me everything you did to him." Kaori seethed angrily. "And you abused his trust to trick him into signing the contract."

"How did..." Sakura gasped.

"He told me everything Sakura-chan. Everything."

Sakura couldn't believe that Naruto actually told her mom! What the hell was wrong with him?

"I can't believe you would do that to anyone, much less that poor boy Sakura! I know I raised you much better than that."

"He had it coming." Sakura defended causing her mother to snort.

"You sound just like the rest of the villagers. He had it coming? He's protected you since you became his teammate and he's had it coming? You know of the burden he carries, the sacrifice he's made to protect the entire village and he had it coming?"

"I..he's a little perv! And he can be so annoying sometimes!"

"Sakura I saw Naruto cry today. He hasn't cried since he was a five year old boy despite the crappy childhood he's had."

Sakura frowned. She knew she wasn't going to win this argument.

"And treating him like a dog? Humans aren't meant to eat dog food or dog biscuits!"

"Fine." Sakura sighed. "I'll only give him people food from now on, happy?"

"You won't be doing anything to him from now on, I found and destroyed your contract so that poor boy could be free."

"YOU WHAT?" Sakura screamed. "YOU HAD NO RIGHT TO DO THAT! HE WAS MY PROPERTY!"

"YOU HAD NO RIGHT TO DO THAT TO HIM!' Kaori screamed back. "AS HIS TEAMMATE YOU SHOULD REALIZE THAT POOR BOY HAS BEEN THROUGH ENOUGH ALREADY!"

Sakura was so angry, she ran up into her room hoping this was all some kind of sick joke. She had been depending on her new slave to help her make it through the day. Tears pooled in her eyes when she saw the remains of the cage she had left Naruto in.

How dare her mom do this to her... Sakura grabbed one of the backpacks she kept in case she had to leave quickly on a long-term mission and ran downstairs where she flashed her mother a hate-filled glare.

"I hate you." Sakura spat out.

"Where do you think you're going young lady?" Kaori asked in a dangerous tone.

"I'm not living here anymore, I'm going to live with someone else." Sakura ran out the door before her mother could protest further.

She sighed as she looked back at her house. After today, she really didn't need to deal with this. With tears streaming down her eyes she ran towards the one place she knew she was always welcome.
1212212112211112.title: Sakura is Having a Really Bad Day

choices: Naruto trusts Sakura again
Naruto can't trust Sakura again, he can't chance being trapped by her
12122121122111121.content:
Naruto awoke to the sound of knocking on his door. He really didn't feel like getting out of his comfy bed so he rolled over and closed his eyes. Whoever it was could come back in the morning. Naruto groaned as the knock became louder and more frantic.

"God damnit..." Naruto mumbled. He got out of bed and threw on a tank top and walked to his door. He opened the door opening his mouth to tell whoever the inconsiderate jackass who was interrupting his sleep to come back in the morning. However his words caught in his mouth and his eyes widened in surprise at the sight of who was on his doorstep.

"Hi..." Sakura said quietly.

Naruto's surprise quickly turned into anger and distrust.

"No." Naruto said coldly before slamming the door shut in his face.

"I didn't even ask you anything..." Sakura's surprised voice noted from the other side of his now closed door.

"You don't need to. My answer is no to any question you ask."

"What? But Naruto..." A cold fear seeped through Sakura's body. She could always count on Naruto, no matter what was happening he was always there for her when she needed him...

"I should thank you Sakura, you taught me a very important lesson yesterday." Sakura still couldn't get over how cold Naruto's voice.

"Oh? And what did I teach you?" Sakura asked quietly. She wasn't sure she wanted to hear the answer. Not today, not after everything that had happened.

"I learned yesterday that my heart is foolish, and more importantly that I shouldn't trust anyone. Being a jinchuriki, it's a lesson I should've already known, but I stupidly allowed myself to think I could actually have friends... as if." Naruto snorted.

"Naruto I need you right now...please...today has been so awful." Sakura begged. "I lost four patients today....four. The only thing that kept me going was the knowledge that I had you to play with when I got home... then I came home, got in an argument with my mom and moved out. Please Naruto...I need you right now..."

Naruto's heart clenched. He was extremely pissed at Sakura for what she did to him...but he still cared about her, and he knew how hard she took it whenever she lost a patient...he couldn't imagine how hard she would take losing four in one shift. He opened his door when Kaori's warning rang through his mind. Sakura had proved that she no longer deserved his trust.

This could all be another scheme of hers to lure her into a trap. He saw her tired and depressed light up as he opened the door. She genuinely looked terrible and and her eyes were red and puffy. But she also genuinely looked like she wanted to go on a date with him.
12122121122111121.title: Does Naruto Trust Sakura?

choices: Naruto relents and is Sakura's dog one last night
"Are you fucking kidding me Sakura???"
121221211221111211.content:
Naruto sighed. He was so damn pathetic.

"I'm not signing anything." Naruto turned and walked back into his house, leaving the door open. Sakura cautiously took a step inside. When he didn't yell at her to leave she walked inside and followed him into her living room.

"You can stay out here. There's a blanket on the couch. I'll be in my room, please don't bother me because I slept terrible last night." Naruto all but growled. He started to walk back into his bedroom.

"That's it? I tell you I just had the worst day of my life and that's it?"

Naruto turned on his heel angrily. "You had a bad day? YOU HAD A BAD DAY?" Naruto roared. "Here Sakura, I'll help. You work at a hospital, people are going to die, it comes with the territory. It sucks you lost four people, but they were probably screwed no matter what you did, so it's not your fault."

"But I should..."

"Let me tell you what an actual bad day is. A truly bad day is when you find out the woman you love, the woman you've all but dedicated your life to shows you that she doesn't even care about you. A truly bad day is when the girl of your dreams tricks you and strips you of your freedom, your hopes, and your dreams. Truly bad day is when that same girl you have protected your entire damn life treats you like some sort of god damn dog. That's a truly bad day Sakura. So stop your whining, shut the hell up and go to sleep." Naruto hadn't meant to be that harsh, but he was angry. Angry at Sakura for what she did to him, but more angry at himself for letting her use him again.

Tears leaked freely from Sakura's eyes. "Naruto...I..."

"Save it." Naruto cut Sakura off before she could say anything, "Tomorrow I'm going to request I get moved to to be removed from Team 7. I would greatly prefer if you used tomorrow to find someplace else to live. There's no way I'm letting you stay here permanently."

"I thought you loved me..." Sakura whispered.

"I do." Naruto replied. "But as I told you earlier, my heart is an idiot. Tomorrow I'm going to ask Tsunade to give me some sort of role that I won't have to have any teammates for. I'm a jinchuriki, it was foolish of me to think people could look beyond the Kyubi. I know better now and I will not give anyone an opportunity to betray me again."

"No!" Sakura protested. "Come on... it wasn't that bad! A small part of you liked being my dog."

Naruto clenched his fist in anger...because it was true and he hated himself for it. He hated that the knowledge he was making Sakura happy was enough for him to allow a small part of him to enjoy being treated like some sort of toy for her.

"Whatever. I'm going to bed."

"So that's it? I'm never going to see you again after tonight?"

"That would be ideal."

"Then...would you please be my little doggy for me one final time? I know it's part of my job, but...it hurts s badly, and the knowledge that I was going to have you to play with when I got home... that's what got me through the day Naruto. So please...just do this for me one last time..."
121221211221111211.title: This is the Last Time

choices: Tsunade
Other
1212212112211112111.content:
Naruto looked at Sakura… She was crying and she was too cute when she cries, Naruto couldn’t stand that, he didn’t know what to do; she managed to trap him without even noticing it (or did she?).

He had a choice to make, or he gave in and accepts to be her slave for one night which means he would have to taste her toes again… or he could just kick her out of his house which would destroy any trace of friendship between them. He thought about that and he admits it, there was but one choice even if he hated himself for this.

“Alright Sakura you won” he said with a sad voice.

Sakura raised her eyes and looked at Naruto, she couldn’t believe he said that, was he so in love with her. Anyway she smiled lightly at him (a big one would have sound suspicious she thought).

“Thank you Naruto, I know you were a true friend and I promise I won’t fool you this time” she said while whipping her tears from her face, she then walk toward the couch, sat on it and take off her sandals to reveals her bare feet that she show to Naruto before putting them down on the table before her.

“Come on, get to work and start lick…” she said before she was interrupt…

“NO, this time I’m not your slave or anything, I’m only doing this because you begged me to, so if you want me to lick your disgusting feet again, you have to do two things for me and the first one is go take a shower before we do that and the second is to never annoy me with your obsession of getting your feet licked, oh and one last thing , the moment we are done , you will leave and none of us will ever talk about this ever again , get it ? Said Naruto staring at Sakura who was still there, sat on the couch with her feet on the table. But her face didn’t have the same look of sadness…

“No I don’t think so, I agree about the two last things but there is no way I’m gonna wash my feet, your tongue will be fine …”

“WHAT, hey I make the rule here and if they aren’t fine to your princess taste you can leave an…”

“Oh shut up and come lick my feet, you agreed you will be my dog for one more night so prove that you are a worthy man and do as I command you to “Said an annoyed Sakura while she was wiggling her toes, waiting for Naruto to suck on them.

Naruto was in shock, so this whole crying scene was just another comedy after all, she was still the same bitch that enslaved him back then … Naruto was too broken to resist and decided to end up this , after all she was right , he agreed to be her slave , god he hated himself more than ever.

He kneel before the table , right in front of Sakura’s feet and start to timidly lick them starting with the heel. Sakura was now smiling sadistically.

“I can’t believe you bought what I said, either I’m a really good actress or you’re just stupid man who would do everything he can to please the woman he loved” she then laugh hard at the view of Naruto sucking of her right big toe.

“You lied to me again, how could you be so mean to me” Said Naruto between the lick

“Pfff, you deserved it, I told a billion time that I don’t like you but you didn’t want to listen, you always thought you had a chance even after all I did to you, I hope this time you will understand that I don’t like you and my feet is the only part of my body you will ever touch, by the way, I hope you are enjoying the taste of my sweaty feet, I ran into the hospital all day and wore my oldest sandals just to make sure they are the most disgusting feet you have ever smelled”

This time, he was the one crying, her feet were sweaty and taste awful like sweat, cheese and vinegar, He was now licking her soles from heel to toe.

“Oh and about you being a slave only this night, you can forget that because I have a plan that will make you regret your attitude you pathetic asshole” she said that while she suddenly kick Naruto with the one foot he wasn’t licking clean… Hurt in the nose, he fall on his back holding his bleeding nose and crying from the pain. Sakura stand up and began kicking him everywhere she could and finally planted her left foot right on his face.

“You belong here you know that don’t you, under my feet” saying this, she applies more and more pressure on Naruto’s poor face crushing his broken noise even more. Sakura then plugged her five toes in his mouth and commanded him to suck on them which he does, whipping the dirt off them and in between them.

“Oh boy I’m tired of this…” said Sakura, still standing still with her left foot in Naruto’s mouth. Suddenly she took those off his mouth, sat on his belly and plugged them back, resting her back on his legs.

“This is better, now I can fully relax and enjoy your tongue on my toes”.

This last two hours, Sakura was still sitting on Naruto’s belly reading some medicals books while she made Naruto clean her feet though he only spent the first hour cleaning. After that, Sakura just made him lick her feet, suck on her toes just for fun… She eventually got tired of it and spent the rest of the day resting both of her feet on his face; the smell wasn’t getting better for Naruto even after all that time. Sakura was making sure he had to breathe where the smell was the strongest… in between her toes.

Suddenly, someone knocks at the door…
1212212112211112111.title: Naruto relents and is Sakura's dog one last...

choices: Naruto plays along
Naruto tells Tsunade the truth and accepts the mission
12122121122111121111.content:
Without thinking, Sakura got up and answered Naruto's door to find Tsunade standing there.

"Sakura?" Tsunade asked with a confused look on her face. "I wasn't expecting to find you here, but I'm glad to find you. I wanted to check to see how you were doing."

"I'm fine Tsunade-sama." Sakura lied as she glanced at Naruto from the corner of her eye. She knew the only way she was going to get to keep him as her pet dog was if she treated him like shit... Made him think he had no other choice but to be her dog. And her strategy worked. It was late and Naruto was her submissive dog once again.

"You lost four patients today, that's never easy. And you've never lost that many people in one night before. You can't be fine..." Tsunade said with a concerned look on her face.

Naruto's eyes were wide with surprise. So Sakura wasn't lying to him originally? Why the hell did she act like she did then?

"I don't know what you're talking about..." Sakura mumbled.

"Sakura..." Tsunade said with a stern look on her face. "Don't try to hide anything from me."

"I'm here with Naruto, do you really think I'm not fine?" Sakura countered.

Tsunade's eyes landed on Naruto. His nose looked broken, and it looked like it had been bleeding for a while.

"What happened to your nose Naruto?"

"The clumsy baka tripped and fell." Sakura instantly lied. She didn't want Tsunade finding out about how she had been treating Naruto. She had a feeling Tsunade would not approve.

"Well why didn't you heal it?" Tsunade asked as she walked into the house and set to healing Naruto's broken nose.

"I wanted him to learn his lesson to be more careful." Sakura lied again.

"Whatever." Tsunade sighed. "Anyways Naruto, I'm actually here to see you. I have a mission that I need you specifically to do, but I wanted to talk to you first before assigning it to you..."

"What's up Baa-chan?" Naruto asked with a confused look on his face.

"Well do you remember when you agreed to help Shion, the Priestess of Demon Country, to make a new priestess?"

"Yeah..."

"Well she's calling you in on that promise. She has requested I send you to Demon Country so you can fulfill your promise..."

"Sure, why not?" Naruto asked, clueless as ever.

"Naruto..." Tsunade groaned. "She wants me to send you to her so she can marry you and start a family. This mission would be your final mission, you would live the rest of your days in Demon Country."

"ABSOLUTELY NOT!" Sakura yelled with a worried look on her face. She had finally turned Naruto into her personal pet dog, and now some other hussy was trying to steal him away from her?

"You have no say in this decision Sakura." Tsunade gave her student a stern glare. "This decision is Naruto's, and Naruto's alone. Now Naruto, if I really wanted to, I could make you go on this mission since you are single."

"He's not single!" Sakura interjected.

"Sakura even if you two finally became boyfriend and girlfriend it would be too late. He's not married or set to be married, so as far as Konoha is concerned, Naruto is single."

"Naruto and I are getting engaged! He proposed to me tonight!" Sakura quickly lied. She would not let her pet go on this mission.

Naruto looked at Sakura with a completely bewildered expression on his face. He knew that Sakura was lying to Tsunade to keep him from going on his mission, but still... Would she really go as far as marrying him to keep him? Then there was the fact that he didn't even want to go on this mission to begin with. Shion was a nice enough girl, but he didn't want to start a family with her! He didn't know that was what she meant!

But... if he accepted this mission he could be free of Sakura. For whatever reason, she lied to him again tonight... He loved her, but if he didn't accept this mission then he was probably going to be spending the rest of his life beneath Sakura's feet...

Then again... he'd be spending the rest of his life beneath Sakura's feet as her husband...

"Really?" Tsunade gasped. "Well if that's true then things are quite different. By law, I can't send you on any mission that would force you to cheat with your spouse."

Naruto noticed that Sakura was giving him a warning look that told him he better play along or else...

Naruto took a deep breath and gathered his courage. What he was about to do was going to change his life forever.
12122121122111121111.title: Tsunade Has a Mission for Naruto to Consider

Sakura can't bring herself to commit to a marriage
121221211221111211111.content:
"Yep, I haven't gotten Sakura-chan a ring yet, but I asked her to marry me today and she said yes." Naruto grinned as he played along.

"Well that's great! I'm assuming you're going to say no to the mission then?"

"I finally got Sakura to agree to marry me, what do you think?"

"Alright alright." Tsunade chuckled. "I'll let Shion now. Sakura, why don't you walk me out?"

"Sure Tsunade-sama." Sakura happily chirped. She was relieved Naruto played along, now he would be her personal little dog for the rest of their lives. As soon as she stepped out of Naruto's apartment, Tsunade shut the door behind her.

"I know what's really going on."

"What do you mean?" Sakura innocently asked.

"I could smell your feet on his face when I was healing his nose, and I noticed that one of my slavery contracts was missing. You've made Naruto into your foot slave."

"I...Err..." Sakura stammered as she tried to come up with some sort of explanation.

"Relax, I'm not going to stop you." Tsunade sighed. "At least not now... This should actually be good for Naruto. Being under your control will teach him discipline and respect. But, don't think for a second that I'm not going to make you go through with this. You agreed to marry him, so you and Naruto are going to get married."

"What? But..."

"No buts. He doesn't deserve to have his hopes dashed like that, and it would cause a huge problem if the Demon Country found out we lied to you. It could start an international war. So that all being said, I'm going to give you one chance to get out of this. Are you really prepared to marry Naruto? Because if you're not, then I will send him on that mission. He'll be happy with Shion."

Sakura's eyes were wide as she stared at Tsunade. She was being forced to either make a commitment to a man she wasn't in love with, or lose her pet dog forever.

"And one more thing... I will not tolerate any unfaithfulness if you marry Naruto. So don't think you can agree then just go cheat on him with whoever you want. And don't think you can do it behind my back, I'll always be watching and if I ever catch you being unfaithful to your husband I will make you into my foot slave... And I'm not a very nice Mistress."

Sakura gulped. She had to choose if having Naruto beneath her feet for the rest of their lives was worth marrying him.

"Well Sakura?"
121221211221111211111.title: Tsunade's Stipulations for Sakura

choices: Sakura upholds her promise and doesn't get angry at Naruto

1212212112211112111111.content:
"Fine." Sakura sighed. "Fine. Lock me into a marriage with a man I don't love."

"I know what you're doing." Tsunade said. "I know how much fun this is to be able to treat a man like you're treating Naruto. But one day you'll get tired of it... trust me, I know from experience."

"I doubt that, Naruto is currently my dog and that will never change." Sakura grinned.

"Ah making him your dog..." Tsunade sighed wistfully. "I remembered when I treated Jiraiya like that... That was a lot of fun. Do you have a collar for him yet?"

"Not yet, but I'm definitely going to get one!"

"It makes you feel powerful." Tsunade smiled. "But trust me, eventually you'll want more. Promise me two things- you won't get angry at Naruto for having to marry him. This wasn't his fault, this was entirely your idea. Second, don't completely close off your heart to him. You might find out you love him."

Sakura snorted. "Yeah right."

"I know that reaction." Tsunade sighed with a sad smile. "I used to think that way about Jiraiya... I found out too late how I felt about him, and it hurt to lose him before I could tell him my true feelings. My greatest regret is ever letting go of Jiraiya in the first place. If I would've kept him as my slave, he never would've wandered, and I would've eventually discovered my feelings for him."

"It's Naruto..." Sakura started.

"It was Jiraiya." Tsunade interrupted. "Naruto has done a lot for you, and he cares a lot about you. Treat him as you please, but he's going to be your husband. Your life will be much better if you eventually give him a chance."

"I'll think about it." Sakura finally gave in.

"Good. Have fun with your dog. I'll alert your parents to your marriage so we can start planning your marriage immediately."

"Great..." Sakura sarcastically replied.

Tsunade turned her to leave but paused. "Oh and Sakura? I might just stop by sometime to use your new dog." She grinned over her shoulder. "It's been far too long since I've had my feet worshiped by an obedient foot slave."

"Sure." Sakura returned Tsunade's grin. "It is a lot of fun. Good night Tsunade-sama."

"Good night Sakura."

Sakura turned around to re-enter the apartment of her now fiance. She had made a promise to Tsunade that she wouldn't get angry at Naruto for being forced to marry him... But she didn't want to get married! If he hadn't been such an idiot and agreed to help Shizune create a new priestess she would not be in this situation. And now she would never find love, because she was chained to her dog...

But Tsunade was right... This wasn't Naruto's fault. She was the one who came up with the idea, and she was the one who agreed to it...
1212212112211112111111.title: Sakura Agrees to Marry Her Dog Slave

choices: Sakura takes Naruto shopping the next day so she can buy him a collar

12122121122111121111111.content:
Sakura took a deep breath and walked inside. Naruto was didn't say a word as he looked at her with a weird look on his face. He looked as if he didn't know what to say, or what to do. He was just confused over the entire situation.

"Get over here and lick my feet dog." Sakura commanded. Naruto scurried to obey and within seconds, he was kneeling in front of Sakura licking the tops of her feet. She just stared down at Naruto as he licked her feet. After minutes of awkward silence, Naruto paused in his licking and looked up at Sakura.

"Listen Sakura-chan... I know that you don't actually want to marry me. So don't worry, I'll think of something so you don't have to."

Sakura's eyes widened. He had what he always wanted within his grasp and he was willing to give it up for her?

"You're not going on that mission." Sakura said. That was the only reason she could think of he would do this.

"I know and I don't plan on it."

"You're never going to escape me. I'm going to keep you as my dog forever."

"I know."

Sakura was shocked... The level of devotion Naruto had for her was unreal. His devotion was perfect for a dog.

"Whatever. We're getting married anyways. Tsunade-sama is making us. We could start an international war if we didn't know."

"I'm sorry." Naruto apologized as he looked away from Sakura. "Do you want me to buy you a ring then?"

"Whatever. I don't care." Sakura sighed.

"You're going to... you're going to fuck other people aren't you?" Naruto suddenly noted with a horrified look on his face.

"Me? Nope. It looks like I'm going to die a virgin." Sakura sighed. "You'll be my husband, I can't be unfaithful to my husband."

"I..."

"Shut up Naruto." Sakura cut off her dog. "Get back to licking my feet."

"Before I do that... are you sure you're ok from work?" Naruto asked with a concerned look on his face. Even though she had betrayed him a second time, he still loved her. And now she was his fiance... It was now his duty to make sure she was ok.

"I'm fine."

"Sakura-chan..."

"I'm fine."

"Sakura!"

"I will hurt you if you don't drop it dog." Sakura threatened.

"I don't care! I need to make sure you're ok!"

Sakura's eyes softened as she looked down at her dog. Instead of answering, she lifted her right foot and pinned Naruto's face beneath it.

"Sniff." She commanded.

Naruto obeyed and started sniffing her feet, just like he had been earlier... and just like he would be doing for the rest of their lives.

"I'm not ok right now." Sakura sighed as her dog sniffed her feet. "But I've got my dog to use, and this is my profession. I'll get over this and I'll be fine. There's just no quick fix for this kind of thing. It just takes a little time."

"You know..." Naruto said in between sniffs of her smelly foot. "I know it hurts to lose your patients... but the fact that you're taking this so hard should comfort you. If you weren't taking this so hard, it means you would be used to it, which would mean you would be losing more people. The fact that you're taking this so hard is a testament to all the lives you've saved."

Sakura's expression visibly softened at her dogs words. She had never looked at it like that.

"I...yeah. Thanks." Sakura finally said. It felt weird to thank her dog, but she did appreciate his words. And his words did make her feel better. She stood like that for another ten minutes just staring down at Naruto as he sniffed her foot.

Finally, she broke the silence. "Alright dog, let's go to bed. It's been a long day and night. And don't forget to crawl." Sakura walked into Naruto's bedroom followed closely by her dog who was on all fours.

She was too tired to bother getting ready for bed tonight, and she didn't have any clothes here in Naruto's apartment. She crawled into bed even though she was completely clothed. She noticed Naruto start to lay on the floor and sighed.

"You can sleep under the covers at my feet Naruto."

Naruto nodded and quickly got into the bed. Sakura planted her feet in his face the second he was in, closed her eyes, and drifted off to sleep.
12122121122111121111111.title: Sakura Doesn't Get Angry at Naruto

choices: Sakura has Naruto buy a collar for himself
Naruto and Sakura receive an urgent summon from Tsunade
121221211221111211111111.content:
Naruto awoke the next morning with Sakura's smelly feet in his face. He still couldn't believe everything that was happening. Sakura had tricked and humiliated him not once, but twice. She had told him that she didn't care about him... Yet he crawled back to her and was now going to spend the rest of his life beneath her feet...

Yet he was going to do it as her husband. Sakura was going to be Sakura Uzumaki soon. He knew that she didn't want to marry him, and felt bad about that, but he couldn't deny how excited he was to marry Sakura.

Naruto knew that technically he wasn't Sakura's slave since her mom destroyed the contract. But she had easily been able to bend him to her will, and Naruto knew she always would be able to. He loved her that much. So that's why he wasn't going to bother trying to resist again... It was pointless. If Sakura wanted him beneath her feet, then he was going to be beneath her feet whether he liked it or not, so he might as well just accept it.

Besides... Sakura was going to marry him even though she really didn't want to. It would be mean to her if he made her marry him without getting what she wanted. Suddenly Sakura's foot lurched forward so his nose was in between her toes.

"Good morning doggy. Sniff." Naruto heard his fiance command. He obeyed and inhaled the foul stench of Sakura's foot.

"Good dog. Now get up and make me breakfast while I shower. We're going shopping today."

Without saying a word, Naruto got out of bed and headed into his kitchen. He heard the shower turn on and was tempted to peak on Sakura... but he knew that would be suicide. Instead Naruto started making some eggs and bacon.

25 minutes later, a freshly showered Sakura walked into the kitchen in nothing more than a towel... his towel. She looked so incredibly sexy. She sat down and looked at Naruto expectantly. He quickly made her a plate of breakfast.

"Lick the soles of my feet dog." Sakura commanded.

Naruto laid down on the ground beneath his beautiful teammate and started trailing his tongue up and down the soles of her feet.

"Not bad." Sakura commented as she ate the breakfast prepared by her new pet. "Now listen up, we're going to get a lot accomplished today. For starters, we're going to buy you a collar. Then we're going to move my stuff into this apartment, and you're going to sign another slavery contract. If I'm marrying you, then you are going to be my property. Got that dog?"

"Yes Sakura-chan."

"Mistress. You will call me Mistress. If you don't, then I will crush you like a bug beneath my feet."

"Yes Mistress." Naruto gulped. He happened to know for sure that Sakura knew a shrinking jutsu... He knew that because he watched her shrink a missing nin once and crush him beneath her boot-clad foot. It had been both horrifying and kind of sexy at the same time...

"Good. Now get dressed so we can leave. I want to get your collar as soon as possible."

"Yes Mistress." Naruto quickly got up and hurried to his room where he threw on his orange jumpsuit.

"Hell no." Sakura's voice rang out. He turned to see her staring at him with a disapproving glare. "I own you. I won't have people thinking I let my dog dress like that. Put on a pair of normal colored pants, and one of your black t shirts.

Naruto quickly obeyed, and threw on a pair of brown baggy khaki pants and his black shirt, just as Sakura commanded.

"I think we're going to have to go clothes shopping." Sakura sighed. "But that outfit will do for now. Let's go dog, the sooner you're collared the better.
121221211221111211111111.title: Sakura Tells Naruto What They Will be Doing

choices: Sakura Allows Naruto to Choose His Collar
Sakura and Naruto run into Shizune just before walking into the pet store
1212212112211112111111111.content:
Sakura and Naruto exited his apartment and started walking to the pet store. After only twenty seconds of walking, Sakura abruptly stopped and glared at Naruto who was walking upright.

"What the hell do you think you're doing dog? Dogs crawl on all fours."

"Sorry Mistress... I just didn't want to get all cut up and bloody from crawling on the gravel outside."

"If I want you to get cut up and bloody, you will get cut up and bloody." Sakura proclaimed. "All fours. Now."

Naruto sighed and dropped to all fours.

"That's better." Sakura grinned. She went to continue walking, but suddenly stopped herself and looked back at Naruto. He had gone along with her ploy yesterday and passed on the only opportunity he would ever have to escape from her...

"Channel chakra to your palms and your knees dog." Sakura sighed. "Just like you would for tree walking, or water walking."

"Umm..." Sakura made it sound so easy! But with Naruto's massive chakra pool, he had never had very good chakra control. "Sure... let's see here..." The ground cracked beneath Naruto's palms and knees as he tried to expel the perfect amount of chakra.

"Really?" Sakura sighed. "You've mastered sage mode, the rasengen, the rasen shuriken... And you can't do this?"

"You know I've never been great with chakra control Mistress." Naruto replied as he tried adjusting the amount of chakra he was expelling.

"Kami... I enslaved an idiot." Sakura sighed. "Here, let me help." Sakura put her hand on top of Naruto's head and pushed her chakra into his body. She pushed her chakra so it was being expelled from his palms and knees at a perfect rate to protect him from the rocks he was going to be crawling over. "Feel that? That's the amount you need."

"Right..." A look of concentration appeared on Naruto's face as Sakura removed her hand from his head. She frowned when all he managed to do was cause the ground to crack beneath him again.

"You're hopeless sometimes dog." Sakura sighed as she put her hand back on his head. "You can stop trying now, I'll do it. We don't have all day for you to figure out this simple technique, if you even want to call it that."

"Sorry Mistress... It's always taken me a while to figure out things requiring chakra control..."

"Whatever." Sakura cut her dog off. "Let's just go." Sakura idly scratched the top of Naruto's head like an owner would a dog as they walked to the pet store. She smirked as villagers gawked at the sight of Naruto crawling and her scratching his head like the dog she made him.

During the entire walk, she made sure to keep protect Naruto's palms and knees with her chakra so he didn't get cut up. Her grin widened when the pet store finally came into sight. She couldn't wait to put a collar around her dog's neck.
1212212112211112111111111.title: Heading to the Pet Store to Buy a Collar

choices: Naruto Buys His Own Collar
Something else happens!
12122121122111121111111112.content:
"Well if isn't the new happy couple." A familiar voice called as Sakura and Naruto neared the pet store. Sakura turned to her side and glared at the owner of the voice.

"Shut it Shizune."

"Ooh someone's grumpy!" Shizune teased. "Hmm, so you're really making Naruto be your slave eh? Tsunade-sama told me about it, but I didn't actually believe it."

"I'm not making Naruto be my slave, he is my slave. My worthless little doggy slave." Sakura corrected.

"I see..." Shizune mumbled as she took a look at Naruto. She noted that Naruto certainly did not look like he was enjoying himself, and Sakura just looked annoyed in general.

"Are you sure this is the best idea?" Shizune asked. "Neither of you seem happy with this arrangement."

Sakura rolled her eyes. She appreciated that Shizune was looking out for her, but she really didn't feel like explaining herself right now.

"Yes this is the best idea. Naruto was born to live beneath my feet. Now he will be beneath them for our entire lives."

"Oh Sakura..." Shizune sighed. "Then why do you look annoyed then? If you are happy with this arrangement then you would be smiling right now.

"Because I have to get married to this worthless dog!" Sakura groaned. "How can I be happy married to Naruto for the rest of my life?"

Naruto's head dropped. He couldn't understand Sakura. After everything he had done for her, she was treating him lower than dirt... But now she went and agreed to marry him even though she doesn't want to? Even though she'll always be unhappy married to him? Why the hell did she agree to it in the first place then?

Shizune noticed Naruto's drooped head and frowned at Sakura. "A lot of girls consider Naruto the most eligible bachelor in Konoha Sakura. You shouldn't be so negative." Shizune's eyes landed on Naruto's drooped head, and Sakura's eyes followed.

Strangely enough, Sakura found that she actually felt slightly bad for saying that directly in front of Naruto. "I guess." She mumbled as she started rubbing the back of his head.

"I hope you fully think this through before you two commit to this." Shizune said. "But that's the last I'm going to nag you for now. Care to show my feet a little love Naruto?"

"Go kiss Shizune's toes dog." Sakura commanded. Naruto crawled over to Shizune and kissed each of her toes.

Shizune grinned up at Sakura. "I can see why you're doing this, it is fun to have a man at your feet. Alright, I'm off. Have fun you two."

Sakura noticed that Naruto was averting his eyes from her as he crawled back to her side. She shouldn't be bothered by it as long as he continued to obey her... but for some reason, his refusal to look at her bothered Sakura.

"Why aren't you looking at me slave?" Sakura asked with a stern expression on her face.

"I don't know what you're talking about Mistress." Naruto lied, which only earned him a kick in the stomach.

"Don't you dare lie to me you stupid dog!"

"I don't know why the hell you decided to do all of this!" Naruto snapped. "If you will never be happy being married to me, then why the fuck are you marrying me? Why the fuck would you agree to a life that you'll never be happy in?"

To say Sakura was surprised was an understatement. She didn't expect for Naruto to actually snap at her. She was angry that he was snapping at her like that, but now she was facing a dilemma. She could beat him back into the docile state he was in before... But that would make more of a scene than she wanted to make right now. So she was left with her other option of trying to actually get to the source of the problem and fix it.

It might have been going a little far saying she could never be happy being married to Naruto. Once she married Naruto, she was guaranteed to have a foot slave after all. She certainly loved having a foot slave...

"I was annoyed." Sakura sighed. "Just forget I said that."

"Oh so when you're annoyed you suddenly start lying about always living an unhappy life?" Naruto snapped again. Sakura could see a little bit of the anger he displayed last night before she re-domesticated him boiling beneath surface.

"Watch your tone dog." Sakura warned. "If you keep snapping at me I'm going to seriously hurt you."

Sakura watched as Naruto clenched his fist. It looked like this wave of anger wasn't going to be going away easily. To her surprise, Naruto took a deep breath and calmed himself down.

"I just don't understand you Sakura. I don't understand why you would agree to this if you're going to be unhappy as a result. Do you hate me so much that you're willing to be unhappy your entire life just so you can keep me pinned beneath your feet?"

"I said forget the whole unhappy thing ok?" Sakura sighed. "I don't hate you Naruto, I'm just better than you. You are my worthless little dog. I'll be happy to have full ownership over you, and this will definitely be worth it to keep you here in Konoha where I can put you in your place instead of losing you to some slutty priestess in some random country."

Being called a worthless dog didn't really make Naruto feel much better... But Sakura did say that she didn't hate him...

"Are you sure this is what you want Sakura? Tsunade isn't going to let you out of this. If you're unsure..."

"I don't need to be questioned by some inferior little doggy Naruto. So shut the hell up. I'm retracting your right to speak until further notice. You will only speak on my command until I say otherwise. And what did I tell you about using my name? You are to refer to me as 'Mistress.' I'm going to give you a pass this time, but trust me when I say you don't want to find out what I'll do to you if you repeat your mistake."

Sakura could see that Naruto wanted to say something, but was pleased when her dog followed her command. "Good boy. Now let's go get you a collar shall we?"
12122121122111121111111112.title: Shizune Questions Sakura's Decision

choices: Sakura and Naruto go to Sakura's Mom's House to Get Her Stuff
Sakura and Naruto go to the Hokage's Office to Get a New Slavery Contract
121221211221111211111111121.content:
Sakura led Naruto into the pet store and instantly walked over to the collar section.

"Hmm... what should I get you?" Sakura mused as she examined all of the collars. There was a pink frilly collar, which was obviously made for a girl dog which would be funny to see Naruto in... As she picked the pink collar up to examine she noticed Naruto grimaced at the sight of the collar and chuckled.

"This is a pretty nice collar isn't it dog?" Sakura taunted. "I think it would look great around your neck."

Sakura could tell that Naruto wanted to protest her collar selection, but he continued to obey her and kept his mouth shut since she hadn't given him the command to speak.

"Yep, I think this is the collar for you Naruto." Sakura grinned. She wanted to see how obedient Naruto was going to be. "Maybe I'll get a nice pink dog tag to go with it. Ooh, and I'll get a nice pink handkerchief and tie it around your neck."

Naruto looked absolutely horrified at what Sakura was describing. But he remained obedient and didn't say a single thing.

"Not bad slave." Sakura complimented as she patted Naruto's head. "I expected you to disobey me there, but you were a good little doggy and followed my command." Naruto's eyes followed Sakura's hand as she set down the pink collar and picked up a blue one. He looked so excited when he realized that she wasn't going to make him wear a filly pink collar.

"This one will look better on you." Sakura said. She walked over to the leashes, and was closely followed by her dog.

"Hmm, I need a good leash... but I don't really want to give you too much lee way to walk around..." Sakura selected a short leash. At most, Naruto wold only be able to get maybe a foot away from her when she had him on this leash. It was so short it probably would be horrible for an actual pet, but it's extremely short length was perfect for walking her human dog.

Next, Sakura took Naruto over to the section with dog bowls. She grabbed a water bowl that she could get custom engraved and grabbed a matching food bowl. Her bowls selected, Sakura led her slave over to the dog food section.

She started examining the different brands, trying to determine what would be the best to make Naruto eat when a whine sounded. She looked down at Naruto and started laughing when she realized he was whining. He didn't dare talk, for fear of disobeying her, but she had never said anything about making noise, so he was protesting the way a dog would... through whining.

"Oh my god..." Sakura wheezed. "Oh jeez, you can speak doggy." She stared down at her slave with an amused look on her pretty face.

"Please don't make me eat dog food Sakura! Those dog biscuits sucked! Can't I please just eat regular food?"

"But you're a dog Naruto. Dogs eat dog food and biscuits."

"Please Sakura, please don't make me do it."

"And why should I not make my dog eat dog food and dog biscuits? What will I gain?"

"My gratitude?"

"Why would I care about having your gratitude? You're inferior to me, I don't care if you're grateful or not."

Naruto knelt in front of Sakura and started kissing her sandal-clad feet. "Please Mistress, please don't make me eat that!"

Sakura smiled. "Well since you finally referred to me with the respect you should always refer to me, I suppose I can let you eat regular food. But the second you start acting up we're coming straight here to buy you some dog food."

"Thank you Mistress!" Naruto showered Sakura's feet with grateful kisses causing her to smirk down at him.

"Whatever slave. You're done talking now. We just need to get you some dog tags, and get your bowls engraved, then we'll have everything we need. Of course, now the question is, should I change your name to a name that fits a dog? Or should I let you keep your name?"

"Do you want to be married to a Fido?" Naruto asked with an incredulous look on his face. Sakura hadn't actually thought about that, but kicked Naruto in the face anyways.

"I didn't give you permission to speak! Bad dog!"

Naruto whined as he rubbed his face. "But you're right. As much as I would love to change your name to Fido or something like that, I don't want to be married to one. I guess I'll let you keep your name."

Naruto looked relieved as Sakura led the way to the main counter.

"Excuse me, I need these two bowls engraved with 'Naruto.' I also need some dog tags for my dog here."

The woman working the counter looked down at Naruto with a confused look on his face.

"Umm... that's not a dog, that's a..."

"He's my dog." Sakura interrupted. "Make me the tags."

"Right..." The woman replied. "Whatever floats your boat I guess. Fill out this paper and I'll get you everything right away."

Sakura quickly filled in her contact information and only had to wait ten minutes for Naruto's custom tags to be completed, along with his bowls.

"Perfect!" Sakura grinned as she hooked Naruto's new tags onto his collar. "Pay the woman dog."

Naruto pulled out his wallet and paid the surprisingly large bill.

"I can't believe you actually want to be someone's dog." The cashier chuckled as Naruto handed her the money. Sakura started laughing as Naruto burned pink with embarrassment.

"Some men are just inferior and belong beneath a woman's feet. Naruto here is one of those men." Sakura grinned.

"Well, here are your things. Thank you for shopping with us, and have a nice day."

Sakura thought about putting Naruto on his new leash, but decided against it. She still had to keep a hand on his body so she could protect his palms and knees from getting all torn up.

"Let's go dog, we have much more to do!"
121221211221111211111111121.title: Sakura Collars Naruto

choices: Sakura's mom has a way for Naruto to escape
Sakura's mom tells Naruto if he wants to be a slave she will treat him as such
1212212112211112111111111211.content:
Sakura decided now was as good of a time as any to get the hardest part of her day out of the way, and started walking towards her mom's house.

Sakura's mom freed Naruto from her control and yelled at her for making him her dog. Her mom was going to be pissed when she found out what Sakura had done. She knocked on the door to her former residence.

Her mom promptly opened the door and glared at her. "After receiving the news from Tsunade, I figured you would be by today. Come on in Sakura, you and I are going to have a long talk.

Sakura groaned, but obeyed her mom nonetheless.

"Naruto, wait out her sweetie. Sakura and I need to have a chat in private." Sakura's mom sweetly said.

"No. We can talk right here." Sakura sat down on the couch and snapped her fingers at her dog. "Kiss my feet dog."

"Not in my house!" Kaori protested. But it didn't matter. Naruto crawled forward and obediently started kissing her feet.

"He's my dog foot slave, this is his purpose." Sakura explained as she flashed her mom a smug smile. "So what did you want to talk about mom?"

"What you're doing to that poor boy!" Kaori angrily yelled. "How dare you go and do this to him again! He's suffered more than enough in his life. But what's even worse it that you're actually going to marry him to keep him? How could you submit not just Naruto, but yourself, as well to a loveless marriage for the rest of your lives? What the hell is wrong with you?!"

"Naruto has always been a worthless dog whose destiny was to wind up beneath my feet." Sakura patiently explained. "If I didn't keep him, I would deny him the destiny he's worked so very hard for."

"THAT KID WORKED HIS ASS OFF TO PROTECT YOU AND THIS VILLAGE! YOU KNOW DAMN WELL HIS TRUE DESTINY IS TO BECOME HOKAGE!" Kaori roared angrily.

"Naruto had a chance to escape this arrangement, and he would've been free from my control for the rest of his life. But like the worthless little dog he is, he chose to serve me. He knows that he was never going to be Hokage. From the moment we met, Naruto knew he was destined to live beneath my feet." Sakura countered.

Sakura's mom looked like she was about to explode. To Sakura's surprise, she took a deep breath and calmed herself down.

"So there is absolutely nothing I can do to convince you that not only are you making the biggest mistake of your life, but you are completely crushing the very soul of the one man who dedicated himself to protecting you and your happiness?"

Sakura glanced down at Naruto who had continued to kiss her feet and then back at her mother.

"Nope!" Sakura grinned. "Naruto belongs to me, and he will never escape from beneath me."

"I know I raised you better than that Sakura." Kaori sighed. "But fine. You start packing your stuff up down here. I need Naruto's help with moving some stuff upstairs."

"Whatever. Go help my mom dog." Sakura ordered. She was both surprised and grateful her mom gave up that quickly. She had expected their conversation to be much longer and far more annoying.

Naruto silently nodded his head and followed the woman who had just defended him up the stairs. He had hoped that over time, it would hurt less when Sakura talked about how she felt for him. But so far it had stung just as badly as it had the first time.

"Ok Naruto..." Kaori spoke up as she led him into a room and quickly shut the door.
1212212112211112111111111211.title: Sakura and Naruto go to Sakura's Mom's ...

choices: Naruto refuses to go through with Kaori's plan
Naruto accepts Kaori's plan
12122121122111121111111112111.content:
"I warned you about trusting my daughter, but you didn't listen did you?"

"No..." Naruto sighed. She was just so... hurt last night that I couldn't not do whatever I had to to cheer her up."

"Well tough. She has once again proven how she feels about you. I would love to be able to call you my son-in-law, but my daughter has proven once again that she doesn't deserve you."

On the other side of the door Sakura clenched her fist angrily. She had crept up after her mom because she didn't trust her. As if she didn't deserve Naruto... The thought was ridiculous! He was lucky she had even allowed him to be her slave!

"You're wrong Haruno-san. Sakura is an amazing woman. She deserves to have her every wish and desire filled." Naruto quietly replied.

"When she's acting the way she has been lately she doesn't! But that doesn't matter right now. What matters is you Naruto. You need to think about yourself for once. Tell me, will you ever be happy as my daughter's dog?"

"No..." Naruto whispered. "But it doesn't matter."

"What are you planning on doing when she finds someone she falls in love with? She'll be angry at you for keeping her chained in your marriage... she could kill you!"

"I don't plan on keeping her chained to our marriage. I'm going to make our marriage...open. So she will be free to do whatever she wants."

"WHAT?! Not even you could survive that kind of mental pain. You would die!"

"I know..." Naruto replied. "But that's fine. I'm ready to die now. I will never be Hokage, I will never have Sakura's love and I will only ever be hated by Sakura..."

On the other side of the door, Sakura's mouth was hanging open in shock. She knew Naruto was devoted to her, but this.... this was taking devotion to a whole new level. She knew he had always been prepared to give his life for hers should she be in danger, but from the sounds of it, he was willing to give his life up whenever the hell she wanted!

"That's bullshit!" Kaori angrily yelled. You've done too much to live such a miserable life. I'm freeing you Naruto, and this time I will make sure my daughter can't hurt you ever again."

Sakura clenched her other fist in anger. She knew her mom would try to do something! She debated rushing in and yelling right now, but decided to wait. With how powerfully Naruto was speaking of her, it would be a little more difficult to treat him the way he deserved to be treated. She would wait for him to go along with her mother's plan then beat the crap out of him.

"If I'm free from Sakura, then I have to go to Demon Country, and I don't want to leave Konoha."

"Don't worry. My plan will keep you here too." Kaori smiled. "Before Sakura's father died, he registered the Haruno clan with Konoha, which makes me the official head of the Haruno clan. As clan head, all marriages involving members of my family must receive my formal acceptance. I will deny that acceptance so you don't have to marry Sakura. Then I'll legally induct you to the Haruno clan, and use my power as a clan head to put a restraining order against Sakura for you."

"I would still have to go to demon country." Naruto pointed out.

"You wouldn't, because I would refuse to give formal acceptance for that marriage as well." Kaori smiled. "Now you're going to need to tell the authorities when Sakura tries to violate the restraining order. Ok?"

Kaori waited for Naruto to reply, but he just sat there silently with a blank look on his face.

"Naruto?"
12122121122111121111111112111.title: Sakura's mom has a way for Naruto to escape

choices: Sakura wants to use Naruto for a while when they get home
They drop Sakura's stuff off then go hack to their day
121221211221111211111111121111.content:
Sakura was shaking with rage on the other side of the door! Her mother couldn't do this! And just as she expected, Naruto was going to go along with the plan. Looks like he wasn't as devoted as she...

"No." Sakura heard Naruto's call out firmly.

"Excuse me?" Sakura's mom gasped. And Sakura found herself seconding that question.

"I said no. Sakura chose to enslave me, and she is choosing to keep forever by marrying me. And she chose that because this is what she wants. She hates me. She wants me to be miserable. She wouldn't have chosen to go this route if it wasn't the route that would make her happiest. I will gladly give my life to her if just to make her smile one time that she would not have." Naruto's voice strongly replied.

Ironically enough, a small smile had found its way onto Sakura's face as she listened to Naruto's refusal. Of course she reasoned the smile was because she was happy to have her slave wrapped so tightly around her middle finger. She peaked into the room so she could watch.

"That's stupid! Naruto, I'm offering you a chance at happiness, and you're turning it down to live a life that you're not even sure you can survive?"

"Yes. Thank you for the offer Haruno-san, but as your daughter has said multiple times, I will always be beneath her feet."

"See Mom?" Sakura crowed with a triumphant smile as she entered the room. "He wants to be my dog."

"You heard all that?" Kaori quietly asked.

"Yep. Good dog Naruto." Sakura complimented with a mocking smile towards her slave.

"There really is no hope for you then..." Kaori sadly sighed. "If you heard all that, and are still acting like this, you will never change. Sakura, I'm not giving my acceptance for you and Naruto's marriage. This way, he'll have to go and marry that priestess where he can be far away from you, and can live a happy life like he deserves."

"WHAT?!" Sakura roared. "You can't do that! You heard him! Being my slave is his choice!"

"I don't care what his choice is. I'm going to do what's best for this poor boy."

"WELL WHAT..."

"Enough!" Naruto interrupted with a powerful yell filled with strength. "Haruno-san, I appreciate your concern for my well being more than you will ever know... but this is my choice. I will always choose Sakura's happiness over my own. I don't really care what happens to me, just as long as Sakura is a little happier."

"You may be unwilling to look out for your own happiness, but I'm going to do it for you anyways." Kaori countered.

"Then I will refuse to go. I will become a traitor to Konoha, and allow myself to get captured so I could die the disgraceful death of the traitor. I will tarnish my legacy, Jiraiya's legacy and even my father's legacy in the process... but I don't care. I promise you that will be what I do if you deny my and Sakura's marriage."

Sakura and Kaori just stared at Naruto with dumbfounded looks on their faces. How could someone be that devoted?

"Fine." Kaori humphed. "As soon as you finish packing your stuff, leave and never return."

Sakura's eyes widened. "What?"

"I don't want to see you ever again. I am ashamed that I have to call you my daughter..."

"Stop." Naruto softly interrupted. "In the time that Sakura pretended to be my friend, one of the many things I learned about her was that she was very close to you. Just because she treats me like this doesn't mean she's not the incredible daughter you raised. I would sooner die than cause Sakura to be estranged from you."

To prove his point, Naruto summoned a rasengan and held it near his head. Naruto didn't flinch in the slightest, even though their was a deadly ball of whirling chakra that could blow his head off if it connected.

"Stop!" Sakura yelled with a panicked look in her eyes. "Don't go killing yourself over something so stupid idiot!"
