"I grabbed my own heart and crushed it into a thousand tiny pieces and promised you that I would bring Sasuke back to you, knowing full well that once I did, you would forget all about me and I would have to watch the woman I love be with my greatest rival. I went away with Jiraiya for two and a half years and subjected myself to hell to get stronger. I came back and subjected myself to more hell to get stronger... all for you."

"I..."

"AND THEN YOU HAVE THE FUCKING GALL TO TRICK ME INTO SIGNING A CONTRACT THAT STRIPS ME OF MY GREATEST FUCKING DREAM?!" Naruto roared in anger. "YOU HAVE NO FUCKING RIGHT SAKURA. NOT AFTER ALL THE SACRIFICES I'VE MADE FOR YOU."

"Oh look" Naruto suddenly quipped brightly. "We're to the part where I return from my training trip. Let's see what this "terrible ninja" and idiot did when he returned shall we?"

"I saved the Kazekage- who was an ally of Konoha BECAUSE HE WAS INSPIRED BY ME!" Naruto had one finger extended. "I,an idiot mind you, developed one of the most deadly techniques ever created, a technique that literally attacks its victim at the cellular level, the rasenshuriken..."

"I used aforementioned technique to kill the Akatsuki member Kakuzu..." Naruto continued listing off. "Oh by the way Baa-chan, no help from the Kyubi there. That was all me. The best your apprentice can say there is that she killed an Akatsuki member with the help of a puppet master."

"Now where was I... Oh right! After my godfather died I trained to become a sage and SURPRASSED HIM by actually mastering it... Oh, this next one is one of the best parts!"

"Naruto..." Tsunade choked out. Both she and Sakura had started crying early into Naruto's ramblings.
12122121212211.title: Naruto continues laying into Sakura and Tsunade

choices: Naruto easily defeats Sakura and Tsunade
Tsunade and Sakura get help from Kakashi
121221212122111.content:
"Shut up Baa-Chan, stop trying to interrupt one of the best parts!"

"So the man who killed Jiraiya came to the village looking for me, and completely destroyed the village with all of its strongest jonin in it. Kakashi, Gai, you Baa-Chan... Yet none of you could stand up against him. He completely wiped the floor with you guys and killed a lot of the villagers."

"Naruto pl..."

"So that's when I arrive. I arrive to see a completely destroyed Konoha, and see you Baa-chan, barely able to stand and challenging Pain. Pain would've quite easily killed you at that point. But luckily for you, me, the terrible and idiotic ninja stepped in. I used the power of sage mode to do what no one in Konoha could do, I defeated Pain."

"But you...The Kyubi was the one that..." Tsunade started.

Naruto grinned. "I did release the Kyubi didn't I? I got so damn pissed off when I watched Pain kill one of my friends because she was trying to help me... I guess I couldn't help it. But is the Kyubi before you now? No. That's because with my father's help, I resealed the old fuzzball. Now stop interrupting Baa-chan, because we aren't even to the best part yet."

"So after I defeated all of the paths of pained, I, who you deemed an idiot, was able to figure out a way to track the final Pain. I tracked him down on my own, and I confronted him. And even though he had killed countless villagers, including both Kakashi and Jiraiya, I was able to talk to him calmly, and through our talk Pain aka Nagato gained faith in me and revived all of the villagers he killed. So half the people that you bitches see everyday wouldn't be alive if it weren't for me. But I'm just a crappy ninja right? Anyone could've done that..."

"Naruto we're..." Sakura started.

"But we're STILL not to the best part!" Naruto interrupted with a happy smile. "Nope! But why don't we fast forward a little bit because quite honestly, the next thing I'm about to mention hurt like a bitch and I really don't want to spend too much time on it."

"I went to Iron Country to convince the Raikage to drop the order to kill on Sasuke... for you Sakura."

Sakura's eyes widened. She knew where he was going with this.

"And after receiving some disturbing news related to Sasuke that literally fucked with mind, enter Sakura-chan! And oh look everyone! Sakura-chan loves me!" Naruto crowed with a bitter smile. "Oh wait... nope. That was just a lie. She was just trying to use my feelings to get me to stop chasing after Sasuke so she can deal with him herself. Ah, THAT sounds more like the Sakura we know doesn't it?" Naruto winked.

"But let's move on from there. This next part is my absolute favorite. This is a reason neither of you have ANY excuse to be treating me like this. Realizing I needed more power to save the world, and realizing that my father sealed the Kyubi within me because I trusted I could master its power, I unsealed it and had a battle of wills with the most powerful and terrible demon to ever walk the earth."

"Now tell me Sakura-chan, do you see the Kyubi right now?"

"No..." Sakura quietly replied like a scolded child.

"Baa-chan? See any Kyubis around here?"

"No..." Tsunade mumbled.

"Really? No Kyubi's, why is that... OH MY GOSH!" Naruto screamed. "That's because I managed to control the Kyubi isn't it? Tell me something Baa-chan, if all my determination was from the Kyubi, how did I manage to beat in in a battle of wills then?"

"I don't know..." Tsunade mumbled.

"I was able to beat the Kyubi because I had people to protect!" Naruto answered as if he were teaching a child the most basic thing ever.

"And to bring this story to an end, I combined the Kyubi's power with my own and saved the whole fucking world. Now tell me Tsunade, Sakura, does that sound like the story of a pathetic and idiotic ninja to you?"

"No..." Both women mumbled in unison.

"No fucking duh."

"But I still have the contract..." Sakura mumbled weakly. Sakura would never know why she mumbled that, frankly after listening to Naruto tear into her and Tsunade she felt horrible. But old habits die hard I guess...

Naruto started laughing at her. "As if anyone in this village could enforce that contract. Besides, I'm leaving this stupid village, so I wouldn't be able to "serve" you anyways Sakura."

"What do you mean...leaving?" Sakura asked hesitantly.

"I mean I'm leaving this stupid village and never coming back. I've made some good memories here and there, and made a couple of friends along the way, but overall, this village has done nothing but torture me my entire damn life. I thought it was getting better, I thought I was gaining respect. Then the Hokage and the girl who's opinion means more than anyone else's in the world to me go and pull this shit. I'm stubborn, and I don't like giving up, but enough is enough. I don't have to put up with this crap, so I won't."

"Naruto, as Sakura's slave you aren't allowed to leave the village without Sakura's permission, does he have your permission Sakura?" Tsunade asked in a strong voice. She also felt terrible for what she did to Naruto, but she now realized that the only way they were going to keep Naruto in the village was if he was under Sakura's control.

"No..." Sakura meekly replied.

Naruto chuckled. "I already told you, I'm not Sakura's slave. No one in this village can enforce that."

"Don't be so confident brat." Tsunade replied icily. "Sakura and I can take you."

Naruto burst out into laughter. "Are you fucking kidding me? You two? HAHAHAHAHAHA! I'm a sage, I've mastered the Kyubi's power... those are two reasons you can't touch me. But more importantly, you two are way too slow to contend with my father's flying thundergod technique."

Tsunade cracked her knuckles together menacingly, and Sakura followed her master's lead.

"We'll see about that brat..." Tsunade threatened. Naruto gave her a cheeky grin.

"Oh wow, this is priceless. Ok ok, fine. I'll give you a shot. I'll fight both of you without using the Kyubi's power, I wouldn't want either of you contributing my victory to the Kyubi after all! Now, if you win, I'll be Sakura's perfect little slave. You'll never see another glare from me nor hear another complaint. But if I win, I get to leave the village without becoming a missing nin. Not that I can't handle whatever Konoha throws at me, it's just I would prefer NOT to have ANBU and hunter nins coming after me when I move to another village."

"Deal." Tsunade replied. "You're way too full of yourself Naruto."

Naruto chuckled. "Likewise Hag. Now then Sakura-chan, Baa-chan, can we get this fight underway? I really want to get out of your presences sooner than later, because frankly the mere sight of you is enough to piss me off."
121221212122111.title: Naruto finishes his rant, and decides to leave

choices: The Evesdropper......
1212212121221111.content:
Tsunade charged at Naruto, fists clenched in a frustrated rage. Naruto just stood calmly as Tsunade approached. Sakura, not following her sensei waited, looking for the perfect opportunity to strike. Tsunade threw the first punch, hitting Naruto square in the jaw. As she smirked, looking up to see what was left of Naruto, her confident smile changed to a face of utter horror, not only was Naruto conscious, but the only damage that could be seen was his head was cocked and blood trickled slowly out of his mouth. "Wha..what the?" Tsunade gasped as she pulled her punch back. 'That's....that's not possible.' Sakura thought, visibly shaken as Naruto cocked his head back. "That was it, Baa-chan?" Naruto mocked. "I'll give you a hand, I felt that one." Naruto said. Suddenly, he turn and spat some of the blood in his mouth right in Sakura's eyes, blinding her. Then in an instant, he was right in front of her, with no time to react, she was wide open for an attack. Showing no mercy, Naruto landed a punch straight into Sakura's torso. he then leaned in and whispered. "Wow, feels like I just broke three ribs. Am I right? Sakura-chan?" the last part hissed out of him full of a mixture of rage, sorrow and mocking kindness. Sakura couldn't control coughing up blood from the hit. As she fell to the floor, very alive, but seriously wounded, Naruto turned back to Tsunade. "Let's take this elsewhere." Naruto said, grabbing Tsunade's leg, as he used a jutsu, and moments later, the two where gone. "Damn it." Skura said as she propped herself up and began healing her wounds.

Just outside the village, in a nearby forest, Naruto and Tsunade re-appeared next to a large tree. "What was that?" Tsunade asked, dumbfounded. "That was the Flying Thunder God Technique." Naruto answered, as he cracked his knuckles in anticipation. "So why did you bring me out here?" "Because, I wanted this to be between you and me." Naruto said. "Fine, let's do this." Tsunade angrily replied. "Okay, but this time, let me use my real body." Naruto said as he formed the hand seal to disperse the Shadow clone that had brought Tsunade. "Wait a minute, you're telling me that was a clone I punched!?!" "Yes, you see, when Sakura told me her plan I had no intent on being her slave, so I used a clone this whole time, it's been a clone that Sakura's been torturing, a clone that got that seal.......a clone that you two were fighting." Naruto said. "B....but how could a clone survive a blow like that?" Tsunade desperately asked. "He was enhanced with senjutsu chakra." Naruto replied. "You see, one of the things I learned from sage training is to turn my body extremely tough, by not only focusing nature chakra outward, but inward as well, I created a extremely strong defense that even rivals Gaara's." Naruto said. "And by having my clone only use taijutsu techniques, I was able to keep him summoned for this long, and that's why he barely flinched when he was hit, all of his chakra was focused on toughening his body, which also mean his blows were also highly devastating." "So, now that the explaining is out of the way, still think I'm a completely idiotic ninja, unworthy to become Hokage?" Naruto said, assuming a fighting stance. "Un....unbelievable." was all Tsunade could muster to say in the wake of this shocking news. Naruto charged, using the opportunity to take out the stunned Tsunade. As he approached, Tsunade reacted all too late as Naruto grabbed one of her legs, lifted it up and held it there. His speed had rendered Tsunade helpless. He then undid her sandal, threw it on the ground and licked the top of her foot to her toes, kissing it gently once he was done. "My goodness Naruto, I'm glad to see this was just a scheme to..." Craaaaaack. She was cut off by the sound of Naruto driving his arm, full force into her outstretched leg, shattering both her tibia and fibula. Tsunade realizing this, fell screaming in pain as she clutched her broken leg. Naruto leaned down next to her. "Now image this feeling of joy turning to pain, and times it by one hundred, because that's how it felt learning what you and Sakura were planning to do, and learning what you two truly thought about me. Oh and as for that stupid contract my clone signed...." Naruto paused, pulling it out, and ripping it apart. "....consider it null and void. We're done here." Naruto said. And in the final act of severing his ties with the village he took off he headband. He pause for a moment as tears welled in his eyes. "Iruka-sensei gave this headband to me when I graduated from the academy. He was the only one who really understood me and taught me to fight for others and for the village, and even thought the cloth was wrecked the metal is still the same. Everything this headband meant to me, everything I ever strive to become.....all my dreams......" Naruto turned and threw it right at Tsunade, hitting her in the chest firmly, but not damaging. ".......tainted, fucking tainted by you and goddamned Sakura." Naruto began crying angrily, only to turn away. "Fuck you and fuck the village, Tsunade." Naruto said, dropping the cutesy nickname he gave Tsunade. As he slowly walked away from the battered Hokage, a voice cried out. "Wait, Naruto!!!" Naruto turned to see it was....
1212212121221111.title: Naruto easily defeats Sakura and Tsunade

choices: Kakashi joins Naruto
Kakashi searches for another solution to this whole mess
1212212121221112.content:
Naruto stood in the training grounds across from Sakura and Tsunade. He had a grin on his face as he noticed the slightly apprehensive looks on their faces.

"Alright, let's get this started! I really want to leave this worthless village as soon as possible!" Both Sakura and Tsunade flinched at how Naruto referred to Konoha, the same village just hours ago he would've wanted to protect with his life.

Sakura opened her mouth to respond, but was interrupted by a poof of smoke.

"Hmm, what do we have here?" Kakashi asked as the smoke cleared.

"It doesn't concern you Kakashi-sensei." Naruto answered. Kakashi was one of the few people in this village that Naruto would still protect with his life. The copy ninja was one of Naruto's most precious people and he had no desire to hurt him.

"We're trying to keep Naruto from leaving the village." Sakura said quietly. "If we beat him, he's agreed to stay. If we lose, he's going to leave the village forever and we're not allowed to send anyone after him."

Kakahi's visible eye widened in shock. Naruto leaving the village? That didn't seem right. Before he could question more, Naruto's crazed laughter rang through the air.

"Oh look how sad poor Sakura-chan is! What a victim she is that now both of her teammates are abandoning the village. Don't you feel bad for her sensei? What ever did such a sweet an innocent girl to deserve such a fate?" Naruto mocked. Sakura lowered her head as tears started pooling in her eyes.

"Naruto that's no way to speak to a teammate." Kakashi chided. He couldn't believe Naruto's words.

"Teammate? Oh she's not my teammate Kakashi. She's my supposed master." Naruto grinned sadistically.

Kakashi looked between Naruto and Sakura with a confused look on his face.

"Confused? Let me tell you about my day so far sensei, it's been such a wonderful day. Really, one for the ages!" Naruto's voice was dripping with sarcasm. Kakashi noted from the corner of his eye that both Tsunade and Sakura dropped their heads in shame.

"So it all started when Sakura-chan here saw me using my sexy jutsu."

Kakashi slapped his forehead. "Let me guess, she got mad and bopped you on the head? You know that's how she reacts to that Naruto, don't leave the village because of something so minor."

Naruto grinned. "Oh I'm used to Sakura hitting me, but she stepped her game up this time. She knocked me out, tied me up, then tortured me with her feet when I woke up until I passed out."

"Oh..." That wasn't what Kakashi had expected. He threw Sakura a dissapointed look. "Sakura I taught you to treat your teammates better than that."

"It gets better sensei! So I wake up, and Sakura is acting all nice. She tells me to make it up to me for torturing me with her feet, she'll go on a date with me!"

Kakashi smiled. That sounded more like one of his students.

"But before we could go on a date, Sakura said I had to sign something in blood. She wouldn't tell me what it is, she just said she wanted to see how much I trusted her." Naruto continued, his crazed grin was still on his face, but his eyes couldn't hide his pain.

Suddenly Naruto's words rang through Kakashi's mind.

"Sakura...you didn't..."

"Yep!" Naruto quipped. "What I signed was a contract that made me Sakura's slave. She used my feelings for her to strip me of my humanity and dreams. But it gets better sensei, it gets better."

"Sakura was laughing at my predicament...laughing. I thought we were at least friends..but nope. So I went to Baa-chan here to get her to tell Sakura she couldn't enslave me. But here's the kicker...IT WAS THE OLD HAG's IDEA!!"

"What??" Kakashi yelled in surprise. Kakashi never yelled, but he hadn't seen that coming. Tsunade had always cared about Naruto and respected him.

"Yep, she told me I was a idiot, a terrible ninja...what else...Oh, that I would be a terrible Hokage, and this next one's really good, she told me the only reason I've accomplished anything is from relying on the Kyubi. She even said I got my determination from the Kyubi! Then she had the nerve to put a collar seal on me that would allow Sakura to hurt me when I disobeyed and even seal my chakra if she wanted to. Then the old bitch told me I was inferior.."

"ARE YOU TWO FUCKING STUPID??!" Kakashi yelled at Tsunade and Sakura. For once in his life, Kakashi was losing his cool.

"Not only is Naruto's strength vital to the safety of this village, he should be a precious person to you both. Why the fuck would you do that?"

"Kakashi I'm still the Hokage!" Tsunade defended, not quite enjoying being scolded by one of her subordinates.

"You are." Kakashi replied calmly. "But apparently you are unfit for your position if you really were stupid enough to allow for our village's most powerful ninja, and one of the last remaining jinchuriki to have his chakra sealed. Naruto is a big reason no one is attacking Konoha right now, they remember his strength from the war. If Naruto's chakra were sealed, the other villages would have one less reason not to attack us."

Tsunade dropped her head in shame. Kakashi was right.

"We known no sensei." Sakura replied sadly. "But now keeping him as my slave is the only way we're going to keep him in the village."
1212212121221112.title: Kakashi Arrives

choices: Naruto is still too strong and easily defeats Kakashi, Sakura and Tsunade
With Kakashi's help Naruto is defeated and become Sakura's foot slave
12122121212211122.content:
Kakashi sighed. What a mess.

"Naruto, both Sakura and Tsunade seem to regret what they did to you, why don't we do this. Sakura will destroy the contract she tricked you into signing and you can remain in the village with your remaining precious people?"

"I'll do that." Sakura agreed.

Naruto snorted. "Fuck that. I trusted those two before and it didn't work out well for me. I now know what they both really think of me and will never allow myself to trust either of those ungrateful bitches again." Tsunade and Sakura both winced at Naruto's words.

"Please Naruto, I'm sorry. I swear on everything in this world that I'll free you if you stay. Please just give me one final chance." Sakura pleaded.

Naruto snorted again. "You're a good actress Sakura, I'll give you that. I can tell you definitely don't want to lose your foot slave. Tell you what, I'll drag Sasuke's ass back here and you can make him your foot slave... well no, you wouldn't do that to Sasuke. You would bend over and let him fuck you to his heart's content even after all the shit he's put you, me, and Konoha through."

"What? I don't like Sasuke like that anymore"

"Just shut up Sakura. Kakashi, stand aside. I'm ready to get out of this hellhole and I don't want to hurt you."

"So there's nothing anyone can do to keep you in Konoha other than enforcing Sakura's contract" Kakashi asked sadly.

"No one can enforce it sensei." Naruto grinned causing Kakashi to sigh. He really didn't want to do this, but it looks like he had no choice.

"Sakura...will you treat Naruto with respect if he's your slave?"

"Of course!"

"You would let him live his life as if nothing were different?"

"Yes."

"You wouldn't force him to do anything he didn't want to do? And you wouldn't try to humiliate him?"

"No sensei."

"And you would never seal his chakra?"

"Never."

Kakashi flashed Sakura a one-eyed smile. "I'm going to trust you Sakura. If you betray my trust I will kill you."

Sakura gulped nervously.

"I won't."

"Sorry Naruto, but I can't let you leave the village. Sakura has promised me that she will take good care of you, so I'm afraid I'm going to have to help enslave you."

Naruto smiled sadly at Kakashi. It stung a little that Kakashi would side with Sakura and Tsunade, but Naruto understood why he was. Naruto knew that as a jinchuriki he was vital to Konoha's safety, Kakashi was just trying to protect the villagers.

"I understand sensei. Let's get this over with."

121221212122111221.content:
With a heavy sigh Kakashi lifted his headband revealing his prized mangekyo sharingan eye. He hoped that his eye would be enough to keep up with Naruto.

Naruto withdrew one of his father's signature three-pronged kunai and threw it into the air. He threw another kunai at it, which hit the special kunai so that it thudded into the ground.

"Shit..." Kakashi muttered. He started to turn around, but it was too late. In a yellow flash, Naruto was standing behind him.

"Rasengan!" Naruto thrust the rasengan into Kakashi's back, knocking his former teacher out of the fight.

Both Sakura and Tsunade stared at Naruto wide-eyed. They had never seen such speed. Kakashi's mangekyo sharingan could keep up with any movements, but Naruto was able to move so fast that Kakashi's body couldn't physically react quick enough.

Tsunade lunged forward with a powerful punch, but Naruto easily dodged it, and rewarded her for her attack by thrusting a rasengan into her gut.

"Now it's just you and me Sakura-chan." Naruto said coldly.

"Naruto please stop. If you stay, I'll really go on a date with you. I'll pay even. I'll do anything to make you stay. Anything. Just stay... please stay so I can make everything up to you..." Sakura pleaded with tears in her eyes.

"You'll really go on a date with me?" Naruto asked with an excited look on his face.

Sakura smiled at Naruto, thinking she had gotten through to him.

"I'm so happy Sakura-chan!" Naruto replied with a bright smile that warmed Sakura's entire body. He bounded up to her and got on his hands and knees. Sakura stared at him in confusion as he lowered his lips to her feet.

"Thank you Sakura for acknowledging me." Naruto said softly as he started kissing her feet. Sakura couldn't believe it... He was willingly kissing her feet?
121221212122111221.title: Sakura's Final Plea

1212212121221112211.content:
Sakura flashed Naruto a relieved smile as he continued kissing her feet.

"You don't have to thank me baka, I'm so relieved you're staying. I'm going to make it all up to you from here on out."

Naruto continued kissing her feet, but found it becoming increasingly difficult to keep a straight face. She was atcually buying it...

"Now where do you want to go for our date Naruto? Ichiraku's?"

Naruto couldn't take it anymore and bursted out in laughter.

"What's so funny Naruto?" A confused Sakura asked.

"You actually bought it! Hahahaha. God, does that mean that me accepting your offer and become your good little foot servant is what you expected to happen?"

"You...you..." Sakura stared down at Naruto in complete shock.

"And as if i'd want to go on a date with an evil bitch like you." Naruto snorted as he stood up.

"I hate you Sakura Haruno." Naruto lied with a cold glare. Even now, after everything he still had troublesome feelings for the girl, but he wasn't about to her know that.

"But...you just kissed my feet..." Sakura mumbled.

"Looks like I'm a good actor too!" Naruto grinned. "Now, I've had enough of this, I'm outta this village."

"I'll stop you." Sakura said in a determined tone. "I won't let..." Sakura started, but her eyes widened when Naruto flickered behind her far quicker than she could ever hope to react. Naruto was pressed tightly against the back of her body and she could feel his hot breath on the back of her neck.

"Naruto...please..." Sakura begged as tears fell from her eyes.

"Goodbye Sakura-chan." Naruto whispered coldly into her ear. She felt a pressure on the back of her neck and fell forward unconscious.

"Well, I'm free. Now where to go..." Naruto mused. "I could go to Suna. Temari's there and she's really hot, she could probably help me get over Sakura. I could also go to Kumo...they like me a lot there after I trained with Killer B...And there's always Kiri, the Mizukage was a really nice lady, and she was absolutely gorgeous...Or I could go to Iwa...they would love to have a jinchuriki again..."

"Or I could just follow after Jiraiya's example and travel the world as a wandering hermit... And still there are so many other people who would love to have me live with them. I'd be welcomed by Tazuna's daughter in wave, Shion in demon country and I really got along... hmmm...."

Naruto runs into a Konoha team returning from a mission
121221212122111221121.content:
Naruto knew that as long as he held onto his feelings for Sakura, he would never truly be able to move on from Konoha, and that left the possibility of Naruto doing something idiotic like returning to this god forsaken place where Sakura and Tsunade could just betray him again.

The other villages all seemed like ok places to move, but Suna offered Naruto the best chance to get over Sakura- Temari. Naruto had a crush on Temari since he ran into her and her brothers back before the chunin exams started. Her beauty was second only to Sakura's, and she had a fiery spirit. Naruto honestly could never figure out why Shikamaru ended up choosing Ino over Temari.

It would also be nice to be able to hang out with Gaara all the time. Gaara and he were close friends since they understood each other's pain, but Gaara always lived in Suna while Naruto lived in Konoha. So the two really only saw each other two or three times a year.

Naruto grinned. Suna would be the perfect place for a new start. He took one more glance at the unconscious body of the two women who betrayed him, and the grey-haired man who had trained and tried to help him. Naruto would really miss Kakashi. And even though he shouldn't after what they did to him... He would miss Sakura and Tsunade too.

"Goodbye." Naruto whispered. He took off and ran out the village gates. He didn't bother looking over his shoulder to get one more glance of Konoha, Naruto Uzumaki is only looking forward now.

Naruto aint no foot slave! He decides to go somewhere else
1212212121221112211211.content:
"So that's why I'm here." Naruto said as he finished giving Gaara his explanation for his sudden presence. He left out the part where he was going to use Temari to get over his crush on Sakura because he didn't think that would go over too well...

"So you were Sakura's foot slave?" Temari asked with a calculating look in her eyes.

"What? No... I mean, yes I was. But I didn't actually submit to that evil bitch."

"I'm sorry to hear you say that about Sakura, I know how much you loved her." Gaara said in a quiet voice.

"It's not your fault, so there's no need to apologize Gaara." Naruto replied.

"You know...I can see why Sakura made you her foot slave." Temari said, interrupting the somber moment.

"WHAT?!" Naruto yelled in shock. Gaara shot his sister a questioning look.

"What? You've always been a little on the submissive side when it comes to women, you had been chasing after her for years, and I have to say that the idea of having a slave to worship my feet is very appealing." Temari explained with her eyes locked firmly with Naruto's.

"Temari..." Gaara admonished.

"I am not submissive!" Naruto huffed.

Temari smirked at Naruto. "I bet I could turn you into a wonderful foot slave Naruto."

"W-W-Why?" This was horrifying to hear. When was Tsunade going to tell him this? Never?

"It's his punishment. Anyway, get back to licking, slave"

121221212122111221122211221.content:
Kurotsuchi made a few handsighns and tapped Naruto on the center of his forhead and Naruto screamed as his body was enveloped in light and once it faded away, Naruto was a quater of an inch tall.

Kurotsuchi grinned while looking down at the tiny bug at her feet. She shook her head with a bemused smile. Idly, she scrunched her big toe and flicked out with it, catching the bug a glancing blow and sending it tumbling away an inch or so.

Naruto winced from the blow as his whole body felt as though a mountain had rammed into him like a runaway train and with a series of earth-vibrating booms, the blond looked at his new owner and saw he was right before her massive feet, Naruto paled in fear as Kurotsuchi's massive feet shift, her toes twiching scarily.

"Ick, disgusting pest..." Kurotsuchi said, and then grins. "Go ahead and beg...maybe I'll show you mercy..." she teases, and then slowly lifts perfect foot into the air, and points her big toe down. She places it near the bug and begins to drag her toe towards him. "Look out, the giant comes! Uh-oh, you're in trouble now, you little speck..." she says.

The massive unpainted toe slams into the ground and begins to drag towards him. Naruto began to run away, only to suddenly be stopped by the massive toe, which had raised into the air and blocked them. "WHERE ARE YOU GOING, HUH? THOUGHT YOU COULD ESCAPE THE WRATH OF GOD?" Kurotsuchi thunders from above. The toe playfully and gently bats Naruto to the ground, and then hovers above him.

"LOOKS LIKE THE END...." Kurotsuchi says in a teasing voice and lowers the toe slowly, "ARE YOU GONNA RUN?" She laughs cruelly, but still sounds playful. Naruto's insides churned to know she's stimply toying with him as if he were just a bug, amusing herself, but he was in serious danger. Just as the toe is about to squash him, it lifts away suddenly. Naruto looked around in time to see Kurotsuchi's massive foot close in on him with a boom.

However, he realised he was in a canyon between her big and second toe, and see her grinning down at them and her game.

"HEH. I PUT MY FOOT DOWN AND SUDDENLY IT'S A WHOLE NEW WORLD FOR YOU, LITTLE MITE. UH OH...LOOKS LIKE A DEATH TRAP..." she says in a sing-song voice and starts to slowly close her toes around him. However, just as suddenly, Kurotsuchi stopped bringing her toes togeather, meaning Naruto wasn't going to be crushed between them. "HAH...FOOLED YOU...."

Kurotsuchi kicked out and the speck that was her bug-sized slave flew out and smashed into the wall and slid down it. Seeing that, Kurotsuchi hoped he was alright, this was just schooling. That was when she thought of something and went to her drawer and pulled out her favorite pair of black socks and put them on and marched over to Naruto before her foot hung over him like a guillotine's blade.

Naruto gazed at the monolithic shadow casted by Kurotsuchi's foot. The foot was as big as a building and, judging by the dirty lint balls and yellowish sweat stains covering the black tabi sock, it was safe to assume that Kurotsuchi had worn these socks for a while without washing them.

*Thump*

Almost instantly, Naruto felt a immense amount of pressure on top of his body. He felt the moist, sweaty fibers of Kurotsuchi's sock. Naruto also noticed the cheesy smell that the sock was emitting as it crushed him. It was far too heavy to resist against. As much as he tried, the sock had completely conquered him. To Kurotsuchi, it wasn't even like stepping on a bug. At least stepping on bug, one feels the bug being crushed. Naruto was much smaller than that. Stepping on him was like just walking on dirt.

As Kurotsuchi lifted her foot again, Naruto noticed that he was leaving the ground with it. He was stuck to Kurotsuchi's socked sole, like a piece of dirt. As Kurotsuchi was walking around, she was stepping all over a poor, speck-sized Naruto. Finally, after being stepping on for what felt like an eternity, Naruto finally saw a light: Kurotsuchi was sitting down on her bed. "Finally, now I need to get off of this sock." The putrid fumes of the sock were starting to get to Naruto so he wanted off as so as he could. He tried as hard as he could to get unstuck to the smelly sock but to no avail. And to Naruto's horror, he saw Kurotsuchi's other foot getting closer to her.

"Noooooooooooooooooooo", he yelled at the top of his lungs, as the colossal foot came in contact. Kurotsuchi, who ignored the tiny shriek and was just casually itching her feet, was sandwiching Naruto in between them. Naruto was completely surrounded by smelly, ebony-dyed sock fibers. The thick, cheesy smell of Kurotsuchi's socks were extremely powerful, and they were rubbing the smell all over his miniscule body. Kurotsuchi stopped rubbing her feet together, but, seeing how comfortable she was now, she keep them together. Naruto once again tried to wiggle free as hard as he could.

This time, he became free. He began rolling down the socked sole until he stopped at the toes. As he glanced up, he felt saying Kurotsuchi was the size of a skyscraper would have been a major understatement. She was monolithic. A colossal goddess like her would've never noticed Naruto on her sock. To her, Naruto was just a tiny piece of lint. Naruto scrambled to his feet and noticed that the smell was worse. Kurotsuchi's socked toes were emitting the most stink out of all the places on her foot. Naruto began to climb Kurotsuchi's big toe, which was as big as a skyscraper in and of itself. Luckily, as disgusting as they smelled, the socked fibers were a good way to climb.

"SO..." Kurotsuchi's voice boomed and Naruto looked up and his blood froze solid at he saw Kurotsuchi's eyes were locked onto him as if nothing else in the world existed except the two of them "...NOW THAT YOU'VE BEEN PROPERLY EDUCATED IN WHAT I'LL DO TO YOU IF YOU EVER TRY ESCAPING ME, BUGGY-BOY, I TAKE IT YOU UNDERSTAND YOUR POSITION: YOU'RE MINE. RUNNING AWAY WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED NOR SAFE FOR YOU. FURTHER MORE, YOU'LL BE STAYING THAT SIZE FROM NOW ON, UNDERSTAND?"

Naruto nodded meakly, this was all to teach him to stay with the TsuichiKage's granddaughter? He shivered, if this was the demo, he didn't want the real thing.

Kurotsuchi beamed at him and snatched him off her sock "Now then..."

1212212121221112211222112222.content:
Hmmm...I think you'd make a good pair of insoles." Kurotsuchi said with a smirk and pressed her hand on Naruto's forehead.

"Uh..what're you...?" Naruto asked, feeling her chakra flow into him.

"Gramps dosen't know it yet, but I taught myself the Particle Style kekkei tōta. Hope you don't mind being split in two!"

Naruto paled "WHAT?! "SPLIT IN TWO"! NO WAY!!!"

Kurotsuchi shrugged. "Relax...it won't kill you. I'm just suing the Fission Jutsu on you. This technique allowed Mū, the Tsuchikage before Gramps took over, to literally split his own body into two identical yet entirely independent duplicates of himself. Unlike Clone Techniques that only appear to be similar, the ability is instead a physical separation and so does not require hand seals to activate, making it faster in comparison as a result. This also means that even if one is incapacitated, the other remains completely unaffected and as neither can truly be regarded as the original, the duplicates cannot be dispelled like normal clones. However, while split, Mū's power is halved and as such he is unable to use more complex techniques...not that YOU'LL need to worry about that last part!"

Naruto felt tears well up in his eyes as the Fission Jutsu started to take hold, He felt every cell split in two and frocefully become an entierly seprate being in a matter of seconds, before there was a second Naruto Uzumaki laying next to him before Kurotsuchi, who was already making handsighns.

As soon as the last one was formed by her entwining fingers, Naruto suddenly felt very dizzy as a cold wave of energy washed over him. He felt his arms and legs join together with his chest and his body begin to compress and flatten. The room felt like it was growing around him. He tried to scream but realized that he no longer had a mouth.

Looking up, he saw Kurotsuchi’s giant face smiling down at him. “Instead of making you my smelly old insoles, I decided to make you a brand new pair just so I can have the pleasure of breaking you in. I even let you keep your senses of smeel and tastre...I'm so nice!” she cooed. "I even made it so you can communicate with me telepathically and no matter what, I'M the only one that can hear you!"

She reached down and picked the right insole up and slid him into place before doing the same with the left one, then she licked her lips as she slowly brought her foot into one sandal than the other and bounced on her heels and the balls of her feet and brummed her toes against him with a sigh of sheer bliss at how comfrtable he was as her insoles.

[Why're you doing this?!] Naruto's paniced voice shouted within the confinds of the skull of the Tsuchikage's granddaughter.

At that she scowled suddenly. "I feel. That this entire situation is unfair. I am hands down the greatest Kunoichi in all of Iwa at the moment and now I am going to be reduced to a mere trading piece for a Grand alliance? To be some miniscule housewife? Stuck doing dishes and merely cleaning, not being able to show the nation just what I can do and my abilities in the field! This is an OUTRAGE!" yelled Kurotsuchi

[Wait...you me...we're...?] he was stunned. Being turned into insoles was bad enough, but being turned into his WIFE-TO-BE'S INSOLES?! That was insane!

"YES! You're my groom...It was part of a treaty that ended the war between Konoha and Iwa...For my entire life my plan was to be the best. To grow up and be the next Tsuchikage in the village. I was well on my way to attaining that goal and now…now I'm stuck to be someone's wife. To carry their seed and die, I don't want to…" Kurotsuchi's sob story was cut off as Naruto's voice rang through her head.

[Stop it. You're not thinking with your head, you're just putting the worst thoughts in your head and its not healthy for you. First off, You can still be Kage. This shouldn't stop you. Secondly, Have you ever thought that it is an honor to be the one thing that signified the alliance. Without you, your village would not be able to fully fulfill the treaty. And more importantly, who in their right mind would limit you to a mere housewife? You can fly and blow up things, spit lava and manipulate water, fire, and earth...heck...you taught yourself how to use the Particle Style kekkei tōta for crying out loud! I'd have you in the front line of everything with the strength you have.]

Kurotsuchi stopped and thought about that, and looked down at her feet...down at her new insoles...down at him with a straight face before giggling.

"You're sweet." she said with a smile, curling her toes into him. Maybe this won't be as bad as she thought. "But sweetie or not, I'm not going to turn you back and undo the fission jutsu I cast on you YET! If I change you back, you'll just run away from me...can't have that now can I?"

Naruto's whimper sounded through her mind and she laighed "Aww...don't be that way, Underling...You'll learn to love belonging to me. Now...how should we kick-start your new life as my insoles?"

[WHAT?! NO! PLEASE NO!]

She smiled at his fear, savoring it. "You know...I wonder how you'd hold up as my insoles on a mission...or I could walk around the village with you as my insoles...consider it a tour...but I suppose it'd be more like torture to you." she gave a false sigh of distress, "Choices...choices...choices."

Naruto would have been sweating blood if he could. The last thing he wanted was for Kurotsuchi to wear him as her insoles while she went all around Earth Country from border to border..that would be horrorible! Yet the idea of her sweating on a mission...building up a thick amout of body oder... how he'd have to absorbe all her foot-sweat, suck in all her feets' stink, getting covered in lint and dirt...

Yeah...not a snowball's chance in hell he wanted her to do a mission either.

In the end, however, it wasn't his choice to make...that honnor belonged to the tomboyish beauty whose soles were currently pressing into him.

The unreadable expression transformed into a happy and relieved smile as Naruto continued kissing her feet.

"You're really staying?" Sakura asked.

Sakura's smile turned into a large grin. "Really?"

"Yes. I love your feet Sakura."

"That's mistress to you slave." Sakura said with a sexy smile, which got a smile out of Naruto as well. In the back of his mind he was cursing himself for submitting again. Naruto couldn't believe his ears. Maybe his words actually opened Sakura's eyes or something...

Naruto gave each of Sakura's feet a grateful kiss.

A now nicely dressed knocked on the door to Sakura's house. A small part of him was absolutely disgusted with himself for crawling back to Sakura. He knew that any sane, self-respecting person would consider what Sakura did to him as unforgivable. But Naruto could not NOT forgive Sakura. He loved her too much to stay angry at her. And that small part of himself was disgusted with that love.

Not liking where his thoughts were going, Naruto reflected on how surprised he was that Sakura was actually going on a date with him...for real this time. But that small part of Naruto wouldn't leave him be. That small part of Naruto suspected this was another trap Sakura was luring him into. Just a few hours ago she did attempt to strip him of his hopes and dreams...

Naruto gulped. Now that he was standing here at her door, that small untrusting part of himself wa making more and more sense. Sakura's mocking smile and laughter suddenly passed through Naruto's mind. That was not the smile or laugh of someone who cared about him.

"Shit...why am I just now catching on to this..." Naruto swore under his breath. He had no idea what Sakura had planned, but he didn't want to find out. His heart may have screamed for him to crawl back to Sakura, but his brain really didn't want to fall into another trap. And for once in his life, Naruto's brain beat his heart.

He turned around and prepared to sprint out of the village. He coiled his legs to take off just as he heard the door open.

"Shit!" Naruto swore.

1212212121221112212121.content:
"Naruto?"

Sakura's beautiful and slightly confused voice stopped Naruto dead in his tracks. His brain was screaming at his body to run before it's too late, but his stubborn heart had taken over and was refusing to move an inch.

"Were you just about to run away?" Sakura asked in a disappointed voice.

"I..."

"So you were... you don't want to go on a date with me?" Sakura asked sadly.

"I don't want to fall into another one of your traps." Naruto replied honestly. "I just can't take it again."

Sakura blinked in surprise and then frowned. "I suppose you have plenty of reasons not to trust me... I'm sorry about that. But... this isn't a trap Naruto. I want to go on a date with you. No tricks, just you and me."

"I want to believe you Sakura...but everytime I try to all I see is that look you had on your face after you enslaved me, and all I hear is that mocking laughter when Tsunade was basically calling me worthless."

Sakura's frown deepened. "That's understandable I guess. Fine, we won't go on a date, just please don't leave the village? Even if I can't be with you, not ever being able to see you would be awful."

Naruto turned around and looked closely at Sakura. She generally did look sad, and there were tears gathering at the edges of her eyes. Naruto knew what he wanted to say, and his brain was screaming at him to keep his mouth shut. Despite his brain's protests Naruto's mouth opened anyways.

"Ok."

Sakura smiled sadly at him. "Good, I'm so relieved you're staying."

"Ok." Naruto repeated.

"Ok what?"

"Ok, I'll go on a date with you."

"But I thought you couldn't trust me?"

"I'm going to, just please don't betray my trust again. I won't be able to handle it."

Sakura's eyes widened and a happy smile overtook her face. She rushed forward and wrapped Naruto in a tight embrace.

"Thank you. You won't regret this." Sakura whispered. "Now come in with me, there's a few things I want to show you before we go."

Naruto gulped. That sounded like last time. She told him she'd go on a date with him, then after he got excited she told him he had to sign the contract...

Sakura noticed his hesitation and smiled at him. "Don't worry, you'll like this."

Again, Naruto nodded his head.

"As you said, I enslaved you fair and square, so I will expect you to obey me without question and without complaint."

Naruto again nodded his head.

"Your life will now be lived underneath my feet as I will be using you mostly as my personal foot slave. You will be kissing and licking them, and you will be serving as my punching bag for me to stomp my frustrations out on after a rough day." Sakura continued explaining.

Naruto raised his hand.

"What?" Sakura growled fully expecting Naruto to protest.

"Will I only be serving you Mistress?"

Sakura looked at Naruto thoughtfully. She had originally planned on parading Naruto in front of the entire village and humiliating him and letting all of her other kunoichi friends use Naruto as their foot slaves as well. But after how easily he submitted to her, she found herself thinking about just keeping him to herself because that might be a little less humiliating for him.

"What would you prefer slave?" Sakura asked.

"What does it matter what I would prefer?" Naruto asked in confusion. Sakura slammed her barefoot into Naruto's face and pushed him to the ground.

"I told you to obey me without question. It sounded like you were questioning me. Now answer my question." Sakura growled.

"Sorry Mistress. To answer your question, I would rather..."
12122122.title: Naruto submits...Sakura feels...guilty?

choices: It's Ino and she's wondering how Sakura's plan is going so far
It's Hinata, and she heard about Sakura's plan and is here to stop it
121221221.content:
"I would rather only serve you. You're the only woman I will ever..." Naruto's eyes widened as he realized what he almost just said. He couldn't let Sakura know just how deep his feelings for her went. He had backed off her since returning from his training trip with Jiraiya.He still pestered her for a date from time to time, but he didn't want to make her uncomfortable so he decided that she would never know he loved her...Unless it looked like she might have some sort of feelings for him.

Naruto snorted at the thought. There's no way Sakura could ever have feelings for him. Any possibility of that ever happening flew out the window when she used his feelings for her to enslave him.

"I'm the only woman you will ever what Naruto?" Sakura asked. After everything I've done to him, there's no way he could still love me... Sakura thought to herself.

"You're the only woman I will ever..." Crap crap crap! Naruto swore to himself. I can't let Sakura know how I really feel. Quick Naruto, come up with another word! "Sign a contract giving you my freedom?" Naruto tried lamely.

Sakura growled and pushed down on Naruto's face, her smelly foot was overpowering Naruto's senses.

"That's true, but that's not what you were going to say. Don't make me punish you already Naruto." Sakura warned.

"you'retheonlywomanIwilleverlove." Naruto mumbled quietly and quickly. His mumbled reply only caused his mistress to press even harder down on his face. It was starting to hurt now...

"Say it clearly." Sakura commanded. "And if you try to get out of telling me what you were going to say one more time... I swear to god Naruto..." Sakura left her threat hanging, and smirked in satisfaction as she saw her slave gulp in fear.

"You're the only woman I will ever love damnit." Naruto finally relented. "Happy?"

Sakura lifted her foot from Naruto's face and gave him a smile.

"See, that wasn't so hard was it?" How the hell can he still love me?? Sakura screamed inside of her mind. But she didn't want Naruto to see how surprised she was, so she kept smiling down at him instead.

Of course... she just completely ignores my feelings... Naruto thought sullenly to himself. But he put a fake smile on his face and returned Sakura's smile.

"I guess not Sakura."

Sakura smirked and started reading over the contract she tricked Naruto into signing. The contract did state that Naruto had to obey any command any woman gave to him as well... But he only wanted to be her slave. Sakura smiled as her eyes picked up the clause she had added at the last second just for the hell of it.

"If Ms.Haruno decides she wants Mr.Uzumaki completely to herself, then she may put two brands on him, one on his forehead and one on his chest, both permanently marking him as her property." Sakura read.

Naruto looked up at Sakura with curious eyes.

"Stand up Naruto." Sakura ordered. Naruto promptly obeyed and Sakura found herself looking upwards to look into his eyes. Sakura pressed her hand against Naruto's forehead.

"This is going to sting a little." Sakura used her chakra to start burning a brand onto Naruto's forehead. He yelped in pain as her chakra seared his skin. She withdrew her hand with a satisfied smile as she looked at Naruto's forehead. There was now a cherry blossom forever imprinted on his forehead with the word "slave" right below it.

Sakura ripped Naruto's shirt off his body, and placed her hand on his chest. Naruto looked at her fearfully, afraid of the pain that was sure to be coming. Sakura offered him a smile before pushing chakra into his chest. Again, Naruto screamed out in agony as she branded him. She stepped back to admire her handiwork.

"Property of Sakura Haruno" was branded into his chest. Naruto was breathing heavily as he tried to recover from the intense pain he had experienced. He had no idea what Sakura just did, he just knew it hurt like hell.

"There. Go look at yourself in the mirror slave."

Naruto turned and gasped when he saw his reflection. The word slave was branded across his forehead, and his chest alerted the world that he was Sakura's property. His eyes widened as what Sakura had read earlier played in his mind.

"You...marked me?"

"Duh idiot."

"...Why?"

Sakura smiled at Naruto and patted his head as if he were a dog.

"Because I don't want anyone else being able to play with my pet."

A knock on Sakura's door prevented Naruto from replying.
121221221.title: Only serve you

choices: Bring it on (Naruto is Sakura's!)
Fine, take him (Naruto is Hinata's!)
1212212212.content:
Sakura opened her door and blinked in surprise when Hinata barged into her room with an angry expression on her face. Truthfully, Sakura expected her visitor to be Ino. She had told Ino of her plan for Naruto and Ino wanted to help Sakura torture Naruto with her feet.

"Hinata?" Sakura asked.

Hinata's eyes landed on Naruto's forehead and she turned around and gave Sakura a dark glare.

"You fucking bitch!"

Sakura's eyes were as wide as saucers. Hinata was notorious for being quiet and soft spoken. She never once expected to hear those words come out of Hinata's mouth, much less directed at her.

"I heard what you planned on doing to Naruto from Ino. I tried to get over here to stop you, but it looks like I was too late." Hinata seethed.

"I eh..." Sakura started awkwardly.

"Haven't you fucked with Naruto enough Sakura? God. You broke his heart daily when we were kids, then you had the GALL to lock him into that stupid promise of a lifetime...which has almost gotten him killed on MULTIPLE occasions. Now this? Now you have to strip his freedom? When all he has ever wanted to do was make you happy?"

"Hinata you..."

"SHUT THE FUCK UP SAKURA!" Hinata roared furiously. "You may have never wanted Naruto, but I always saw him for what he is- a truly great and special man. I've been in love with him for so long, but I've kept my distance because I knew he loved you, and I knew he would be happiest if he could somehow get you to return his love. So I waited, I waited for him to really try to win your heart..."

"Hinata just let me..."

"But you didn't give him your heart, no. You just fucking stripped him of his freedom and humanity."

"Will you just let me..."

"I'm going to give you a choice Sakura." Hinata interrupted coldly. "You give Naruto to someone who actually cares about him...me. Or I beat the living shit out of you and forcefully take Naruto."

Sakura just gaped at Hinata. She noticed that Naruto was doing the exact same thing. She opened her mouth to offer her reply.
1212212212.title: Hinata yells at Sakura

choices: Sakura Wins
Hinata Wins
12122122121.content:
Suddenly something in Sakura snapped. She really didn't like getting yelled at,and she certainly hated being threatened.

"Bring it on..." Sakura growled. She was going to teach Hinata a lesson.

Hinata smirked. Sakura was pissed, she would be easy to beat now. "Why don't we make this interesting whore?"

Sakura clenched her fists so tightly that she broke her own skin.

"What did you have in mind?" Sakura growled between clenched teeth.

"In addition to fighting for ownership, we're fighting for ownership of each other." Hinata explained. After everything Sakura had done to the man she loved, Hinata wanted to own her just so Hinata wouldn't get in any kind of trouble for the sick and twisted things she planned on doing to the pink-haired girl.

Sakura on the other hand saw the usefulness of having a Hyuga for a slave. She would never have to work again, and she could spend all of her free time dominating Naruto with her feet.

"Deal you stammering cunt." Sakura spat. Hinata growled at the insult and activated her twin lion fists. She charged at Sakura, but to her surprise Naruto flickered in front of her with a rasengan in his hand.

"Naruto?" Hinata questioned.

"Hinata, thank you for looking out for me. But I've made my decision to be Sakura's slave, it isn't her fault. Leave her alone."

Both Hinata and Sakura gawked at Naruto in shock.

Hinata's made it blatantly obvious how much she cares about Naruto... Surely he realizes that she wouldn't treat him as a slave... Yet here he is defending me? He has a chance to escape being my slave...but he's not taking it.

"Naruto-kun, this isn't right." Hinata replied. "I'm sorry, but you don't deserve this. I won't stand by and do nothing."

Sakura was touched that Naruto was defending her, but she really wanted to enslave Hinata now. First, Hinata had called her some particularly nasty things, second Sakura really wanted to have access to the wealth that a Hyuga slave would provide.

"Stay out of this slave." Sakura commanded. Naruto looked back at Sakura with a surprised expression.

"Sakura I know you're strong, but Hinata's a bad matchup for you. You rely on close-range combat when you really need long-range combat to defeat the gentle fists."

"You know Naruto... for a slave you really suck at obeying me. I think after this is over I'm going to have to stomp obedience into your skull." Sakura sighed. "Now get out of the way."

"But..."

"Your punishment just got worse." Sakura announced as Naruto again tried to question her. She saw him give her another concerned look and she smiled softly at him.

"Believe in me." Naruto nodded and stepped aside allowing his rasengan to dissipate.

"Alright Hinata, let's do this. Winner owns the loser and Naruto."
12122122121.title: Naruto Tries to Stop the Fight

choices: A deal's a deal... (Hinata becomes Sakura's slave)
Hinata refuses- there was nothing legally binding about their fight!
121221221211.content:
Hinata leaped forward intending on finishing the fight quickly by cutting off Sakura's pressure points so she can't access her chakra but Sakura easily dodges all of her strikes. Sakura smirked at the frustrated look on her face.

People always forgot that a major part of her medical ninja training with Tsunade was dodging. Tsunade had taught her to dodge every type of attack so she would be able to heal her teammates wounds. Nowadays when people looked at Sakura they just pictured her chakra-enhanced strength.

"What's the matter Hinata?" Sakura taunted. "You can't seem to hit me."

"SHUT UP!" Hinata yelled as she launched another strike at Sakura, which Sakura easily dodged.

"Man what a day." Sakura grinned as she continued dodging Naruto's strikes. "First I enslave Naruto, and now I'm going to enslave you!"

Hinata growled and continued throwing punch after punch at Sakura. Sakura pulled out a contract similar to the one Naruto signed while she dodged Hinata's strikes and began filling in Hinata's name under the slave sections. Once she had finished altering the contract to make Hinata her slave once signed, Sakura waved it in the Hyuga Princess' face.

"You're going to be signing this soon Hinata." Sakura taunted.

Hinata was absolutely furious that Sakura wasn't taking her seriously. She was a Hyuga damnit! Hinata was going to beat the shit out of Sakura, enslave her, then shove her foot down Sakura's throat. Distracted by what she planned on doing to Sakura after she beat her, Hinata didn't notice that Sakura was luring her to a corner.

Her pale eyes widened in surprise as Sakura flipped over her head. Hinata was now backed up into a corner. She had no room to dodge, and could do nothing as Sakura's powerful chakra-enhanced fist connected with the top of her head. Hinata blacked out to Sakura's taunting.
------------------------
10 minutes later
------------------------

Hinata blearily opened her eyes. The first thing she noticed was Naruto on his hands and knees kissing Sakura's foot. Her blood boiled at the picture, but her body was far too sore to do anything about it.

"Looks like my new slave is awake." Sakura said in a cruel tone. "You can stop kissing my foot for now Naruto." Naruto complied and backed away. Sakura walked up to Hinata and thrust the contract into her face.

"Sign this in your blood bitch. We had an agreement."

Hinata stared at the contract.
121221221211.title: Sakura Wins

choices: Sakura and Naruto make it to the Hokage Tower without any interruptions
Ino stops them on the way, she wants to humiliate Naruto
1212212212112.content:
"I'm not signing that." Hinata replied stubbornly.

"Our agreement before our fight was that winner gained ownership of Naruto AND the loser. You're the loser, I'm the winner. By our agreement, you have to become my slave now." Sakura replied with a smug smirk.

"We didn't sign anything." Hinata shot back.

"Actually, what we did was called an oral contract, and Naruto here is a witness to validate the contract."

"Hyugas aren't slaves. I didn't sign anything, and I'm not going to."

"Sign the damn contract Hinata, you don't want to piss your master off." Sakura warned. Of course... it's not like her signing the contract or not would save her, Sakura was already pissed at her for what she called her. She was going to humiliate Hinata in front of the entire village.

"I'm leaving." Hinata replied. "I'll let you keep Naruto...for now."

"I'm just going to go to the Hokage. Signing this contract now will save your family a lot of face." Sakura warned. She really didn't want to hurt the Hyuga clan, she had never had a beef with any of them. She just wanted to make Hinata regret being born. Sending the ANBU to the Hyuga estate to drag Hinata to the Hokage's office so she could sign her life over to Sakura would not look good in the public eye for the whole Hyuga clan. It would look like they were offering asylum to Hianta.

"There's nothing the Hokage can do." Hinata replied as she crossed her arms across her massive chest. She gave Sakura one last glare before stomping out of Sakura's house.

Sakura sighed and walked into her closet. She began digging around until she found an orange piece of cloth and a black men's tank top that she had worn for Halloween a year earlier.

"Here." Sakura said as she tossed the cloth and tank top to Naruto. "We're going to the Hokage's office."

Naruto stared at Sakura with a confused expression. "You want me to go with you Mistress?"

Sakura rolled her eyes. "What did I tell you about questioning me? You're just going to regret it more later if you keep doing it."

"But..."

"As I told Hinata, you're the witness that will validate the oral contract Hinata and I have."

"Oh, so you're giving me this ribbon and shirt so I can hide the fact that I'm your slave so no one accuses me of being biased?"

Sakura smiled at Naruto. Despite what everyone said, he really was smarter than people gave him credit for.

"No, I don't plan on hiding the fact that you're my slave at all. I just figured you would rather have your brands covered when we go out in public."

"...Huh?" Naruto had been hoping to put his question a little bit more intelligently, but he was too surprised to do so. He just couldn't get a handle on Sakura. One minute she's taking advantage of his feelings to enslave him, the next she's thinking about his comfort?

"If you would rather broadcast to all of our friends that I own you now then I won't force you to wear that. But I thought that I would give you the option."

"But...I thought you were going to punish me for questioning you?"

Sakura smiled brightly at Naruto. "Oh I am. And by the way, you just questioned me again. You know what that means..."

Naruto groaned and pulled on the black tank top. It was a little snug, but it fit. A little of the brand on his chest was still noticeable, but not enough for any words to be made out. It just looked like he had some kind of cool tattoo. Next, Naruto the orange piece of cloth around his head much like he would his forehead protector.

Sakura had to admit, Naruto didn't look too bad in his new outfit.

"Alright let's go." Sakura said. She stopped as her hand touched the door and looked over her shoulder at her slave.

"Oh and Naruto, you may call me Sakura when we're in public if you prefer."

"Ok, thank you Mistress."

"You're welcome slave." Sakura opened the door and, with Naruto in tow, started walking towards the Hokage's office.
1212212212112.title: Hinata Refuses Despite the Oral Contract

choices: Naruto leaves- Tsunade has a "chat" with Sakura
Naruto refuses to leave and Tsunade punishes both him and Sakura
12122122121121.content:
"So that's what happened Hokage-sama." Sakura said as she finished explaining everything that happened to Tsunade. Sakura and Naruto had made it to the Tower without any interruption, and for once, Sakura decided to take a page out of Naruto's book and march straight into the Hokage's office.

"I see..." Tsunade said neutrally. "Naruto, will you please step outside for a minute?"

Shit... Sakura swore in her mind. She knew how much Tsunade cared about Naruto, and if the Hokage was sending Naruto out of the room it could only be to yell at her for what she did to the poor boy.

"I'd rather not Baa-chan." Naruto replied. He saw the angry expression on Tsunade's face when Sakura explained how she got Naruto to sign the contract to become her slave. It had only flashed briefly before Tsunade buried it, but Naruto didn't miss the anger. Nor did he miss the way Tsunade's fist clench when Sakura talked about branding Naruto and how Tsunade's gaze rested on his covered forehead just a few seconds too long. Tsunade was going to yell at Sakura, but he couldn't allow that.

"I see I didn't make myself very clear. Naruto as the Hokage of this village I order you to step outside of this office so I may speak with Sakura alone. I don't have the patience to deal with your stubbornness right now, so if you don't obey, I won't just punish you, but I'll also punish Sakura." Tsunade warned.

"It's ok Naruto." Sakura assured.
12122122121121.title: Tsunade Wants a Word Alone With Sakura

choices: Seeing a crying Sakura, Naruto has a "chat" of his own with Tsunade
Sakura tries to hide her tears from Naruto and quickly returns home
121221221211211.content:
A grumbling Naruto exited the office and Tsunade quickly activated a seal that would prevent any sound from exiting the office.

"What the fuck do you think you are doing?" Tsunade growled as soon as the seal was activated.

"Hokage..."

"No. You aren't going to speak right now Sakura. You're going to listen. There is only one reason I'm here right now as the Hokage, and not off wandering the world depressed and gambling money away, and you just stripped him of his humanity. Naruto is such a sweet kid, you knew he had feelings for you, and yet you used his feelings to lure him into a trap and then take his freedom away from him?"

Tsunade's fist was clenched tightly together. "You destroyed his dreams, I'm sure you broke his heart even though he won't show it...And why? Because he cared enough about you to continue to ask you on dates? Because he cared enough about you to make sure you were always alright? Because he cared enough about you that he would do anything to distract you if he thought you were down, even if it meant you were going to pummel him into the ground."

"Tsunade..."

"I said you don't get to talk." Tsunade seethed. "Naruto was next in line for Hokage. I was actually going to give him the job at the end of this year. I had been waiting for him to turn 18 before I gave him the job, then I decided to give it to him as a Christmas present."

"You still can, the village doesn't have to know that I...

"A SLAVE CAN'T BE A HOKAGE SAKURA!" Tsunade bellowed. "All of his life, he's talked about how he was going to be Hokage someday, and now he's not going to get to do that, even though he's earned it. I am so disgusted to call you my apprentice right now..."

Sakura felt tears pooling in the corners of her eyes as the woman who trained her to be strong laid into her.

"I'll let him go. I'll restore his freedom." Sakura said meekly.

"You can't do that anymore." Tsunade growled angrily. "You had to go and fucking brand him. He is your slave forever now, there's no going back for either of you."

Sakura's eyes widened in surprise. She never realized that the branding was permanent.

"But...I branded him so he would only ever have to serve me. I didn't want him to be embarrassed further by having to serve other kunoichi."

"Whatever." Tsunade huffed. "As for the Hinata Hyuga situation, she does have an obligation to become your slave, and I shall have ANBU drag her over to your house to sign the contract tonight. Now get out of my sight and don't come to me anymore for training or advice. I'm disowning you. No apprentice of mine would ever do what you did to someone like Naruto."

Tears trickled down Sakura's face.

"But Tsunade-sama..."

"I said get out of my sight Haruno." Tsunade replied coldly.

A crying Sakura turned and left the office.
121221221211211.title: Tsunade Yells at and Disowns Sakura

choices: Sakura heard the entire conversation!
Naruto and Sakura quickly get home
1212212212112111.content:
Sakura's vision was blurred so she couldn't really see where she was going, and wasn't sure what exactly she bumped into, nor did she care. She just wanted to get home.

"Sakura..." A concerned voice called. She looked up into the gentle sapphire eyes of her slave. "Wait here. I need to talk with Tsunade." Naruto said quietly.

Sakura thought about telling him he didn't get to tell her what to do, but when she saw the expression set on his face, she knew there was no point. Slave or not, when Naruto got that determined expression on his face, absolutely nothing would stop him from accomplishing what he wanted to do.

Naruto opened the door to the Hokage's office and quickly shut it and put a seal of his own on it to prevent Sakura from hearing what he was going to say.

"Sakura I already told you..."

"I'm not Sakura Baa-Chan." Naruto replied coldly. "You might want to update the sound dampening seal you have in place for this office, any seal master can easily get around it and listen in on a conversation you don't want them listening in on."

"So...you heard me yelling at Sakura eh?" Tsunade asked.

"I also heard you disown her."

"I don't want to be associated with someone like her Naruto. You and I both know that what she did was way over the line. She ruined you."

"I'm not going to lie... I'm not sure if my heart will ever recover from her betrayal today. I would rather re-live every painful birthday where I was beaten within an inch of my life during my childhood than ever live through today again..."

Tsunade gripped her desk so tightly that her fingers snapped clean through the wood.

"But you can't be angry at her. I pushed her to this..."

"YOU PUSHED HER TO THIS?!" Tsunade yelled. "HOW THE HELL DID YOU PUSH HER TO THIS?"

"I don't know." Naruto admitted. "But I know Sakura, she's not a bad person. I must've..."

"You always put all the blame on your shoulders Naruto." Tsunde sighed. "Even though it rarely ever should fall on them."

Naruto grinned. "I was born to be a scapegoat. With the Kyubi sealed in me, I accepted the villagers hatred for the Kyubi, I accepted the blame and punishment for the demon's sins."

"That's stupid!"

"And...there's something very important that you're overlooking Baa-chan. As the container of a demon, I'm not meant to be happy. I exist to absorb pain and suffering so others don't have to. I'm not supposed to be happy, and there was never going to be a happily ever after for me."

"But..."

"But at least this way I get to be with Sakura while I walk my miserable path. Sure not in the way I would choose if I could, but I'd spend a lot of time with her as her slave than not spend time with her at all. If I'm going to be unhappy for the rest of my life, I can at least help to make sure Sakura is happy."

"Tsunade, don't disown Sakura. I love her, I love her with all of my heart and all of my soul. You disowning her will hurt very badly. You trained her, you're the one who gave her the confidence not to feel like she was a burden. Without your presence in her life she would get scared, she would get sad...I can't let that happen."

"God you're a pain in the ass Naruto." Tsunade sighed. "Fine, I won't disown her. But I'm still too pissed at her to talk to her right now. I'll send a message when I think I can talk to her without beating the shit out of her.

"Fair enough. See you Baa-chan."

"Goodbye brat..."

"THIS IS RIDICULOUS!" Tsunade bellowed.
1212212212112111.title: Seeing a crying Sakura, Naruto has a "chat&...

choices: Are to tell me the truth (Sakura's not done questoning Naruto)
Are to massage my feet
12122122121121111.content:
Naruto opened the door to see a wide-eyed Sakura staring at him with tears in her pretty eyes.

She couldn't have possibly heard that... Naruto was sure his seal was perfect, and while Sakura wasn't terrible with seals, she certainly wasn't a seal master.

"Na...Naruto..." Sakura choked out.

Shit! Naruto could see that Sakura was about to break down and cry, so he grabbed her and used the teleportation jutsu to teleport back to her apartment so she wouldn't have to break down in public.

"Naruto..." Sakura started quietly. Naruto didn't want Sakura to hear what he had to say to Tsunade because he knew she would feel bad for what she did. And even though she trampled his feelings, Naruto Uzumaki would do everything in his power to ensure that Sakura Haruno was happy.

"What shall I do now Mistress?" Naruto asked with a bright smile, hoping to distract Sakura.

"I heard everything that you said to Tsuande-sama." Sakura said, ignoring Naruto's attempt at distracting her.

"Oh? So you know I just had a conversation with her about shifting my funds to your bank accounts then huh?"

"Why are you still trying to protect me...Why don't you hate me?" Sakura asked, ignoring Naruto's attempt at a lie.

"I don't know what you're talking about Mistress." Naruto replied as he forced a "confused" look on his face. Sakura flashed him an angry scowl and punched him in the gut.

"STOP LYING TO ME!" Sakura yelled. Naruto was keeled over and gasping for air from Sakura's punch, it had really taken the wind out of him.

**author's note- for this storyline Sakura never found out about the Kyubi**

"I'm not lying Mistress." Naruto lied. He needed to convince Sakura that what she thought she heard was a trick. Tsunade said it herself, there was no going back for either of them now. Naruto was Sakura's slave until the end of time. Naruto couldn't let Sakura feel guilty about enslaving him, he needed to make her look at him as nothing more than a slave. She would be happier that way.

"YES YOU ARE!" Sakura roared as kicked Naruto upside the head sending him sprawling to the floor. Before he could move, Sakura rolled him over and pressed her sandal-clad foot down tightly against his face. "Just fucking tell me the truth already Naruto! WHY DON'T YOU HATE ME FOR WHAT I DID TO YOU?"

"I could never hate you Sakura-chan..." Naruto sighed. He didn't think that if Sakura killed him now she would feel any better, and if he kept on refusing to answer her, then she would probably end up taking his life in her rage.

"Why... I tore your fucking heart out. Why can't you hate me?"

Sakura could see a small smile tug at the corners of Naruto's mouth. "Because you're Sakura. That's why."

"THAT'S NOT AN ANSWER!" Sakura yelled as she pressed her foot harder into Naruto's face.

"Yet that is my honest answer Sakura."

Sakura's eyes softened and she let up on the pressure she was applying on Naruto's face, but she didn't remove her foot.

She stared down at him as he laid perfectly still beneath her foot.

"I don't get you Naruto..." Sakura finally said as she lifted her foot from Naruto's face. She picked him up off the ground, and placed a glowing green hand to his face to heal the damage she had done.

When she was done healing him, Naruto flashed her a foxy grin. "So we've got that all out of the way. What are your orders Mistress?"

"Your orders..." Sakura started,
12122122121121111.title: Sakura Wants to Know Why Naruto Doesn't Hate Her

choices: It's Ino and she's here to help Sakura dominate Naruto
It's some ANBU members with Hinata
121221221211211111.content:
"Your orders are to stop asking me what I want you to do. When I want you to do something, I'll tell you. I don't need you pestering me for commands, got that?"

"Um... right. Sorry Mistress."

"And for right now, call me Sakura. There's still a lot more that I want to talk about!"

"Fine Sakura..."

"When you were talking to Tsunade earlier... you mentioned that you were born to be a scapegoat because of the Kyubi... what did you mean by that? What did you mean when you called yourself the "container of the demon?"" Sakura's voice was quiet and timid as she asked her question. "You know... When I woke up this morning I was actually going to let him take me out on a date as a reward to him..."

Sakura's smile was replaced with a frown though as she thought about the morning. "But...what if he doesn't really love me? I mean...why would he put his face in Hinata's chest if he loves me? That doesn't make sense..."

Ino sighed. "I don't know Sakura. He's a guy, Hinata has giant tits. It's a natural reaction for a man."

Sakura's frown only deepened. "It shouldn't be the reaction of a man who is in love with another woman..."

I guess I can tell Sakura about Naruto this morning. I'll just have to make sure she doesn't hurt him for being sweet.

"Alright Sakura, that's enough. I'm going to tell you something now, but you have to promise me that you aren't going to punish Naruto after you hear it, ok?"

Sakura raised her eyebrow suspiciously. "I make no promises..."

"Fine." Ino huffed. She hoped this wouldn't come back to bite Naruto in the butt. "I ran into Naruto on my walk to work this morning."

"WHAT?!" Sakura roared in anger. She couldn't believe that he actually disobeyed her command. She ordered him to stay in her room. She specifically told him he wasn't to leave her room for any reason...

"Calm down Sakura, he disobeyed you for a good reason, it was actually pretty cute."

"Tell me." Sakura growled. Sakura decided that Naruto was the most frustrating man alive. One second the baka is all sweet and in love with you, then just as you start to realize your feelings for him he decides he doesn't love you, falls in love with another woman and disobeys your every order...

He was going to surprise you when you got home tonight. That sounds like something someone would do who's in love."
