121221221211211111211111211211122121.content:
Naruto looked around his apartment with a fond smile. He had never moved out of this apartment, even when he could afford a nicer one. This place had sentimental value to him. It was given to him by the kind old Third Hokage; it really was one of the few things Naruto had left to remember the old man by. He had to admit that he much rather preferred dying here, his one bastion against the hells of his childhood than in Sakura's room.

He walked into his bedroom and looked at the sheets. His bed was still unmade from when he woke up yesterday. His bed looked normal. His bed looked like everything was ok, and that he still lived here. That he was still well on his way to becoming Hokage... But his bed was deceptive, because the life that his bed showed was no longer within his reach. He walked to his bed and pulled out the kunai he kept stashed underneath his mattress.

With a rueful smile Naruto walked back out into his kitchen. He decided to have one last cup of ramen before he ended the hell that was his life. Instant ramen was no Ichiraku's, but he couldn't risk going out in public again. If Ino knew of his new status there was no telling who else she told. As far as Naruto knew, the entire village knew he was now Sakura's slave and would stop and question him.

Naruto boiled the water and waited for the ramen to cool. His eyes caught the old picture of Team 7 that he had never let go. He and Sasuke were glaring at each other, while Sakura and Kakashi were smiling. It was a good picture. He could see the happiness in his and Sasuke's eyes even though they were glaring at each other. He missed those days. He missed when he was happy and optimistic without a care in the world.

With a sad sigh Naruto began eating his ramen. As he ate, he contemplated how he was going to kill himself. Ninja training told him that slitting his throat was the most efficient way, but that just didn't seem appropriate.

As he slurped down more delicious noodles, Naruto decided that he was going to stab himself in the heart. That was the appropriate way to go. That way he would be able to see if there was still anything left in there right before he died. Naruto slurped up the last of the noodles and took a deep breath.

"This is it..." Naruto whispered. "Goodbye everyone..."

Naruto plunged the kunai into his heart and gritted his teeth in pain. It hurt, it hurt so bad, but he grinned anyways. His life was finally over. He could be reunited with all the people that actually cared about him again. The third Hokage, Jiraiya, his mother, his father...

A grinning Naruto embraced the darkness that was consuming his vision and he fell backwards out of his chair.

I'm free... Was Naruto's final plan

Deep down, she knew she was in love with Naruto, but she just ignored it, considering it impossible for her to fall in love with him. If she lost him now...

No, that's not going to happen... Sakura declared to herself.

Even as she moved faster than she ever had in her life, Naruto's apartment was still a bit of a trek from the hospital. It took her 10 minutes to reach his place.

Her fear only increased as she approached his door. Ino told her that she saw Naruto on her walk to work... then it took Sakura 10 minutes to get to his apartment...

Sakura didn't even bother knocking, she just knocked down Naruto's door. He wouldn't need it after all, he was hers and he would never live in this place again. As she walked into his somewhat messy apartment she was greeted by the smell of ramen and blood.

"Oh god... oh god no. Please no." Sakura stammered out in a panic as she ran into Naruto's kitchen. Her eyes widened in horror and she gasped as she took in the sight she was praying she wouldn't see. Lying on the ground in a pull of his own blood was Naruto, with a kunai sticking out of his chest.

"Naruto..." Sakura choked out. She quickly ran to him and lifted his body from his blood. She brought him to his couch, pulled the kunai from his chest and instantly started healing him.

"Please Naruto, please don't die." Sakura begged as tears fell from her face and onto his body. She desperately pumped more chakra into him. She couldn't lose Naruto, she just couldn't.

"Please..." Sakura begged as more tears fell onto Naruto's body. As she healed Naruto, Sakura had never hated herself more than this moment. She pushed him to this, she broke him. He was currently on the precipice of death because of her. This was 100% her fault...

She nearly screamed for joy when his shallow breaths started to become more steady. She felt his heartbeat slowly returning to normal. She let out a happy sob and and hugged him tightly to her.

But she wasn't done yet. Naruto wasn't out of the woods yet, he lost a lot of blood. She pulled some blood pills out of her pack and pushed them in Naruto's mouth then coerced his unconscious form into swallowing the blood pills. With those pills, his body would replenish the blood he lost. He was going to be ok.

Naruto was going to be ok. Sakura had never been so relieved in her life. But now she was completely exhausted. She poured so much of her chakra into him... With a happy smile on her face, Sakura adjusted Naruto say this head was in her lap and let herself fall asleep as she played with Naruto's soft, spiky hair.

Sakura smiled softly at Naruto. "Sasuke turning me down and abandoning us when I was 12... it really fucked me up. More than I realized. The one time I tried to confess my feelings to a man and he leaves me and the entire village, and then becomes one of the greatest threats to the village."

"But you... you've always been there for me. And I started to notice you, I just ignored those feelings. I pushed them to the very back of my mind. You were Naruto, I couldn't fall in love with you. It just wasn't possible."

"You're right, it is." Naruto retorted, but Sakura just ignored him.

"But now that I own you, now that you're my personal foot slave... I can't help but embrace my feelings. I know how much you love me, and you make me so happy. "

"No... you don't love me. You wouldn't have enslaved me like that if you did. You wouldn't have broken my body just for the hell of it if you did." Naruto replied.

"I can talk all I want Naruto, but instead I'm going to prove myself to you." Sakura interrupted with a soft smile as she approached Naruto and gently grabbed the hand that he was grasping the kunai with. Sakura kissed Naruto's hand and gently pushed his hand down.

I love having you as my foot slave Naruto, I love it so much, but if you don't want that, then I will treat you as I normally would. Naruto stared at Sakura in shock. She was giving him such a loving smile. She actually loved him... "So that was the emergency. I realized that Naruto was planning to commit suicide so I had to go and stop him before it was too late. I used all of my chakra to heal him, and then gave him some blood pills, so he's fine now. But I was completely exhausted and fell asleep."

"A choice?"

Sakura smiled softly. "It doesn't matter, he didn't choose to be free."

"WHAT?! He actually chose to be your foot slave?"

"He knew that I like owning him, and he kinda liked being owned by me too. And once I told him that we would still be together, and that I would bring him with me on missions he choose to be my slave."

Tsunade smiled softly at Sakura. The girl standing in front of her was nothing like the girl that was standing in front of her yesterday. THIS girl was someone she was proud to call her apprentice.

"H-hey Sakura-chan! You're n-not still mad about the perverted jutsu, are you."

Sakura let out an amused laugh and put her hand to her chest. "No Naruto, I think you paid enough." She brushed her hair with her hand, letting it shine in the sun. She gracefully took the stool next to Naruto and crossed one leg over the other elegantly. Not that Naruto was observant enough to notice, but Sakura was exuding more confidence than she ever had. She had never been timid, for sure, but now she had quite self assurance and esteem, rather than brashness.

Once he learned she wasn't mad, Naruto was back to his obnoxious self. They ate a meal together, with Naruto treating it as a date.

"YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" Naruto bounced around the ramen shop shouting, drawing angry shouts from the other patrons. Sakura grabbed him by the ear. "One condition, though. I'm going to test you first."

Naruto pumped his fist with determination. "No sweat! Bring on the challenge!" Sakura leveled a gaze on him, and Naruto felt just a bit uneasy. It was like Sakura knew something he didn't... "Naruto, I'm going to ask you to do the thing that's hardest for you: be obedient. Completely. For one week. Luckily for you though, I've decided to only make it towards women, because you should really learn to do what we say anyways, we just know better!" Sakura chuckled with her last line."

Naruto melted. When he pulled himself together, he declared. "Okay Sakura, I'll do it! Then I'll be your boyfriend!"

"GOT IT! Don't worry Sakura, I'll pass your test!" Sakura laughed. "Good. Anyways, I have to go now. Good luck Naruto..."

1212221112.content:
Naruto whistled loudly with his fingers laced behind his head as he walked to the Hokage's office. Not too long after Sakura left, he had been told to report there by an ANBU agent. He was confident about Sakura's challenge. By now, everyone knew they couldn't boss HIM around!

He burst into Tsunade's office and said loudly "What is it that you want this time Grandma! It better be a whsuper important mission! Tsunade didn't immediately react. She shuffled her papers and cleared her throat. She leveled her unwavering eyes at the boy. "Naruto, don't talk to me that way. Though we are close, I am still your superior. From now on you will call me Tsunade-sama, is that clear? Now, apologize."

Naruto was taken aback. Usually she would just scream and call him a brat and maybe try to hit him on the head. Now she said this, and even worse -Naruto clenched his fists- he had to obey. "Sorry..." He mumbled. "Sorry what?" she sternly replied. "Sorry Tsunade-sama..." Naruto let out, red faced. Tsunade's luscious lips twitched into a smile. "Naruto, I've decided I would like a formal apology."

Naruto's eyes widened. A formal apology from the Hokage meant that he had to...
Tsunade leaned back in his chair and gestured him onward, watching with amusement and interest. Naruto wanted nothing better than to call her an old lady and tell her to take a hike! But he had to do whatever she said...Why couldn't she have done something like this yesterday?

"It's for Sakura, for Sakura" he mumbled as he mentally prepared himself. With obvious suffering, he dropped onto his knees before Tsunade's desk. He then bent at the trunk forward as far as he could, with his nose almost hitting the ground. His arms were forward, with his fingertips nearly at Tsunade's desk. Thus forming the most humble bow possible. "I apologize to you, Tsunade-sama. Please forgive my actions." He gritted out. Those were the words we must say.

"Alright Naruto, that's quite alright. You are forgiven. In the future, you must treat me with more respect, however. Is that understood.
Naruto stood up and kept his eyes low. "Hai, Tsunade-sama."

Tsunade looked at Naruto with mirth. 'So he accepted Sakura's challenge, huh?' Tsunade thought 'I thought as much. Lets see just how much he likes Sakura...'

"Hehe, it's not something I advertise. Pervy Sage always told me one of my biggest advantages was how much people underestimate me. So I play to people's misconceptions of me."

Sakura blinked in surprise. She didn't even realize Naruto knew what "misconceptions" meant.

"How long are you going to be gone?"

"I don't know." Naruto admitted. "I did a lot of spy missions with Jiraiya like this one, and they're really unpredictable. Sometimes they go quickly, other times they drag on."

"Give me an estimate." Sakura ordered. Naruto knew by his agreement, that he had to obey.

"Could take as short as a day, or it could take me months to complete. Like I said, these kind of missions are very unpredictable Sakura-chan."

Sakura frowned. Naruto could potentially be out of the village during the entire week of their deal? And with this intelligence Naruto was suddenly displaying, Sakura wasn't too confident that if she just tried to extend the deal that Naruto wouldn't catch on and figure out that something was up.

One instant he his pain wracked body was giving out on him and in the next the pain was gone. He opened his eyes and looked around. The place was hazy and indistinct. Two figures approached - they were his mom and dad.

His dad looked sad. His mother looked furious.

Naruto smiled at seeing his parents, "Mom, dad you'll never believe what I did! I saved the village and even though I went out pretty bad I saved everyone several times!"

Minato sadly shook his head, "Naruto my son, I'm sorry to have to tell you this."

Naruto looked confused. "Tell me what?"

Minato sighed, "It is not what you do in your life that is important it is how you die. An evil man who does one good thing in his dying breath can go on to their eternal reward. But a hero who falls to disgrace at the last will only suffer."

Naruto was shocked and then got scared. "W-what is going to happen to me?"

Minato looked uneasy, "You will suffer and this is the last time we will see each other. I am so sorry... maybe if I had been there for you during your youth you wouldn't have been such a pathetic failure in the end." Minato slowly disappeared.

Naruto was crying hot tears. How was this fair? Kushina looked angry - what was going to happen next?

Naruto suddenly found himself about an inch tall in comparison to Kushina, who was standing right in front of him. The entire space seemed to be just empty grey nothingness, except for the 1 inch tall Naruto, and tall Kushina. Kushina maintained an expressionless face as she bent over and undid her sandals. "Since you died by feet, Naruto, you will have to endure FEET. And with a snap of my fingers, I can make this really bad." Kushina said, as she now smirked down at Naruto. She snapped her fingers, and immediately a steemy moist wave of cheesy air hit Naruto. He tried to cover his noes but it was too powerful. Suddenly he was hit by a toe right in front of him. It knocked him onto his back, and then curse seal marks appeared from the invisible floor they were standing on, and restrained Naruto's arms and legs, and his neck. He could barely move an inch now. He looked up pleading at Kusina's face, who was still smirking, "NO. MOM NO PLEASE. DON'T DO IT. THE SMELL WILL KILL ME!" Kushina flatly replied, "don't you remember son? You're already dead." as she brought her foot over Naruto's immobile body. Naruto could see dead foot skin all over and toe jam up by her toes. Her foot looked hot and moist, as it were fresh out of a thick boot with sauna like conditions. She finally brought it down on Naruto, who was unable to move, and began rubbing her foot all over his body, focusing her under toes over his head. "Sniff" she said. As she kept rubbing. Naruto was coughing, trying to get the cheesy vinegary scent out of his nose, but it was impossible. No matter how hard he fought his constraints, they controlled him. He just had to lay there and accept.

Kushina then sat down on her butt, and removed her other sandle. She brought both hot sweaty soles over Naruto's body, and dropped them. She clenched her toes over his face, causing sweat to drip down. "Deep breaths. C'mon, we have a long time to go." Kushina hummed on as she sat silently hearing Naruto try to scream his way out, barely able to keep his sanity while inhaling the incredibly disgusting odor. She took pride in how bad she made her feet. Too bad for Naruto, he didn't know that she just wanted to increase his soul's tolerance for foot stench, in preparation for what was to come. She was just the opening act. She loved how helpless he was, trapped down under both of her feet, allowing her foot sweat to soak into his body, while he marinates in the pure foot stench. "No more air for you Naruto, just Mommy's stinky foot odor. Sniff sniff." She said as she wiggled her toes.

After 24 hours of this torture, Naruto couldn't scream anymore, he was just trapped there, suffering in silence, forced to bask in the foot stench. Her foot sweat seemed never ending, and the odor never got better.

It was truly a sight to behold. Here was Naruto dumbfounded at how this could all be reality. Death only to be met with such a smelly horrid fate...eternity of foot sniffing at the feet of the kunoichi he once knew. But now he was trapped under these sick and twisted versions of them. Trapped beneath their red hot sweat logged feet, forced to drink foot sweat, eat toe jam, and take deep inhales of the never ending odor that was produced from Sakura, Ino, and Kushina's feet. Naruto constantly tried to break free, but was quickly overpowered by his tormentors. Sakura loved to tease him this way, saying things like:

"Whoops! That was close Naruto. Almost got away but nope, just my hot stinky feet for you. Here, let me wrap your face between my big toe and second toe like this, letting your face get smothered in my stinky sweaty toe pit. Yeah just like that, let the miasma of my foot completely swallow you up. Ooo! Looks like you got some toe jam in your mouth, can't spit it out now, best eat up Naruto!"

No amount of crying or fighting would help Naruto. No matter what he did they laughed and kept reminding him how utterly disgusting his fate was.

Ino spoke to Kushina, "Could you imagine being stuck down there? Like...FOREVER? Insane right? Poor little Naruto, I don't know how he's going to endure. Not like he has a choice in the matter". Kushina giggled and spoke down to Naruto, "That's right my little boy! No way out of this, so just take a DEEP inhale of mommie's feet" Kushina finished as she pressed Naruto deep into her smoldering soles. The girls repeatedly mashed him between their soles forcing him to take deep breaths of their toes for many years. Naurto was unable to lose his mind, but at the very least he figured it couldn't get worse.

Year 250:

Naruto had been sniffing feet for 250 years now, and he was still suffering. No matter what he did he couldn't get used to that terrible cheesy odor of feet. The odor combined with the sight of those repugnant giant red tinted toes and soles that seemed to appear in every direction ready to shove him back into the world of feet. Finally, at this point, another figured appeared.

"Finally sensei! We were wondering when you'd show up".

"I just wanted to make sure my feet were perfect for little Naruto here", Tsunade spoke as she walked over to where Naruto was sealed under 6 horrendous soles. The other girls removed their feet with a devious smile on their faces, and for the first time in 250 years Naruto saw something other than feet. He was still tied down, and still in the same weird grey dimension, but now he saw Tsunade in front of him, and the worst foot odor he could ever have imagined washed over him. Tsunade placed her foot right on top of his puny body and raised it slightly, waiting a few seconds before wiggling her toes and asking Naruto "Smell good?".

Naruto couldn't believe it. It was worse than all 250 years of Sakura, Ino, and Kushina's feet combined. Tsunade removed her foot and Naruto noticed that Sakura, Ino, and Kushina were gone. Tsunade then made hand signs and shouted, "Shadow Clone Jutsu!"

9 more of her appeared, totaling 10 Tsunades. Before Naruto could even react, all 20 soles were attacking him from all directions, so much so that there was barely any light reaching him. Naruto was trapped in the center of some kind of massive squirming cocoon where the walls were made of Tsunade's fetid soles, constantly wiggling, spreading more stench into Naruto. Naruto now wished to go back to the previous torment, anything but this.

Why was fate so cruel?

Remember how you used to love Ramen? Yeah there's no Ramen here, just toejam. Hot, gooey, toe jam."

Tears rolled down Naruto's face, totally lost among the thick layer of foot sweat that now covered his entire body. He was becoming less and less recognizable, now covered in a layer of foot grime and toe sweat. Every few years or so Naruto would get a rush of energy, a renewed hope to escape. He would try to fight his foot flesh prison, try to climb up above Tsunade's feet, but always fail. Her toes simply came down onto his head and pressed him back down into the center of the writhing flesh that was his eternal prison.Unknown to Naruto, every time he did this a little bit of his chakra leaked out into this infinite void. Naruto assumed his charka was either sealed or totally gone. It was in fact simply unusable in the world he was in.

"Naruto I want you to take really deep breaths ok? Really inhale all of the odor. Let it consume you. All you can think of is my foot stench, totally filling your lungs"

Naruto would have given anything for a breath of fresh air. He had basically forgotten what it smelled like to not breathe in foot odor.

In year 724, something finally happened. Naurto was experiencing another retaliation from Tsunade for trying to escape. He was completely smothered in her foot flesh, foot sweat pouring into his mouth, the odor as oppressive as ever. Naruto thought he began to see a bright light, but felt like he was merely hallucinating. Finally, the feet began to part, and Naruto for began to be able to wiggle a little more. When the feet parted enough for him to slip through them, he began to fall nearly infinitely into a deep chasm. Naruto could tell as he fell the odor became worse and worse, and it felt as though the humidity grew, the air borne moisture particles clearly being made from footsweat. We Naruto finally landed, he looked down to see what he was standing on. It was an absolutely massive sole. It certainly was covered in foot grime, and it was almost too slippery to walk on from the amount of sweat it was covered in. Naruto had never smelled any foot odor like this one. It felt truly malevolent. He noticed that the sole of this foot was strangely pale. It almost had a tiny bit of a blue tint to it.

"Welcome, my child"

Naruto heard a voice say coming from behind him. It sounded very tranquil, peaceful, almost...kind. The complete opposite of the evil nature of the foot odor that consumed him currently.

He turned around slowly, ensuring not to slip on the custard like foot sweat below him, nearly passing out just from the offensive odor of the massive foot below him. When he was fully turned, what he saw shocked him. It was Kaguya, the so called "mother of chakra".

"How fortunate that you've entered into this realm. For hundreds of years now I thought I could sense the release of Hagoromo's chakra in one of the many dimensions I've traversed through, however I could not pin point it. Now finally I've found you. It seems this dimension has suited my desires perfectly. As you have inherited the chakra of Asura, who has inherited the chakra of my son, Hagoromo, you are able to return my chakra to me, and finally I will be returned to my full strength".

Kaguya floated on over to Naruto, eventually levitating only slightly in front of him. At this point the foot odor was so strong Naruto could actually see what looked like a white whispy vapor rising slowly from the massive foot beneath him.

"You will release all of your chakra to me. In order to accelerate this, I'll send you to various dimensions and further your current fate. However my child, this will not be in vain. Once you've restored all of my chakra to me, I will release you from this dimension. Wouldn't you enjoy that?" Kaguya finished with a smile

"YES, YES PLEASE" Naruto yelled with all his heart.

Kaguya smiled even wider, "Excellent. During this process I cannot alter your destiny, I will merely cast you into different variations to accelerate the release of your chakra. Now, for your first dimension"...

Kaguya then casts Naruto into a different dimension

12122211121121111111222211.content:
Naruto sighed, what had he done to deserve this? He had learned about what Yin and Yang symbolised and the results weren't pleasant for him.

Yin was characterized as slow, soft, yielding, diffuse, cold, wet, and passive; and is associated with water, earth, the moon, femininity and nighttime. Yang, by contrast, was fast, hard, solid, focused, hot, dry, and aggressive; and is associated with fire, sky, the sun, masculinity and daytime.

So ever since the Fourth Ninja War, he'd had the FEMALE side of Kurama sealed within him. And Yin-Kurama was much more of a handful than the male half that Madara had ripped out of him. Damned Uchihas...

000000000000000000000

The cloud kunoichi were grinning at their work on Naruto, when his body started glowing red and there was a bloodred flash of light blinded them and a shockwave threw them away from him.

When they looked up, their eyes widened at what--or rather, who--now stood between them and Naruto as he gasped and coughed, re-adapting to having his lungs work again. A woman.

The woman had a tall stature, she has a proportioned body with a large chest. She had small red eyes with animalistic black slits for pupils and long dark red hair tied up in a large ponytail, the bangs of her long, fiery, dark crimson red hair perfectly framed her unblemished, heart-shape face while cascading down her back like a waterfall down to her firm and shapely rear. She was currently wearing a rather revealing black battle armor that consisted of a black top and bikini bottom with a cape, long boots and gloves while also showing off a great deal of her firm and perky D-cups. To finish up, the 5’8 beauty had three faint whisker marks on each cheek, red fox ears with black tips that came out the top of her head and nine silky smooth tails, the same colors as her ears, connected to her tailbone just over her rump. Her tails swayed about in a soothing yet enticing manner. Finally, on her back was a single-edge, dark-colored sword, with a semi-serrated edge and a web-like pattern near the point. On the blunt side of the weapon extended eight pointy metal layers, while the guard had another metal layer with a claw-like extension in front. The grip itself was white and thin, with a golden decorated top and a pointy sword pommel.

Looking at them, the woman--who could only be Yin-Kurama's human form--growled and drew her weapon and rushed forward.

A few minutes later, Kurama cleaned off her sword and returned it to her back, before walking over to Naruto and smirked at him. "I got you out of that mess with the Cloud hussies, and we did have a deal, Naruto. I help you, but there was a price...now I'm collecting!"

Naruto looked up, paling, not liking her expression...right before a massive object slammed down onto him and pinning him. Whatever it was wrapped around him and lifted him into the air.

Naruto went wide-eyed as he saw he was in the grasp of a massive, nine-tailed fox. It had black fur and long, rabbit-like ears and almost hand-shaped frontal paws, complete with opposable thumbs on it's clawed hands. What was more, it also had long, feminine eyelashes. The Yin-Kurama's form was the same as the Black Nine-Tails, who was sealed within the body of Naruto's alternate self, Menma, from that Genjutsu World, alternate, illusionary world created by Tobi when he casts his Limited Tsukuyomi on Naruto and Sakura Haruno and trapped them in a crystal ball which hosted the dimension in an attempt to capture Kurama. The illusion was a prototype of the Infinite Tsukuyomi and was influenced by both Naruto's deep desire to have parents and Sakura's desire for freedom from parental control.

Kurama laughed, "Got you!" she bat her eyes at her (to her actual form) toy-sized, former host.

You see Naruto...for my price, I want you as my pet!" Kurama cackled in delight,tossing him into the air and laughed as she sent her tails up and started batting him around before she caught him and after depositing him at her hind paws, was suddenly holding onto a human-sized length of chain and that was attached to an iron collar around Naruto's neck and he struggled to take it off. "Where's the…stinkin'…latch? ACK!"

"Nuh-uh-uh...we had a deal, pet!" Kurama tutted, grinning "Now, since I'm out and I own you now...I think we start with you learning your place as my pet. How about a nice massage?"

Naruto looked up at the massive vixen as she extended her back paws to him.

"You can't seriously expect me to rub your paws! That'd take forever!"

"Too bad, little pet. I'm your owner, so what I say goes. And sine I know how stubborn you are, you'll be doing this a lot until you learn and accept that you're mine." Kurama said, grinning at her new pet as she bat her eyes at him. Sure she could turn into her human form to make things easier for him, but she wanted Naruto too exhausted to try getting away--that meant her true form's actual back paws.

Naruto gaped up at the vixen. She was serious! The female half of the Tailed Beast that had been sealed within him wanted him as her pet!

"Can't I do anything else?" he begged.

At the the female fox looked thoughtfully at Naruto before grinning, she thought he really WAS cute at her mercy like this! "Well pet, since you're such a sweetie-pie, I guess that instead of my paws, we can P-L-A-Y~! You're the perfect size too...ooh...as it turns out, I'm in heat right now and want a good fuck so badly that I can't even believe it!"

Naruto blushed while paling at the same time, as impossible as that sounded to do. The female side of Kurama that had replaced the one Madara had extracted from him was going to use him to...!

"On second thought..." he said, edging towards her paws.

Kurama pouted. "Fine pet. Some other time I guess." she said, then smiled at him again, "But first...one more game!" she announced before one of her tails zoomed out and smacked him upwards.

"WhhoooooAAAAAAAAA!!!" the world around Naruto spun as he flew up into the sky! Everything was a spinning blur except for Kurama below him.

"Got you!" she shouted with glee before delivering a hefty swing at Naruto's airborne body with one of her tails, laughing at her pet as she swung the tail at him as if it were a whip. The massive fluffy monstrosity slammed into Naruto from the side and sent him flying. She repeated the action before he flew too far, knocking him back towards her and then continued to bat him around in this manner for some time until Naruto grabbed onto the fur and hung on for dear life.

Big mistake.

Kurama whipped and thrashed the tail he was clinging to around until he flew off. The black-furred tail blurred back into Naruto's field of vision and wrapped around him in a spiral manner as it constricted around him like an Anaconda, the fur smothering the young man. Naruto briefly wondered if this was what it'd feel like in the center of a cinnamon bun for some reason before he felt his fur prison fall on the ground, somehow retaining the spiral shape that had him trapped in the center of it. Feeling sick, Naruto hardly even cares as the top of the center of the spiral in slightly shifted as Kurama reached in and grabbed him, pulling Naruto out so that only his head was free using her thumb and index finger.

"Now THAT was fun, pet! I think I just found a good way to amuse myself AND discipline you if you be a naughty pet!" she cackled, before dragging her spiraled tail toward her back paws, "Now...about that paw-rub I wanted from you..." she cooed.

Naruto groaned.

1212222122221.content:
Sakura's feet had drained Naruto of all of his will to fight. That burning determination he had become famous for that allowed him to never gave up was nowhere to be found. He just wanted this to be over... and he knew the only way to end this was to obey Sakura.

He stopped struggling against her and took a loud and audible sniff of the smelly feet that were currently pinning his head down. The awful vinegary stench of Sakura's feet pervaded his nostrils.

"Much better." Sakura grinned. "Keep sniffing."

Naruto didn't want to sniff Sakura's feet again, but he now knew that struggling wouldn't help. It would only make it worse. As he took another sniff of Sakura's feet, she let up the pressure on his head.

"I like this side of you a lot more Naruto. You're not being loud, you're not being an idiot..." Sakura said as Naruto took another whiff of her smelly foot.

"You're obedient, compliant... I think I'm going to keep you like this."

"What?" Naruto gasped. He yelped in pain when Sakura used her considerable strength to push down on his face.

"I didn't say you could speak." Sakura chided. "Now Naruto, since I like this side of you, and enjoy having my feet sniffed and worshiped, I'm going to make you my foot slave. Any objections?"

Naruto had a ton of objections! He opened his mouth to protest, but all that got him was Sakura shoving all of her toes in his mouth.

"Suck on my toes slave." Sakura ordered. Naruto thought about fighting again, but there really was no use. So instead he started sucking on the smelly toes that were currently stuffing his mouth.

"No objections? Good." Sakura smirked. Naruto "mmphed" in protest, but that only caused Sakura to push her toes even deeper into his mouth, causing him to nearly gag.

"Well since you have no objections Naruto, you are officially my foot slave. Will you serve and obey me until I decide to free you. Although, you should know that I never plan to free you. So just plan on serving and obeying me for the rest of your life."

As Naruto continued to fight his gag reflex and suck on Sakura's toes, he searched for some way to escape. But every plan he came up with would inevitably only make it worse. There was no point for him to try and resist. He continued sucking on his pretty much teammate's toes as she continued to talk.

"You will refer to me as Mistress, or Mistress Sakura, and you will not speak without my permission. Your dream is no longer to be Hokage. It's my feet and to be my obedient little foot slave. You will approach being my foot slave with the same amount of enthusiasm and passion as you had when chasing after your old dream of being Hokage. Any objections?"

Again... Naruto had objections. A lot of them. But Sakura had already jammed her toes as deep into Naruto's mouth as he could handle. If he tried to object, she would only shove her toes deeper into his mouth which would only make him vomit... And Naruto didn't like his chances of survival if he vomited on Sakura's feet. So while he had tons of objections, he offered none, and instead silently continued sucking on the dainty toes of his new mistress.

"You're so much better when you're quiet and obedient like this slave." Sakura taunted. She knew that Naruto was completely under her power. The funny thing was, she wasn't originally planning on making Naruto her permanent foot slave. She was just going to torture him with her feet some so he would never use that damn sexy jutsu again.

But when he started struggling against her, it was like a challenge was lain. Sakura had to take on the challenge, and now she was happy she did. Naruto was her foot slave now and forever, all because he struggled against her.

She grabbed a medical scroll she had nearby and started reading it. Naruto had fully submitted to her. She no longer needed to pay any attention to him.

She just sat on her bed, reading her scroll, all while her new foot slave obediently continued to suck on her toes.

*about 10 minutes later*

The Godaime Hokage, Tsunade, is busy lounging around at her desk, when she hears a
knock at her door.

"Come in?" Tsunade answered.

The door opens and Sakura comes into the office, with Naruto on her shoulders. Tsunade is surprised to see them both, and with Naruto in his current position.

"Huh? What happened to Naruto, Sakura?" she asked her student.

Sakura answered the Godaime, "Well, it's kinda went like this...."

Tsunade gets a slight kick out of hearing Naruto's predicament, and she soon becomes intrigued with her next plan with him...

"...so I decided to tell you first about bringing all the girls here to have their fun with Naruto here." Sakura finished her story.

Tsunade decides to support Sakura in this little scheme of hers and replies with a slight grin, "Alright, I'll let you all have a run at the brat, and I'll join you as well!"

Sakura thanks her and they both take Naruto to the hidden basement of the tower, where the special torture room for criminals and missing-nins is located. (but unlike those kind of people, Naruto will get a different kind of torture!)

After securing Naruto tightly in the torture room, Sakura is sent out to get the rest of the girls from the rookie 9, while Tsunade gets her assistant, Shizune (she'll be in this plan also), to get the older Kunoichi to go along with this idea...

*a few hours later*

Naruto, thanks to his Kyuubi powers, has finally flushed out the rancid stench of Sakura's feet from his nasal areas, and slowly awakens.

"Gah, that was too much for me to handle..." he mumbles groggily to himself. Moving his head around, Naruto realizes that although his eyes are open, it's still nearly pitch black in the room he's in.

'Why's it so dark in here..?' he thinks as he attempts to sit up, but to his surprise....

"Huh? I can't move! Where am I?!" he shouts. It seemed this day just kept getting worse for him...

Just a few seconds after his exclamation, dim lights on the floor soon illuminate the room, and Naruto can see some shadowy figures standing in the room with him.

"Who's there?" Naruto calls out.

Immediately, the figures step forward and reveal themselves, surprising Naruto beyond belief. He could see that he was surrounded by every single kunoichi that he knew of! And to top it all off, all of them were in their bare feet!

"Hello there, Naruto. Looks like you're finally awake."

Naruto looked up. It was Sakura, and she had an evil little look on her face.

"Sakura? Why am I tied up and what are these people doing here?" Naruto questioned.

Sakura answered her blond teammate, "I just thought that I'd invite some more girls to have some fun with you. I'd say they were more than willing to accept!"

Naruto looked around once again. Indeed, they were looking at him, and it seemed they did want to have a go at Naruto...

Bringing his attention back to the front, Naruto then sees a girl coming towards him, ready to put him under the torture of her feet!

It was a teenaged girl Naruto's age, a full fifteen years. her waist-length hair was a vibrant pink with one strange cowlick in the middle of her head, while her eyes were a bright emerald green and her lips were a full blood red and her skin was pale like that of alabaster but held warmth underneath. She wore a long-sleeved green school uniform jacket, a brown skirt, navy blue, knee-length socks, black school loafers and a plain white shirt that was open slightly at the top, revealing a small amount of cleavage. A thick black collar was around her neck that had a small two-link chain attached to the front of it, attached to the end of the chain was a sliver rosary adorned with a single polished red gemstone in its center of it.

Naruto went wide-eyed. What was Moka doing here?!

Moka ran up and pulled him closer to her and hugged his head to her chest as she glared at the two Hyugas "Don't you touch him!"

"Or what?" Hanabi asked smugly.

Frowning Moka grabbed Naruto's hand. She brought it up to her chest. His fingers entangled with the rosary and it popped off immediately.

As soon as the cross was off, the chain in which her rosary once hung from started to glow bright pink. The pink glow got larger and brighter, it covered the entire village. Bats flew out from, what used to be a bright sun, what now was the blood-red moon. They flew towards Moka, surrounding her. Both Naruto and two sisters watched as the bat encased Moka. The sisters were shivering in fear and Naruto look happy.

Slowly, one of the bats peeled off and flew away, then another. Then, all at once, the bats flew off, back towards the red moon. She had seemed to have grown and matured from a teenager into an adult woman. Her limbs had lengthened, her bright pink hair had turned silver and her dazzling green eyes turned blood red with animalistic black slits for the pupils.

The two Hyuga sisters watched as Moka flicked some of her hair out of her face and looked at them with sheer contempt. Both of the pale-eyed girls stood there, their whole bodies trembling just from looking at her, she raidated so much power. Moka looked at them with sheer contempt. Moka snarled at the two girls.

In her unsealed state, Moka possesses super strength, super speed, incredibly agile reflexes and regenerative properties. Classified as an S-Class Yōkai (S-Class Monster), she was one of the strongest monsters anywhere else in the world. Unlike other Yōkai, Vampires have a special ability to convert their demonic energy/aura into pure strength (no other creature is capable of this). Even among her own family, Moka was considered to be in a league of her own, possessing an already formidable power that still has not reached its full potential, surpassed only by her parents. These attacks are essentially intense bursts of concussive, strength-augmenting energy released in one kick. The result of getting kicked was devastating. Even a strong opponent would be sent flying away and usually sustain a crippling injury. Depending on the target of the kick, an opponent's bones could easily be broken and one or more major organs ruptured. Because of that, Moka had long ago realized the danger of utilizing her full strength; monsters low to mid-class can and will be killed on impact and even high-class monsters could die if they didn't have a high healing factor. Despite her fighting nature as a vampire, she didn't truly wish to kill anyone. This was why she curbs her power, to keep herself from outright killing people.

The three men placed their chips onto the table, Tsunade did the same, the dealer handing the cards over the table, Tsunade looked at her hand. Ah, a winning hand! Tsunade thought. “Shall we begin the betting?” Tsunade said, sliding her chips and a considerable amount of her bundled notes in her briefcase. “Would I be able feel what’s going on?” He asked. He wanted to make sure he would be able to feel Ino’s foot against him.
“Sure! You’ll also be able to see, hear, smell and taste the things around you although your senses will be limited to the perspective of the object.” Ino told him. “For example if I changed you into my insole, you won’t be able to see beyond the inside of my boot.”
Naruto thought about it for a second. It would be interesting to experience what being an object under Ino’s foot was like. He was beginning to get into the idea.
“One other thing Naruto,” Ino told him. “If I transform you, you won’t be able to communicate with me. You won’t be able to talk or move around and I’m going to treat you exactly like I would the object I change you into. If I make you into my sandal, you’ll be treated like a sandal and not like a person who enjoys being under my feet. I won’t talk to you or do anything else I wouldn’t normally do to a sandal. Is that clear?”
Naruto nodded. He paused as he thought about what accepting Ino’s offer would mean. He wouldn’t be able to communicate if he was uncomfortable or in pain and he was giving up his humanity to be treated like an object. He would also be completely in Ino’s control. If she wanted, she could leave him stuck as an object forever. He liked the idea of being an object under her feet but maybe this was too much.
Ino noticed Naruto’s hesitation. “Naruto you look like you’re having second thoughts,” she said. “Are you sure you want to do this?”

12512111221111111221112111.content:
Being a sandal was a weird experience for Naruto. He could see both the blue inside and the environment outside of himself. Of course his vision point was low to the ground and he had no control. He also had trouble adjusting to the fact that he was unable to move. Even though he could think, he still had to accept the fact that he was only an object
Ino of course couldn't to see how Naruto feels against her foot and immediately decides to put him on. She reaches down, grabs her sandal and slides it onto her foot
For Naruto it felt like Ino had grabbed him by the neck and was forcing her foot down his throat. He could taste Ino’s toes as they entered her sandal and as more of her foot entered inside him he began to taste her sole, heel and the top of her foot as well. Naruto did maintain his sense of smell after the transformation, but once Ino put him on, the only odor he was able to detect was the smell of her foot. As Ino’s foot slid inside Naruto, he felt his entire body slide around her. It was like he was using his entire body to give her huge foot a hug. He loved the experience of having her foot inside of him and never wanted it to end. He realized that as a sandal, the sole purpose of his existence was to protect her foot.
Ino slowly lowered her foot to the ground and Naruto experienced Ino’s first step with him as her sandal. The movement was disorienting for Naruto as what he was able to see changed very rapidly. He felt his body bang against the floor and the pressure build as Ino’s foot pressed into him. When she stood on him it was like he was being constantly trampled into the ground by her foot.
Ino smiled as she thought about what Naruto must be going through. “You make a very comfortable sandal Naruto,” She called out. “Now I think it’s time you got the full experience of what being my sandal is like”
Ino smiled cruelly as she put on her other sandal and started to walk away. Naruto suddenly felt her foot lift him up only to crash down a second later. That happened again and again. Ino was obviously walking somewhere. Naruto wanted to call out and find out where he was going but he didn’t have the ability to talk. As a sandal he no longer had any control and had to submit to the will of Ino’s feet. Only Ino knew what she had in store for him next.

Ino seemed to read his mind and gave him the small mercy of knowing what was coming.
“You have an impressive amount of stamina Naruto. You survived sniffing the smelliest pair of sandals I had, you lasted as my punching bag, and you even managed to take some extreme trampling from my feet. However…” She grinned evilly. “Being my sandal is a new level of torture. Let’s see how you survive…”

Ino puts Naruto in her gymbag, and then decides to go about her business. Whatever right? He is a sandal now, he needs to know that he is not important.

She goes about her life, relaxing, for a month without really thinking about Naruto. She wore other shoes and eventually, she even stopped thinking about what had happened.

One day however, she took her bag to the gym, she wanted a workout with Sakura. It was early, and she was dead tired. As she dragged her way down the street, a shrewd civilian walked up to her.

"Excuse me, miss, could you spare some clothes for Goodwill? We're short on shoes and undershirts.

Ino replied sleepily. "Mmh? Ok."
She clumsily reached into her bag, and gave the girl one of her spare shorts, and a pair of sandals.
The girl thanked her and walked off.

Ino had a long work out with Sakura, then spent the rest of her day relaxing. When it was time to go to sleep, she lay in bed, dreaming of Sasuke, that Baka Sakura, thinking he would be hers, and that idiot Narut...

She bolted up. "OH SHIT!!!!"

.....................................
Earlier.....

Anko sat down on a bench. She put her new shirt in a bag, to be used later, and removed her sandals. They were old and worn, so she through them in the trash. She held her new Sandals up to her nose and laughed maniacally to herself.

"Oh Sandals, such a cruel fate awaits you. Be thankful you cannot smell or feel, because you are about to suffer extended contact with the most dreaded tools of torture in Kohona....Anko Mitarashi's feet.

This was true, many trained ninjas has given all the information they knew because they couldn't stand her feet on their faces.

With an air of Sadism, she pulled her putrid feet up into the air, and put on her Sandals. She jumped to her feet. "Welcome to hell, sandals!"

Under her feet, Naruto was cured of his foot fetish, how could he escape! He was a future Hokage! Not some kunoichis Sanda-
Anko broke into a run, giving Naruto a glimpse of his new life.

1251211122111111122111211212.content:
*poof*

In a cloud of smoke, Naruto was returned to his original state. He was sprawled on the ground and his appearance was like you'd expect: that of someone who had been trampled for days straight. He was bruised, his clothes were torn, he was dirty, and he smelled exactly like Anko Mitarashi's feet. He did not immediately realize he was back to normal, tired as he was.

Anko had shot up when she saw the puff of smoke, pulled out her kunai, and saved Naruto by death when she decided not to throw it. She stared in alarm at the boy she recognized as the Kyuubi kid. He had been disguised as sandals? Why did he look so beat up? Where were her REAL sandals? What the hell was he doing here, anyways?

Naruto had realized what had happened and exclaimed with joy. He tried to get up, but his muscles were too sore. Anko's feet had really made their mark.

Anko stomped over and roughly picked him up. She gritted her teeth. "Explain. Now."

When Anko understood his state, she sat him down and patiently waited. Naruto was more elated than he could ever remember being, but he knew that he would have to explain to Anko. He had to be convincing, so the only part he would lie about was that he had wanted to be Ino's sandal.

So he told Anko, who was hanging on every word, that Ino was angry at him, and had transformed him into a sandal. She had then forgotten about him in her gymbag......Anko burst out laughing at this part.

"Y-y-you m-ean that all this w-week you've...?" Naruto bowed his head. Anko clutched her stomach, she was running out of breath laughing.

"OH MAN, THAT SUCKS! HOW HAVE MY FEET BEEN TREATIN YA, KID?!?" She smacked her knee and laughed some more. She inspected his state, and then put her feet up on the table, causing Naruto to flinch. "Oh, sorry kid, guess these are your worst fear now, huh?" She admired the tools of Naruto's torment, wiggling her toes. "Boy, Ive actually gotten TRAINED NINJAS to confess everything with these in a few hours, and you were under there for a WEEK. Could you feel it and smell it and all?

Naruto muttered. "I could feel it but not smell it, I mean, I had no nose..." He really didn't ever want to talk about this again.

Anko snorted. "Right. Wow, I can't believe I walked on a guy for a week and didn't notice! That's so wild. Hmm, no smell, you said?

Naruto wanted this conversation to end, so he started talking about Ino, though Anko didn't seem to be paying attention to him, she was focusing on her hands, doing different hand signs and frowning, as if trying to work something out.

"So what are we going to do about Ino?
Anko focused on her hands. "Huh? Oh her! Nothing, really. If she hasn't noticed or remembered by now, she never will. Or maybe she just doesn't care. Either way, she's no problem.

Naruto was genuinely confused. "What do you mean? She's going to get punished, right."

A lightbulb seemed to go off over Anko's head, and she stopped working on her hand signs. She answered Naruto. "Hell no! Why would I punish her? I should thank her really."
Anko stood up and towered over Naruto. "Okay, your breaks over, I'm changing you back into my sandals. Have fun!"

The sexy jonin smiled brightly at Naruto as she began on the handsigns she had just worked out.....

Around midnight, just as Naruto was dozing off to sleep (Anko had stopped moving), Anko suddenly made a violent kick in her dream, resulting in her unknowingly shoving Naruto's mouth with the heel of her foot, giving him a good taste.

Naruto snapped out of his (almost sleep) and gagged violently. Why the hell did it taste so bad now? It had never been this bad before.

Her feet came back to rest in a mask over his face, and with horror, the answer came. Her feet were sweating. He felt his face getting moist with it. Under the covers, with Naruto under there, her tootsies were hot. God, he would never get to sleep now. He whimpered. 6 hours left.

Naruto stood in front of Hinata patiently, while she looked anywhere but towards him. She had sent a clone of her to Hiashi to tell him everything. She still couldn't believe Naruto wanted to be HER servant! It was like one of her dreams, but she couldn't imagine being him serving her!

Hiashi strode into the room. He could not believe what he had been told. That Kyuubi brat, actually wanted to be a servant in the Hyuuga household? Too good to be true.

He went straight to Naruto. "Is it true what I have been told? That you desire to be my daughter's servant?
"Yes, Hiashi-sama." Hiashi grinned inwardly, keeping a stony face. It was true. This would be great for the family, and Hinata. He knew about her crush on him, and maybe seeing him act servile would make her realize how inferior he was.

Hiashi began giving him a speech. "Alright, then. The first thing you must realize it that you must now protect Hinata, even at the cost of your own life. I will tell Tsunade about all this so she makes the proper changes to the teams."

Naruto winced, but hid it. So now Baa-chan would know. Great.

Hiashi continued. "Furthermore, you are to follow every order given to you. You will perform all the menial tasks to care for Hinata so she can busy herself with more important things. Hyuuga servants get up at 3:00 A.M. You will do her laundry, cook her food, clean her room, and most of all, follow all orders without question. You will also follow the orders of all Hyuuga clan members, even the other servants, as you are worth much less then them. Now, do you still wish to be my daughter's servant?

Hinata was near hysterical, thinking that Naruto would never do all that. He was too proud.


Naruto bowed his head, and brought it all home. "Yes, Hiashi-sama. It would be my honor to serve Hinata-sama."

Hiashi smirked. Time for some amusement. "Good! Now Naruto, I want you to kiss my feet in thanks for this opportunity."

Naruto stared down at the Hyuuga leader's feet. They were clearly a male's feet. Somehow, that made it worse. Still, he knew what he must do.
Naruto got on his hands and knees, and repeatedly kissed the feet of the gloating shinobi. Hinata looked on in absolute shock.

Hiashi pushed him away. "Now I think you should thank Hinata in the same way. Go now."

This was the most unreal moment Hinata ever experienced. Naruto crawled over to her, and looked up at her with big, thankful, submissive eyes. "Thank you, Hinata-sama." He then lowered his head and planted a kiss on the top of each sandal.

Hinata was immobile, and Hiashi was satisfied. "Alright, now Hinata must go to bed. I'll modify a closet for you to sleep in, a fitting spot.

Hinata rushed to her room and slammed the door. As she lay awake, thoughts buzzing, she did not see Naruto the same way. She still had feelings for him, but when she saw him kiss her father's feet, and then hers, she knew he would actually be a servant. She did not see the confidence she thought he had. Maybe, she pondered, I have been wrong about him
1251211122111111122111211212122211221.title: She tells Hiashi

choices: Lick her feet some more
Serve Sakura and Ino as well
12512111221111111221112112121222112211.content:
(Before Naruto gets Hinata's feet)
Naruto woke up at 3:00am now knowing that he is an official slave of Hinata! He had no idea what to do first, he didn't want to wake Hinata up though. He got out of his closet and stretched. Hiashi was already there. "Did you sleep well?" He asked. "Yes, Master Hiashi." Naruto replied. "Good job, now I bet your wondering what your first task is?" He said. Naruto nodded his head. "Well you must cook Hinata's breakfast and then do her laundry." Hiashi said. "It shall be done. What does Hinata like to eat for breakfast?" Naruto asked. "Just make something simple, since it's your first day." Hiashi said and he left. Naruto quitely went into Hinata's room and collected her dirty clothes. He began to wash them so they were perfect. "At least I'm a servant to someone I can trust." Naruto said trying to cheer himself up. He looked at the clock. 5:50am it read. He finished the laundry and went into the kitchens to make Hinata a couple of fried eggs and pancakes. He finished at 6:00am when Hiashi came back from wherever he went. He looked at what Naruto made as he set the table for Hinata. "Hmmm.... for a beginner your pretty good. I think Hinata will enjoy having a slave." Hiashi smiled in approval. "Thank you Master Hiashi. Would you like anything to eat as well while we wait for Hinata to wake up?" Naruto asked. "Oh no thank you. I normally don't eat breakfast." Hiashi said. "May I ask you something before you departure again?" Naruto asked. "What is it?" Hiashi responded. "Is there anything I should be aware of while serving Hinata, you know like stay out of certain rooms, or don't do this or that?" Naruto asked really not wanting to screw this up.

(Naruto get's Hinata's feet)

"Nope, I'll go wake Hinata up, also make sure you lick her feet and suck her toes until she says stop." Hiashi commanded. He left the room and a couple minutes later he and Hinata were in the kitchen, Hinata eating her breakfast and Naruto licking her soft soles. He sucked her toes one by one making sure they were sucked with passion and love. He licked between her toes causing a slight moan in pleasure from Hinata's mouth. He then began licking her incredibly soft soles. The taste was wonderful and Naruto began to actully like being a servant to the Hyuuga clan. Hinata finished and got up. Naruto kissed her toes and then Hinata said. "Ok slave, stop." Naruto stopped instantly but stayed in his 'all fours' position. "Ok Hinata I'll see you tonight. Since it's Naruto's first day of serving you, give him tasks where he has to serve your feet, and your friend's feet to if you wish. Ok see you sweety." Hiashi said kissing his daughters head as he left. "Ok Naruto follow me." Hinata said. Naruto crawled as Hinata walked to her room. She took a seat on the bed. "Ok Naruto, I want you to give me a foot massage." Hinata said. "Yes, Hinata-sama as you wish." Naruto responded. He took her feet into his hands and gave her a foot massage that felt like magic to Hinata. She loved the way he kneeded his thumbs into her soles, and when he pressed against her toes relieving the stress, she felt like she was gonna pass out from pleasure. "Oh my gosh Naruto, that felt so good." Hinata commented. "Thank you Hinata." Naruto said. "I wonder if I should share you with Sakura and Ino or make you lick my feet some more?" Hinata said teasing him.


What does Hinata pick?
12512111221111111221112112121222112211.title: Naruto's First Day.

choices: He receives the curse seal, making him a true slave of the Hyuga clan.
He panics and seeks shelter to avoid this fate.
125121112211111112211121121212221122111.content:
Hinata took another moment to look over her slave before deciding to keep him for herself. "Come to think of it, I won't be sharing you with anyone. You are all mine.", she grinned.

Naruto quietly breathed a sigh of relief. He wasn't ashamed of his new position as Hinata's slave, but he didn't know how well Ino would take the knowledge that her former slave was serving another woman. "How shall I serve you, Mistress Hinata?"

Hinata lay back on the bed. "Start licking my feet. Don't do it like a dog would though. Use your tongue more like a sponge."

And so the slave did. He was dedicated to giving his mistress' feet the best sponge-bath she had ever received. He took satisfaction from a job well done as he felt Hinata wriggle in pleasure. It felt strange to know that giving his mistress pleasure made him more happy than anything else he had ever done, and yet it was so.

As Hinata looked down towards Naruto at the foot of her bed, she realized that none of her other servants or slaves could compare to him. She felt a certain warm tingly feeling for him. It wasn't love. She'd loved him as a free man with so much spirit. Now that he was humbled to the point of being a slave, that attraction had waned. Perhaps she would experiment with him to quiet any doubts she might have. But first, she would have to put him through the ceremony. "Naruto, come here" She said.

Naruto quickly moved around to the side of the bed and kneeled, not wasting a second in fulfilling her order. He was surprised when his mistress reached down and stroked his cheek. It felt remarkable. Was it a reward for how well he licked her feet?

"Naruto, the dresser in the corner holds a ceremonial kimono. I want you to take it and see to it that it is clean and ready for tonight."

"What happens tonight?"

"Don't interrupt your mistress, slave. Tonight is when you receive your Hyuga curse seal. Currently I own your heart and I own you legally. This seal will make sure I own your body completely. Now fulfill the task I have assigned. I'm going to take a nap. It will be a long night."

Naruto retrieved the kimono and walked out of the room. He stopped at the door and looked back on his sleeping mistress. Mistress was hardly the word to describe her. Goddess was more like it. Her feet and bare legs lay at the top of her sheets. Her face had the sunlight shining upon it. her hair was spread out all across her pillow, looking like dark silk, and her left shoulder was exposed, looking enticing in the sunlight. And Naruto knew that beneath that beautiful body was a beautiful, kind, and gentle spirit. She was without a doubt the kind of young woman who deserved to have a man that would wait on her and be her slave. But the talk of that curse seal was unsettling. According to the law, he was already her slave, so Hinata could do with his body whatever she wanted, but something in him wanted to rebel against that. Shaking his head he walks out of the room to take care of his mistress' kimono.

As he washes the garment, he comes to a decision.
125121112211111112211121121212221122111.title: Lick her feet some more

1251211122111111122111211212122211221111.content:
That night, Naruto lay trembling in a circle made of strange symbols. Hinata, Hanabi, and their father were there as well as Neji who was there to subdue Naruto in case he tried to run.

Neji had asked incredulously as to why Naruto would sign his life away. "I just want to make Hinata happy." was all Naruto would say. Now Neji could do nothing but pity him.

Hanabi was paying close attention to the entire ordeal. She knew that as the younger sister, she would one day be branded with a curse seal and made a slave to the Hyuga clan as well. The joy and excitement that this new slave had at the thought of receiving his curse seal helped her to believe that it would be alright.

Hiashi looked on at his daughter in pride knowing that she would make an excellent head of the clan once she had learned to be a little less soft with the slaves.

Hinata was wearing the kimono that Naruto had washed earlier that morning. It was red silk with gold embroidery and it clung tightly to Hinata's form. A slit down the side exposed her right leg. The rest of her body was left more to the imagination. She ordered her slave to close his eyes as he was not to see the secret handsigns that would mark him. The gestures were made in quick succession and her right index struck his forehead. Naruto winced in pain as the mark seared itself into his flesh. He opened his eyes and stared lovingly, longingly into the face of his mistress. Just then a pain like he'd never known before filled his entire being. Hinata gave a gasp of surprise and looked to her father who had made the handsign to release the power of the curse seal.

Her father turned his gaze to his daughter "You are the heir of the Hyuga clan, you must make your slave aware of the fact that he is too lowly to be anything to you but a slave."

Shortly thereafter Naruto was helping his mistress out of her kimono. "I'm sorry my father did that, but I'm afraid he has a point." Hinata said sullenly. "I hope you didn't sign your life away to me in a gambit that we might fall in love. Were I to be with one of the slaves, it would be with a member of the branch family, that the lineage of the byakugan might be assured."

Naruto was hurt by this reminder of just how low his position was, but he had held no false notions in his heart. He knew from the beginning that a woman as beautiful and dominant as Hinata-san could never have loved him.

"I did love you once, but that was when there was a spark of fire in your soul. You had that unbeatable spirit which I adored so much. But that was a different time and a different Naruto. Now you are a slave, and what is there to love in a slave?"

This hurt Naruto a great deal more. He had never known Hinata had loved him. As he massaged her feet that night, he wondered if he might have made a life with her had he ever taken the time to register her feelings for him. That was was all speculation and would lead to nothing. He finished the massage and when he was quite sure his mistress was asleep, He gently kissed both of her feet and went off to his mat and fell asleep where he dreamed of being Hinata's sandal.

Time passed and Hinata entered into an arranged marriage with a member of a wealthy and powerful clan. They had a son together and on his coming of age, Hanabi was marked with the curse seal as well. Now that she was a slave as well, she grew to understand that she and Naruto had a great deal in common and eventually they were married. Hinata still held first place in her husband's heart, but when she had a rough day, Naruto would kneel down and rub her feet till the pain vanished. They had two daughters together, and Naruto liked to see how much they took after their mother's side of the family.

As Hinata's husband was a proud man, he would never worship her feet, so Naruto still performed many services for her. Deep down, he still hoped that she would see his devotion to her and that they would run away together. They never did, though the thought featured heavily in Naruto's nightly dreams.

These were the highlights of Naruto's life. For a slave, these things were some of the best that could be hoped for.
1251211122111111122111211212122211221111.title: Marked for Life

choices: Naruto goes to the house of a former mistress
Naruto hopes someone else will take him in.
1251211122111111122111211212122211221112.content:
Naruto looked into the bucket of water he was washing Hinata's kimono in. He ceased moving his hands about for a moment and the contents of the bucket stilled and formed a calm mirror. His eyes studied his face and moved to look at his forehead. The slave moved a hand and watched himself rub gently where the mark would be placed. The hand came down and splashed the image which dissipated into ripples and waves. Naruto loved his mistress and would gladly lay down his life for her. Did she want to place the curse seal on him because she didn't trust his convictions? Did she doubt his love and devotion? How could he love a woman who didn't trust him at all?

The boy looked around. Did he really feel this way or was it just his nerves acting up? His gaze wandered until he saw another slave cleaning the floor down a hallway. She was putting her back into it and Naruto could tell she was trying hard to make the floor sparkle. Then Hanabi walked by and made a quick hand-sign. She just walked off giggling while the slave clutched her head and reeled in pain. Now he was sure. He had to leave, but where would he go? He couldn't just go home, according to law he was property, and if he ran he must be returned as if he were a runaway dog. Somebody would need someone to shelter him, but who?

He didn't know yet, but he kept sneaking through the clan's mansion, using ever bit of ninja-stealth he could muster to make it out of the Hyuuga home unnoticed. He made it out seemingly without a hitch. He couldn't stop to think about it too long, he had to decide on a destination before he was found out.

He could return to Ino or Anko, but then he'd still be a slave, though a slave without a curse seal was better off than a sealed one. Perhaps he should seek asylum elsewhere?
1251211122111111122111211212122211221112.title: He panics and seeks shelter to avoid this fate.

choices: He heads for Ino's flower shop
He goes looking for Anko
1251211122111111122111211212122211221112.content: He didn't know if it was out of loyalty, or just not knowing else to turn to, but he made up his mind, he would return to his former mistress.
1251211122111111122111211212122211221112.title: Naruto goes to the house of a former mistress

choices: It was Hinata looking for her runaway slave.
it was someone else.
1251211122111111122111211212122211221112.content:
Ino was humming to herself and watering the flowers in her shop when the door flew open wide and Naruto rushed in. She barely had time to process what was going on before the boy was on the floor kissing her feet with great rapidity. Between the kisses, he told his story of what had happened to him since Anko had stolen him.

"So why did you come here? From the sound of things, curse mark or not, you are officially Hinata's property. If I keep you here, I'm a thief."

"I know..." trembling as he answered, "... but I love you and your pretty feet. Anko treated me worse than dirt, and Hinata kept me as eye candy. I know that as a slave, I should have no expectation of appreciation, but... I just can't help it, I was so happy as your foot slave."

The blonde goddess looked down at those eyes full of tears and she had compassion. She knelt down and put his head in her lap. "There there, I don't care who the law says you belong to, you will always be my foot slave."

Naruto Brightened up. "Really?"

"Really. I thought you might come back so I've been saving something for you." She stood up and walked into a back room of the shop. Naruto sat patiently awaiting the return of his mistress. Finally she came back into the room holding a glass of some foul liquid. "Since the day I lost you, I've been saving this up. After every training session and after every mission, I've rung out my socks in this glass. That's quite a lot of foot sweat don't you think? I want you to drink it to prove to me that you are a loyal and obedient foot slave and that you will never leave your mistress again."

Naruto jumped up and took the glass. He gulped it down instantly. It wasn't until it was all down that he began to gag and choke. The stuff had been horrible, but he would do anything to prove his love for mistress Ino and her gorgeous feet.

As he was still gagging, Ino pushed him to the floor and shoved her foot in Naruto's mouth. This calmed him down considerably as he began to suck the dirt and grime off of Ino's sandal. He lay there like this for far too short a time before Ino removed her foot. "I've got some work to do around the shop. You can sit here and clean my sandals though." With that, Naruto undid the straps on her footwear and began to lick the bottoms diligently as Ino worked around the shop, stepping lightly with her bare feet. after a good half of an hour, the bottoms of the shoes were clean.

"Ino?"

"Yes Naruto?"

"I'm done cleaning your sandals. Should I clean your feet now? They must have gotten dirty walking around the shop."

Ino looked at the clock. "I guess it couldn't hurt to take a break." With that she sat down and motioned for Naruto to come. He began by cleaning the grime off with his tongue. Then he couldn't help but kiss them. Oh how he had missed these feet. Ino just smiled down at him. "You know what I'd really like after all this work on my feet? A massage."

"Off course!" He said cheerfully has he began on her right foot and then on her left.

"You know, if I had you help me out around the shop, I'd have more time take breaks like these."

"I would like that very much, mistress Ino-sama."

"So formal! Hinata certainly did teach you some manners. I like the improvement. But it's time for me to get back to work." She wriggled her toes and Naruto gently lowered her foot into the sandal. First the right then the left. No sooner had Naruto finished tying the last strap than the shop-door began to open. Ino began to walk towards the door thinking it might be a customer. Naruto quickly hid himself by using the transformation jutsu to turn into a flower-pot.

When the door finally opened..
1251211122111111122111211212122211221112.title: He heads for Ino's flower shop

Temari
1251211122111111122111211212122211221112.content: There was other girl and that was....
1251211122111111122111211212122211221112.title: it was someone else.

choices: Naruto maintains composure and stays a vase
Naruto loses control and changes back.
1251211122111111122111211212122211221112.content:
Ino gave a polite bow to her customer "Greetings Temari, might I interest you in some flowers? We have some very nice roses today.."

"No thank you, I just need a vase. Preferabbly a large one."

"Well, we have quite a selection of those as well..." Ino gave a nervous glance over to the naruto-vase

"Oh, I'll take this bright orange one with the fox pattern!"

Ino jumped "That one is not for sale.. its just for.... display!"

It was at this point that Ino's father walked in. "Ino, you know we don't have display items, any flower or vase you see is for sale." At that, he and Temari began haggling over the price of the naruto vase. Temari ended up getting a good deal because Mr. Yamanaka couldn't remember buying it in the first place. All the while, Ino muttered under her breath, begging Naruto to undo the transformation, but he was too afraid that if he showed himself here, word would spread to Hinata.

Soon, Temari was walking out of the shop holding Naruto. When she got back to the house she was renting, she put him on the floor next to her bed and began filling him with water. It became difficult for Naruto to breath, but he couldn't change back, not yet. He had to wait until Temari was asleep before he could sneak back to Ino.

And then, when Naruto was nearly full of water, she gently placed her feet in. First the left, then the right. As her feet soaked, Naruto tasted everything. There was a lot of sweat and grime on those feet. And when it came off, he couldn't just swallow it to get rid of the horrible taste, it just sank down to the bottom where he could still taste it. He wanted to gag so hard, but he had to maintain composure.

"Oh vase, I'm so glad I bought you. When I head back to the sand village tomorrow, you'll be so good at cleaning all that sand from between my toes.
1251211122111111122111211212122211221112.title: Temari

choices: How long does the protection last?
Someone recognizes and wants him. Who?
1251211122111111122111211212122211221112.content:
Temari looks over her shoulder at him as she moves over to a drawer, "Alright vase, lets get you all settled in." Naruto sighed mentally in relief. She'd have to empty him to move him, and once he was in another spot in the house, it'd be much easier to change back

To his confusion, she came back with a brush and a small bottle of some clear liquid. She dipped the brush into it, then started drawing symbols upon him. The brush tickled, but he was still able to maintain his composure. Despite not enjoying this, he couldn't change back with all this water inside him. At best he'd make a mess and be caught again. At worse, it'd still be inside him afterwards! He concentrated on maintaining his form as the brush teased him, Temari's face pinched in concentration.

After a few minutes of putting symbols all over him, she smiled happily. "There, that'll make sure you don't get chipped or broke accidentally somehow. Now lets get that water out of you" These were the most beautiful words Naruto had heard in forever. After the salty dirty mix was dumped out of him, she placed him back on the floor. She chuckled to herself "Now you stay right there and dry, i've got to go run a few more errands"

Naruto waited for a count of 30 after she'd left, then willed himself to change back. Unfortunately, nothing happened. "Why isn't this... Oh no, whatever she drew on me. It's to protect the vase. If I changed back, I would be me, and the vase would be gone. I can't change back!" He tried everything he could, but his initial change was just too good. He was a completely inanimate vase cursed with a human mind and senses.

After a while, he heard someone re-entering the house. Temari walked into the room, and refilled him with water. She laid down, and Naruto was once again pressed into service as a footbath, the gunk slowly diffusing through the water and coating his insides. "Sure is hot out today, but that's okay, as long as I've got my wonderful foot vase to come home and soak in. This is the best purchase ever"
