12512111221111111221112112121222112212.title: Tsunade arrives, getting the news.

choices: Naruto get's back up.
Naruto is defeated.
125121112211111112211121121212221122122.content:
It had all been worked out with Tsunade. Naruto was no longer on the active roster of ninja, and had been replaced on his team. He was now legally a servant of the Hyuuga household. Specifically, it had been noted, a servant of Hinata.

It was time for Hinata's training session, and it had been decided that she should spar with her new servant. Naruto followed behind Hinata silently, carrying all her gear. Hinata lead, a little nervous about the session, but noticeably less uncomfortable with Naruto's new attitude.

They reached the extravagent and spacious training ground, a large flat dirt plain in the sun, surrounded by white walls and spectator seats, currently empty.

Hinata faced Naruto, and with only a little timidity, got into a fighting stance. She looked at her 'crush' and declared,
"Alright Naruto, let's fight. Hold nothing back."

Naruto bowed to her. "Yes, Hinata-sama!" Of course, Naruto planned to hold much back.

To avoid spending the rest of his bleak looking life as Anko Mitarashi's sandals, he had to get Hinata Hyuuga, the meekest girl he knew, to humiliate him in public. First, he needed her to think of him as nothing more than a servant, not worthy of respect. He saw she thought less of him after kissing her and her father's feet, and after she became sure he was serious about being a servant, but she clearly still didn't think of him as inferior. So, Naruto thought, if she 'knew' that she could beat him in a fight, she would have no more reason to respect him at all.

This was what Naruto's life had come too. All because of Ino...

The fight began. In true Naruto fashion, he summoned a horde of shadow clones and rushed Hinata head on. Hinata activated her Byakugan and rushed forward as well. Hinata began to dispatch the clones with gentle fist taijutsu. She saw the real Naruto and went forward to fight him directly. To her suprise, she was able to get a clear strike to his stomach, knocking him back and dispelling the clones.

Naruto feigned a look of frustration and summoned more clones. They charged. The pattern repeated, this time with Hinata closing chakra points in Naruto's right arm and leg. Hinata was shocked. She believed he was trying, but she was simply beating him! But what won him battles was his determination, and Hinata still thought she would lose.

This time, Naruto charged up his Rasengan. Hinata gulped. Naruto charged once more. When he drew near Hinata, thinking quickly, grabbed the forearm of Naruto's hand and forced it upwards, and then quickly jabbed her fingers into his wrist, closing the chakra pathways to his hand and dispelling the Rasengan.

Naruto then banked on his original style, and simply began to swing his fists at Hinata. Hinata blocked all shots and closed chakra points all along his body. Naruto's movements became more sluggish. He fell at her feet.

Hinata backed up. Naruto staggered up. This, in Hinata's eyes, was the critical moment. She knew this was the point when he would heroically rise up to the challenge, and defeat her. So if she wanted to impress him with her skill, she had to show him it now, before she lost.

She raced forward, and furiously pummeled Naruto with her fingertips, closing all the pathways she could see. Naruto simply allowed to happen, gasping in pain while pretending to struggle. When her rampage was over, he remained standing, wobbling. Hinata put all the chakra she could into one palm strike to his jaw. He was knocked acccross the field and law there, motionless.

Hinata stared. She was waiting for him to get up.
125121112211111112211121121212221122122.title: Training

choices: Service at the spa
Hinata becomes suspicious.
1251211122111111122111211212122211221222.content:
Hinata was exhilirated, confused, happy and sad, all at once. She had won. Naruto was unconscious, her training as a med nin was good enough for her to know that.

She sat on the ground and looked at her beaten opponent. Clearly he had not used all his power. But that was because she hadn't let him! At first, she thought this meant it was a cheap win, but no. That was what being a ninja was all about, was it not? Beating your opponent first? Naruto may be stronger, but the fact that she was able to so easily disable him before he could use it........made her the better ninja.

She was a better ninja than Naruto.

Had she overestimated him, or underestimated herself? Who knew, perhaps both.

She remembered Naruto was still unconscious, and went to him. She reopened his chakra pathways, and Naruto regained consciousness.

Naruto sat up bleary eyed. "What happened?" He murmured. Of course, he knew very well.
Hinata answered "Naruto, I....knocked you unconscious."

Naruto had a look of shock on his face. Hinata stood up to get him bandages. She was stopped by Naruto falling at her feet pathetically, kissing them.

"Naruto!" She shouted, still embarrassed by the sight.
"Please Hinata-sama, forgive me for losing so easily! I promise I will put up a better fight next time!"

Hinata hurriedly said "Naruto, it's fine, you did well. You don't have to kiss my feet."

Naruto ceased, according to his master's wish.

Then they left for the spa, to wash up after the training. Naruto again carrying Hinata's gear, Hinata's mind swirling with her stunning victory.
1251211122111111122111211212122211221222.title: Naruto is defeated.

choices: 3 Women
1 Woman
1251211122111111122111211212122212.content:
"WHAT?!?!?!?" Naruto cried with horror. He was trying not to be sandals!" Anko laughed at his reaction. "What? Only for two days each! As long as you don't get caught, it's a breeze! What's worse? Sandals for under a week, or forever. She wiggled her toes at him "Or if you want, I could just make you my sandals now....

"NO! That's okay Anko, T-thank you for this chance." Naruto came to his senses, he must keep Anko happy.

Anko beamed. "Good."

She then gave him another option. "Kid, for you to pass, you can't be noticed by any of these women." Naruto nodded.

"So here's another option. You can only to one kunoichi's footwear, but for a week. This way, you have less chances of getting caught in the switch."

125121112211111112211121122.content:
(This story will focus on the young group of kunoichi, rather than just Ino.)

A quick look at this group of girls gives the impression of a close knit group of friendly kunoichi who share everything. But if someone would examine closely, they would see that isn't the case.

Four girls, Sakura, Ino, Temari, and Hanabi, were resting side by side on Sakura's couch, their feet resting on a coffee table, with cotton balls in between their toes. They were relaxing comfortably, and looked like pampered queens. However, two other girls in the room looked much less privileged.

Tenten, was kneeling at one side of the couch, carefully painting the nails on Sakura's left hand. Tenten looked resigned, and was focused 100 percent on what she was doing, afraid to mess up Sakura's manicure.
Even more strange, was the last girl. Hinata Hyuuga knelt on the other side of the coffee table, painting the toes of the girls, looking even more miserable than Tenten.

The girls had a strict social hierarchy that they accepted without question, though it was never talked about. The girls all talks like they were best friends, but it would always be Tenten and Hinata kneeling.
Sakura was at the top, with Ino in close second. Then came Temari and then Hanabi, but while they all did what Sakura said, it was never really bad for them.

Then came Tenten, who was viewed as one of the weakest, and was little more than a lapdog.
At the bottom was Hinata, who was basically a slave to the top four girls.

"Baka Hinata, you forgot my pinky toe!" Hanabi snapped, smirking at the same time. That was the most awful part for Hinata, Hanabi had been accepted into the group of girls, and Hinata had no escape from her cruel treatment.

"Gomen, Hanabi." Hinata murmured, and attended to her sister's little toe.

Temari examined her nails and smirked. "Good job, Tenten, it's good that you're useful at something."
Tenten murmured "Th-thank you, Temari." That was pretty terrible for Tenten, having the girl who beat you accepted into your group of "friends", and having them like her more than you.

What happens next?

125121112211111112211121221121121.content:
It wasn’t easy but Ino finally managed to get to speak to Shizune alone.
“Shizune I have something to show you.” Ino said.
Shizune looked curiously at Ino. “What is it?” she asked.
Ino brought her insoles to Shizune’s face smiling proudly.
Shizune gave her a confused look.
“They look awfully comfortable Ino but why are you showing them to me?”
Ino grinned. “Let’s just say there’s more to these insoles than meets the eye. By the way have you seen Naruto lately?”
Shizune shook her head. “I haven’t seen him all day…but he’s always getting himself into trouble. I’m sure he’ll turn up eventually”
Ino giggled. “What if I told you he was right in front of you?” She said smiling as she pointed to the insoles.
Shizune looked at the insoles suddenly realizing what Ino was getting at.
“No way!!!” She said gathering her chakra to scan the object in front of her. She opened her eyes in shock “Oh my god!!! It is Naruto!!!”
“Shhh!” Ino whispered. She looked around the party. Fortunately Shizune’s outburst didn’t attract any unnecessary attention. Everyone at the party was still having a good time.
“Why would you do that to him?!!!” Shizune said angrily “He’s your comrade.”
“I caught him trying to peek on me while I was trying to take a bath” Ino lied. “I thought he needed to be punished a little.”
“Oh!” Shizune said calming down. She definitely could understand where Ino was coming from. “I guess being Jiraya’s student has rubbed off some bad qualities on him.”
“I punished him quite a bit wearing him on the way over here” Ino confided in Shizune. “But I don’t think he’s learned his lesson yet. Do you think you can help me punish him?”

Shizune considered for a second. She loved Naruto like a little brother and couldn’t help feeling sorry for him but at the same time she felt responsible for the ninja and felt it was her job to discipline him.

What does she do?

1251211122111111122111212211211211122.content:
Ino pulled her sandal away from Shizune's face just as her eyes started to roll back into her head. Shizune reflexively sucked in a deep breath of fresh air, too worn out to put up more than a token resistance at this point.

"I think I might enjoy toying with you even more than I do Naruto. He walked right into his new role willingly, but you. Oh the fun I'm having!" Ino said with a laugh. She started to move her sandal back towards the helpless girl's face, breaking out in giggles as Shizune pathetically tries to move her head away.

"Please... please Ino... just let us go... we'll walk out of here and not say anything to anybody..." Shizune gasped out, some color slowly returning to her face
Ino started to move the sandal forward again, but thought about that, and decided to play with her mind a little. "Walk out of here and not say anything to anyone? Really? You'd still do that?"

Shizune thought for a moment maybe this nightmare was almost over "Yes... not a word..."

Ino looked as if she were thinking for a moment, then smiled even bigger, "Yes, I suppose you wouldn't say a word to anyone. After all, it will be hard to talk after I make you a matching insole for Naruto. My other foot is feeling a little neglected."

All of the color ran out of Shizune's face again upon hearing this. She looked as if she were trying to yell forth an argument, but the sheer horror of the prospect would not let her mind put it into words.

Ino forced a confused look onto her face, "What? Isn't that... well... You did say you wanted to walk out of here with him. I wonder if I my Jutsu could transform into other things. It's meant for inanimates, but... I guess it could do something like turn you into the sole of my foot. Then you'd be most definately walking out of here with him. In fact, you'd be walking out of here ON TOP of him."

Shizune's eyes started to roll back up in her head again, either unable to comprehend something like that, or just finally giving into the tortures she'd already been through. Ino shook her shoulder to keep her awake, struggling to force down the glee she's feeling at her little mind game, and also realizing she did rather like that idea. Why shouldn't both her feet be comforted? Another insole would be just the thing for her poor tired feet. And to have someone trapped AS her foot. She couldn't even imagine how that would feel, knowing that every flex of her arch or scrunch of her toes was toying with someone. She got a mental image of Shizune's terrified face spread across her sole, stuck like a tattoo while screaming to be let go (though granted for all she knew she would look just like what she was, the way Naruto looks just like an insole).

This power was definately addictive. Her brain quickly jumped from deciding if such a plan was a good idea, to deciding which of the two plans was the BETTER idea...

12512111221111111221112122112112111222.content:
Ino grins wickedly "Oh how could I forget, Naruto is both my insoles! Oh well, guess I can't make you into an insole"

Shizune actually blinked her eyes a few times, the good news breaking through the terrified haze in her mind. "You mean your going to let me go?" Hope started to appear on her face again.

"I don't think you'd make a very good insole anyways," Ino said, still grinning down at her. As soon as Shizune was all the way back concious, and struggling to get up again, she added "So of course I'll let you go... RIGHT INTO THE SOLES OF ME FEET!"

Shizune's eyes go wide with terror again, and before she can react, Ino flashes through a series of hand signs. She feels something flow into her chest, before she gets a momentary sensation of her body melting and blacks out.

-------------------------------------------------

Hours later, Shizune flutters her eyes open, thinking she'd just had the worst nightmare. As she looks across the floor, she can't believe she passed out on the ground "That must've been a heck of a party..." She tried to get up... and realized that something was odd. It was like there was a transparent wall inches in front of her. She tried to back away from it, but she felt another wall right behind her. A rancid aroma started to make itself apparent, overwhelming her senses. It was so thick she could taste it, and plugging her nose seemed to do nothing. She tried to look behind her, for an escape or at least to identify the smell, but her face felt like it was locked looking straight ahead, no matter how she tried to move her body. Moving side to side, she found more of the invisible walls at about the distance of her arm span on either side. She started panicking, pounding on the wall in front of her looking for a way out.

Suddenly, something slammed down in front of her. It looked like some kind of caricature of herself drawn on pinkish paper. She tried to lean in for a closer look, and saw the drawing lean towards her. She raised her hand and saw it's hand move as well. Suddenly the object moved farther away, and she saw it wasn't pink paper that it was drawn on, but a foot! Her body suddenly started moving oddly, almost rippling. She was tossed around randomly, but the walls wouldn't let her sit or fall down. She was stuck standing in this weird box staring at herself drawn on...

as realization dawned on her, She saw the room blur around her as she was swung around and found herself looking at Ino's beaming smile. "Oh you look so adorable down there! I think I'm the first person with an animated tattoo, I'll never give you up!" As she wiggled her toes again, Shizune realized that the rippling sensation was the wrinkles of her sole moving. She was nothing but ink on this crazy girl's foot! Panic set in and she began pounding on the invisible wall that she realized was probably the outermost skin of her foot.

"Oooooo, whenever you move my foot gets so toasty warm. You must be cold or something. Tell you what, I'll let you and Naruto get acquainted while I look for someone to be my other sole-mate," and with that, Shizune watched as her world spun again. When she could see straight again, she watched from her prison as she was thrust into the stinky sandal she knew was her likewise captured friend. As Shizune gained her first experience of sweat forcing out through her body, Ino walked outside to look for a new toy to complete her set.

"Hey- I need to get back to Tsunade, I punished him a bit but it's up to you if you want to continue" She gaze a little wave as Ino swivled round, "Thought it would be best to keep this secret, so I'll just drop it behind you-" Shizune smiled apologetically as she dropped the torn up insole down Ino's back.
"Thanks- I'll take it from here!" Ino nodded happily, barely feeling the insole hit her curled up foot as she slowly shuffled backwards.

Naruto mentally yelled out as Shizune vanished, his foot fetish clashing with the need to have his own life as Ino methodically pinned him between her rear and her feet. She smiled innocently at her friends as she continued talking.

It felt like forever until Ino moved, she slowly wiggled away from her tiny boytoy, her titanic ass hovering over him briefly before she spun around with excitement-
"New plan- can we turn into a rag?" Ino smirked, "I managed to convince a few girls to try this foot jacuzzi thing, I think I can get them to use you to dry off, or perhaps even clean their feet! Just imagine- the feet of a bunch of hard working ninja's. Flossed between each girls toes-" Ino smirked, slowly raising her foot up onto the couch "You know you want to- I can't do it unless you agree to it-"

Reason slowly faded for Naruto as he watched Ino's hovering foot, her toes clenched playfully as her confident smile pressured his foot fetish side-
'N-no- I'm a human-' Naruto chanted slightly as Ino made the hand motions, 'but-' Naruto paused, his mind not thinking clearly as Ino's foot stomped down.
1251211122111111122111212211211212112.title: Dropped off to Ino

choices: Ino has come to recover Naruto for some more fun
Ino’s mother has entered the room to collect laundry
Anko is taking Naruto to be her own personal foot cleaner
12512111221111111221112122112112121121.content:
As much as the logical part of his mind told him that nothing good could possible come of being turned into an insignificant piece of cloth designated for the cleaning of feet alone, Naruto’s fetish for all things foot related once again won out, and as soon as Ino stomped down he could already feel his body started to shift into the desired form. It came faster this time, his form flattening out further and stretching even as its texture changed. Though the little ninja felt every moment of it, from an outside perspective it was over in just a couple of seconds, leaving the triumphant kunoichi standing over a small grey cloth that looked barely large enough to accomplish its stated aims.

For her part Ino was delighted, reaching down to snatch up Naruto with a broad smile. “Perfect. I knew you had it in you. Now just wait, I’ll make sure you get thoroughly abus… used I mean.” Even if her little slave was capable of responding she wouldn’t have given him the chance, simply reaching around and stuffing him into her back pocket as she went to gather the others.

At this point Naruto’s body was flat enough that he couldn’t even really feel Ino’s movements as she walked, though he was vaguely aware of the sound of voices, muffled through the fabric, as the massive blonde enacted the next stage of her plan. The sounds of the party faded as his living transport entered a different room of the house, replaced with quiet murmurs from the handful of guests that had accompanied her. A moment later the pressure on his body skyrocketed as his host took a seat to slip off her shoes, carelessly compressing him beneath her ass.

High above, Ino paid little heed to the pressure she was exerting on Naruto, figuring that if it didn’t involve feet it didn’t count and wasn’t worth thinking about. Right now her attention was focused on determining how best to get the other girls to use her new little foot rag, figuring that just outright presenting it to them would seem weird. Sakura might take it if offered, and Hinata was probably too shy to turn the offer down, but Kurenai and Anko were here as well, and might ask questions.

Eventually Ino decided that the best course of action would be to simply start by using Naruto to clean her own feet, and then just kind of naturally offer to share him with the others. With that in mind, she raised herself enough to casually slip the flattened rag from her back pocket and drop it near her now uncovered feet, flexing her toes and allowing the stench of her feet to wash over him in anticipation. She smiled as she watched the other girls remove their shoes and socks as well, their own feet now resting close enough that Ino could smell them clearly.

From his floor-level perspective, Naruto found himself utterly surrounded by the smell of these ladies’ pungent feet. Ino’s were the closest and therefore dominated his senses with their usual strong scent, but even then he could still smell the others mixed in. On either side of him the pink and blue toenails of Sakura and Hinata shifted as their toes stretch in such a way as to direct the majority of their foot stench directly towards the stricken ninja, while the slightly further away feet of Kurenai and Anko sat upright, their powerful soles looming like a distant stinky threat.

A shift in movement from behind and a deep shadow was the only warning Naruto received before Ino’s feet fell upon him, the powerful walls of flesh flattening him painfully against the tiled floor as they started to shift back and forth across his body, rubbing the accumulated sweat and grime that had gathered beneath the soles deep into his absorbent form. Seconds later the weight shifted and he was snatched up by the blonde’s fingers, only to then be plunged between the toes as she moved to thoroughly clean between each digit with a teasing little smirk. Mounds of toejam were smeared across the defenceless boy, mixing with the ever increasing sweat and grime and ensuring that, by the time Ino had finally finished, he had well and truly been imprinted with her scent.

Feigning nonchalance, Ino scrubbed one last spot on her sole and then went to drop the rag back on the floor before turning to the others as if she had just had a sudden idea. “Oh, do you guys want to clean off as well? Might be better than getting muck into the Jacuzzi.” She said it casually, while inside crossing her fingers that the other girls would take the bait. Thankfully her plan paid off, and Sakura wasted no time grabbing her teammate, offering a small smile and a quiet thank you.

The next couple of minutes were practically a blur a feet and stench from Naruto’s perspective, being handed off to first Sakura, then Hinata, and then Kurenai in turn. All three girls took the time to thoroughly clean their feet before placing them in the Jacuzzi, ensuring that the stricken ninja got to experience every inch of their toes and soles alike. It was painful certainly, and humiliating as well, but Naruto couldn’t help but enjoy it thoroughly all the same, taking the time to note the individual eccentricities of each set of feet. Sakura’s were definitely the sweatiest of the three, producing a wet slopping sound as she dragged her unfortunate teammate across their length, whereas Hinata’s carried the strongest smell, the foul air between her toes in particular bombarding her tiny crush with stink as she clenched her toes nervously around the rag. Though Kurenai’s were almost pleasant in comparison, carrying a perfume-like scent, she was also the most thorough in her cleaning, her powerful fingers compressing Naruto harshly against her soles as she scrubbed him deep into every line and crevice her feet had to offer at least twice as often as strictly necessary.

But neither those three, nor Ino before them, could have prepared the living rag for what was coming next. As the other four girls placed their feet into the Jacuzzi, Anko stepped up to take her turn with the rag, having been relegated to last by unanimous vote when the other girls got a look at her feet. Whereas the other girls’ had been relatively clean, Anko’s feet were covered in an obvious layer of grime, appearing to have not been properly cleaned in some time, and as the blackened soles rose above their unfortunate target, Naruto could only brace himself and hope for the best.

Knowing that the others would complain if she entered the Jacuzzi with dirty feet, Anko took her time as she stomped down onto the rag Ino had left behind, dragging her feet back and forth to remove the outer layer of grime, before reaching down to snatch up the cloth for a more thorough cleaning. Naruto found himself hovering somewhere between heaven and hell, as he was intimately introduced to the sweatiest, smelliest, and overall foulest feet he had ever experienced. In no time at all, the formerly grey cloth had turned black as it soaked up the near endless amount of sweat and grime that coated Anko’s feet, the purple-haired woman starting to press harder as she enjoyed the sensation of the moist cloth running across her soles and between her toes.

By the time Anko finally judged her feet clean enough to enter the Jacuzzi, Naruto had been reduced to a blackened and stinky cloth, almost unrecognisable from the way he had started. It was, in a word, incredible, and at this point the tortured boy felt like he just might be in love with those feet.

Anko didn’t bother to put the soiled rag away as she stepped into the Jacuzzi, and for the moment at least Ino didn’t seem to have much interest in recovering him, so Naruto was left to stew in the accumulated juices of the girls as they chatted and enjoyed themselves. Minutes stretched into eternity as a miasma of foot stench filled his mind, before a deep shadow drew him from his reverie.
12512111221111111221112122112112121121.title: Naruto the Foot Rag

choices: Ino knows or discovers what happened, and comes to get Naruto back
Ino knows or discovers what happened, but leaves Naruto with Anko
Ino has no idea what happened to Naruto, he’s Anko’s now
125121112211111112211121221121121211213.content:
As Naruto waited to be recovered, the lingering scent of the other girls’ less virulent feet began to fade, overwhelmed by the much stronger odour of Anko’s pungent soles. At this point he felt like he was slowly marinating in the scent in her feet, covered with her sweat and grime and surrounded on all sides with a thick and persistent cloud of stench. By now all of his mental barriers had been broken down, allowing his fetish to come out in full effect, and just enjoy this heavenly experience.

While Naruto daydreamed about his new goddess, Anko was having thoughts of her own, allowing her eyes to drift back to the lifeless piece of fabric lying near the door. She had been surprised that after such a relatively short period her feet had been actually cleaned, enough so that they weren’t even muddying up the Jacuzzi water as she had expected they would. Usually when she did bother to clean her feet, or pay someone else to do it, it would take hours to get them like this, and the older kunoichi couldn’t help but wonder where Ino had gotten such an excellent cleaning cloth.

Anko figured her life would be a lot easier if she had something like that for herself, and after a brief moment of guilt and indecision, decided that she just had to have it. Feigning a need to be elsewhere she politely excused herself and stepped out of the Jacuzzi, casually snatching up Naruto’s discarded form and using him to dry her feet, scrubbing every inch as she watched the other girls return to their previous conversation, paying no heed to the departing kunoichi.

With a triumphant smirk, Anko grabbed her footwear and quickly dropped her prize into her right boot before inserting her socked foot after it, smiling at the feeling of the still wet cloth being compressed beneath her heavy footfall. Thinking quickly she ducked into the nearby laundry and grabbed a somewhat similar cloth from the dirty laundry pile and dropped it near the doorway to the Jacuzzi room, hoping it would be mistaken for the stolen cloth before jogging out the door.

For Naruto, the whole series of events had happened faster than he could follow. The still pungent feet of his goddess had returned, albeit regretfully cleaner than they had been before, and he had once again gotten the chance to serve her as she dried herself off. Then in the next moment he found himself in a dark and sweaty place, surrounded by a fresh wave of foot stench before a heavy weight fell upon him, amplifying the smell even as it is crushed him down into the spongy ground beneath him. For a moment the weight lifted, only to be replaced with rhythmic impacts as it began to rise and fall upon him at a relentless pace. Sweat was being squeezed out from the fabric below, even as it flowed afresh from the fabric above, and the smell of feet, of a very particular set of feet, only became stronger as time passed. Such was his disorientation that it took longer than it should have for Naruto to realise his fate, but when he did he couldn’t help but jump for joy internally. He was in a shoe, better yet he was in Anko’s shoe, which meant that his goddess was taking him home.

High above, the oblivious kunoichi had no idea that the rag being crushed into oblivion beneath her right sole was in fact a fellow ninja, and may not have cared even if she did know. Right now, as she leapt across rooftops with a view to returning to her apartment as quickly as possible, all she cared about was that she had succeeded in taking that delightful little rag for her own. Already she could feel the fresh waves of sweat pouring from her perpetually rank feet, and she knew that the confines of her socks and boots alone were foul enough to ensure that she’d have a fresh layer of grime to clean off by the time she got home. But none of that mattered anymore, because now she had what was quite possibly the world’s greatest foot rag to soak up all of that for her. All of that and more.

But as Anko finally reaches her apartment, what fate awaits the captured Naruto?

choices: Ameyuri mercilessly dominates Naruto and claims him as her prize
Naruto does something surprising and pulls off a m
1251211122111111122111212211211212222222.content:
Looking around for a good way to torment the transformed Naruto among the party guests, Shizune's eyes finally landed on someone promising.

She was apparently androgynous, because after being called a man, she was shaking a matching pair of swords, each with slim and straight double-edged blades that also had an upward-curved bladed prong near the tip of one side of the blade and another one near the base of the blade's other side in the face of the one who did, electricity crackling around the weapons.

The person was a relatively short young woman. She had long, red hair, black eyes, and together with a Kiri forehead protector, she also wore a simple cloth around her head, distinctively tied at both sides so as the ends of the material protrude upwards, while the remainder of hair was allowed to flow downwards. She wore a loose, pin-striped long-sleeved shirt with a dark obi around the waist, black pants which got much looser near the ends, resembling hakama, and striped leg-warmers. She wore bandages loosely tied around the neck and had jagged, sharp, triangular teeth like a shark's.

Shizune grinned, serving as this kunoichi's insoles would teach Naruto a lesson, she just knew it. Even if she DID doubt Ino's story about Naruto, one never could be too careful with Jiraiya involved.

Time to make introductions. Shizune went up to the Kiri kunoichi. "Hello." she said, going for being friendly.

The young woman turned to her. "Yeah?" she asked.

"Hello, I'm Shizune. Aid of the Hokage." Shizune introduced.

"Ameyuri Ringo." the redhead said.

"Well Ameyuri..Sorry for bothering you, but I thought you might get some use out of these." the medic said, presenting the pair of insoles that were actually Naruto.

"Uh-huh...?" Ameyuri said skeptically, "and you're giving me these...why?"

Shizune shrugged, "Long way back to Kiri, and you seem to be the type with a LOT of consecutive solo deployments, anyway. Figure you'd at least welcome the support."

"Can't deny that." Ameyuri said, then fast as a viper she snatched the insoles from her. "Thanks, Shizune."

Shizune smiled. "No need."

Naruto mentally whimpered as as Ameyuri slowly brought her insoles toward her sandals and began to put him inside. He felt both halves of his body slide into place. Once inside he waited in terror for the inevitable. It happened pretty fast. First Ameyuri’s toes entered inside her right sandal followed by the ball of her foot, her sole, and her heel. Naruto wanted to scream as her soft foot pressed again him. After that, she put on her left sandal; he really did not want this at all. His desire to escape reached new levels as the kunoichi’s second foot began to rest on him.

As with Ino’s and Shizune's feet, Naruto’s senses experienced every aspect of Ameyuri Ringo's feet as he functioned as an insole for the young woman. Ameyuri’s feet smelled so terrible that Naruto was for once glad he didn't have a mouth as he had no doubt he would be puking his guts out. Of course the smell paled in comparison to the taste of Ameyuri’s feet. Even before her feet managed to touch him, Naruto had already felt a couple of drops of sweat land against him causing him to experience the salty taste. This woman’s feet were sweaty beyond belief and once her soles touched against him, it felt like he was forced to drink a gallon of footsweat, what made it all worse was

"Well, gotta get home, like you said, Shizune: long way back to Kiri. See you around." Ameyuri said, shaking her hand before leaving.

****

Days later, once she made the week-long trip back to Kiri, Ameyuri grinned as she shut and locked her door.

Kicking her sandals off, she picked up Naruto and leered at him suspiciously, "Figured I'd at least welcome the support...yeah right. True as that is, did she really think that I wouldn't notice a chakra signature coming off you? I'm the best tracker in Kiri! Now, let's see just who you really are!"

With that, she tossed the insoles down and started making hand signs.

When Ameyuri finished, Naruto let out a silent howl as he felt his body heat up and in a sudden flash of light, he was suddenly human again...but only two inches tall!

Seeing her suspicions confirmed, Ameyuri brought her bare foot down on Naruto, trapping his head between her big and second toes. Giving it a painful squeeze, she lifted him to his feet by his neck, taking time to watch as he dangled by his head from her foot.

"Well...looks like I caught myself a spy." she said, bringing the point of one of her swords, tip now as big as his torso, up to his chest, crackling with voltage, stopping it just short of touching him.

"Not...spy...! Please...air!" he gasped out.

"Forgive me if I don't believe you. The Hokage's aid gave you to me when you were transformed into a pair of insoles, and Kiri has closed borders and no diplomatic ties to any of the other shinobi villages, so tell me what I'm supposed to believe about what this looks like." Ameyuri said.

"...Explain...!" He gasped.

Forced to grab at her toes so he could still breath, Naruto tried to free himself from their iron grip on his head. It wasn't long before his face was turning purple and he began to feel lightheaded. He was on the verge of passing out when Ameyuri released her grip on him. He fell to the floor and gasped for air, only to inhale large amounts of foot odor, and looked up to see Ameyuri's feet before him, and one of them was tapping.

"Talk, short-stuff." she ordered to the blond.

Sitting up, Naruto sighed and explained his story, leaving out his secret foot fetish, and instead that he was set up as a scapegoat, pinning Ino doing all that to him on Jiraiya duping her, leading up to right now.

Ameyuri's lips pursed and her eyes blazed with sheer outrage at the mention of the infamously unrepentant lecher that ran around proclaiming himself a sage and one of the legendary Sannin. Pinning the blame on someone else to weasel out of his just punishment for his repugnant attitude towards all things feminine was JUST the sort of thing the half-century-old pervert would do!

"Ok. That makes sense," the redhead admitted, then looked down at him thoughtfully before an idea struck her and she grinned, "I'll give you a chance to earn going back to Konoha. Trial by combat. You against me. First to either knock the other unconscious or force the other to submit wins. And since there's a size difference, I'll give you a handicap: You can use whatever techniques, weapons and tactics you want, and as for me, I only use my bare feet--no weapons, no jutsu. Just my bare feet against little you."

"What's the catch?" Naruto said wearily.

"The catch is if you loose, I get to keep you forever as a plaything to my feet!"

Naruto paled, yet forced it down. "Fine by me! But you sure about the handicap? Wouldn't mind going full-force straight out the gate!"

"Ooooh...gutsy! I LIKE that!" Ameyuri sighed dreamily, hands on her cheeks as she looked down at him, a shark-like smile on her face.

As hard to believe as it was, Ameyuri actually had a playful attitude, though it was admittedly sadistic. She liked toying with her opponents and showing joy in it, yet she was known to develop a liking for those that could stand their ground against her and prove a challenge, she referred to such opponents as meals. Despite her vicious nature in battle, she respected those whose fighting skills and courage met her liking. Unfortunately, her personality scared off most guys, so she was still single.

However, this little Konoha ninja was proving to be JUST her type! He wasn't a "meal"...he was a "feast"!

"You're mine!" she announced. "I even know just what I'm gonna do with you first once I own you. Will need some freshly-washed white socks for it though."

"Why's that?" Naruto asked, feeling he was going to regret asking.

The redhead smirked, hands on her hips "I'm thinking...wedding!" she cackled.

"Wha...Wedding?!" Naruto sputtered, shocked.

"Yep. Yours, little guy...and BOTH my feet are gonna be your brides! You know what they say: Here comes the bride, all dressed in white!" Ameyuri cackled in delight, wiggling her toes in anticipation.

Naruto gulped. Just his luck! At least he was getting a fair(?) chance to get help. All he had to do was beat a battle-crazed giantess who was part of the most brutal generation of the Seven Swordsmen of the Mist to ever come out of Kirigakure and wanted him as her property.

Naruto sighed, then sucked it all up and glared at Ameyuri determinedly. Well...either way, it was too late to back out now, all he could do was give this everything he had.

125121112211111112211121221121122.content:
Shizune was just about to stop the Tsunade from getting another glass of sake when Ino approached her asking her if she had a second.
Shizune frowned. “You are gonna have to make it quick Ino, my master has been eyeing that sake bottle for a while and if she drinks anymore we’re going to have a serious problem on our hands.”
Ino was very tactful. She definitely didn’t want to arouse any suspicions “It’s just that I’m worried about someone at the party.” She said
“Really…Who?” Shizune asked.
“Well you actually,” Ino told her.
“Me?!!!” Shizune said surprised. “Why?”
“Well you’re always running about stressing about your teacher that you don’t take time to relax yourself.” Ino said. “This is a party and you should be having fun but instead you’re still running around worried all the time.”
“But my master…” Shizune protested.
“Is fine…see Sakura and Hinata are already easing her away from the bottle.” Ino said pointing to the two kunoichis as they were moving in on the Hokage. “Now no more excuses…I want you to take a seat and relax.”
Shizune reluctantly agreed. She followed Ino to the chairs on the side and took a seat.
“Is this good?” Shizune asked.
“It’s better.” Ino said “But you still seem very tense…why don’t you take off your shoes and relax a bit. In fact don’t move, just sit back and relax while I take them off for you.”
Shizune shrugged figuring the faster she appeased Ino’s misguided attempt to get her to relax, the sooner she could get back to helping out her master. She leaned back and stretched out her feet. Ino bent down and helped Tsunade’s overworked apprentice remove her shoes. Instantly the strong vinegar smell of Shizune’s feet filled the air.
“Wow!!! Looks like you’ve been wearing your sandals a long time, your feet are rather ripe.” Ino laughed winking at her insoles.
Shizune blushed “Sorry about that I’ve been running errands for Tsunade all day.” She said greatly embarrassed.
“It’s fine” Ino said. “But I’ll tell you one thing. I glad I’m not your insoles.”
Ino flashed Naruto a mischievous smile.
Shizune thought the comment a little odd but she let it slide.
“It might be easier to relax if you close your eyes” Ino told her.
Shizune followed her suggestion shutting her eyes. Quickly Ino slipped her custom into Shizune’s sandals grinning evilly at him. Having successfully slipped him in, all Ino had to do now was wait
After 5 minutes, Shizune opened her eyes.

12512111221111111221112122112122212.content:
As Ino was trying to decide, it seems that Fate made the choice for her. Ino watched as the two Inuzuka women put on their shoes and prepared to leave the party, waving goodbye too Shikamaru's mother as they went. After they were gone, Mrs. Nara went off to dance with a few of her friends in her nylons, leaving her expensive heels completely unguarded.

Ino giggled as she stalked over too the table with Mrs. Nara's shoes. "You know Naruto, I've always admired Mrs Yoshino Nara more than any other woman" Ino brought Naruto up to eye level as she spoke. "She is tough, domineering, and has a short leash on all the men in her life. It's what I aspire to be when I become a wife and mother. Except, of course, I'll be rich."

Ino realized that the song was coming to an end and she would need to act fast. "Alright Naruto, I think that some time soaking in Mrs. Nara's foot sweat will do you some good.

At this point, Naruto had resigned to his fate. Perhaps Neji was right, If only a little ways off. His destiny wasn't to be a loser, it was too be a foot slave. Naruto does have a foot fetish, but he does not want too be under feet forever, just once in a while. e

With a laugh at Naruto's expense, Ino dropped Naruto into the high-heeled shoe, making sure that Yoshino would not feel him there. She then walked away whistling, noticing that Yoshino was returning to the table.

Mrs. Nara sat down at her seat at the table. "Hmm... I wonder what Ino was doing over here." Yoshino thought aloud. "Ah well, I don't think it's important".

Naruto watched as her foot loomed above the entrance of the heel with terror. The second Naruto had been put into this stranger's shoe he had come to a shocking revelation: These shoes were at least ten times as stinky as Ino's feet. Naruto did not think that there was a foot that stunk enough too overpower his fetish but it seems he has found it. The overwhelmingly musty stench was inescapable, and Naruto felt ready to pass out as Yoshino stuck her feet into her high heels.

In his last moment of consiousness, Naruto realized that he was experiencing the most horrid feet in the world. He mused that Shikamaru's Mom could probably beat anybody in a fight, just by taking off her shoes.

Yoshino Nara stood up in her well-worn heels. "well.." she pondered aloud. "I think I'm all partied out. Where should I go now?"

125121112211111112211121221121222212.content:
Making up her mind, Ino went for the ANBU Black Ops. member. The woman was an elite that took S-rank or higher missions all the time, after all. So who better than that for Naruto to suffer under after being turned into a pair of insoles?

She was a young woman with straight, purple hair reaching down to her waist. As an ANBU member, she was dressed in a porcelain mask, hers resembling a cat with three red stripes — one vertical stripe on the forehead and two horizontal stripes, one on each cheek, which hid her face from view. She also wore the standard ANBU uniform, consisting of black and grey armor, metal arm guards and a katana strapped to her back. She had the signature ANBU tattoo on her right shoulder.

The cat-masked ANBU had gotten quite a few drinks...if one didn't know any better, they'd say Yūgao was trying to out-boozehound Tsunade. Good thing she was so hammered or Ino could have counted on loosing the flesh from her bones as she slipped both Naruto and the fortified shadow clone of him into the woman's sandals.

Yūgao Uzuki sighed. Miserable. She cold only just barely see strait with as much alcohol as she currently had in her system, and still she couldn't get her dead lover, Hayate Gekko, out of her mind. Yugao was a very lonely person after Hayate died by the hands of the Sand ninja. Once a graceful and caring woman, now a silent killer. Many people close to her could see her crumble without even showing it to the people of Konaha. It was known that Yūgao and Hayate were well on their way to go as far as marriage. She visited his grave daily, always on "what ifs", she was slowly dying, shattering more and more day by day due to her sorrow.

Even training and missions, the pain was there, like a twisting knot in the back of her mind. Couldn't be helped really, since Hayate and she had learned swordplay together and it brought up those memories.

In fact, these days, the only time she could put the hurt behind her fully was when Naruto Uzumaki was involved in what she was doing.

Naruto was a sweetie. While he wasn't good at VOICING things like comforting others, his actions were proof he cared. Whenever he found her at Hayate's grave, he always broke down and wept for her in her place so that she didn't have to, as if siphoning her grief off into himself. Then there were the pranks...he'd always prank her when she was brooding over Hayate's murder and she'd chase him. He put her through heck trying to outlast the little inhumanly stamina manic along with avoiding any booby-traps he'd set up, he was slick, sly, cunning, and damn near never out of energy...it kept her too busy to mourn.

Some days, Yūgao just wanted to lock him up and keep the little blot of orange all to herself for the rest of eternity, he was such a sweetheart like that. She wasn't a pedophilia, but she'd be lying if she said he hadn't become important to her, she was ungrateful to him for being there for her, or that Yūgao didn't like the idea of having Naruto as her own after all he'd done for her to try helping her in his own way.

Yūgao, even drunk to nearly passing out, noticed the Yamanaka girl slip a pair of insoles into the ANBU woman's sandals, but didn't mind it. After all, they were just insoles, right? Deciding she'd spent enough time here, she slipped her sandals on.

Naruto, lacking the capability of speech with him being a set of insoles now, let out a silent scream as the purple-haired woman donned her footwear. The toes alone had enough of her body moisture to where he felt like he was going to swell up like a balloon or something from being made to absorb it as her toes rested on top of him and slid forward into place, followed by the ball of her foot, then her sole, and finally her heel. How her warm skin was so peach-soft, or how and why her feet were utterly void of odor, the transformed ninja had no idea whatsoever. But to be honest, he didn't really care since it made being Yūgao's insoles just slightly more tolerable...but not by much.

All he could do now was hope that she took her sandals off soon.

Naruto had a feeling he knew which pair of ninjas Ino was talking about. There were only two ninjas left but he didn't think that Ino would dare chose either of them. His worst fears were confirmed when Ino turned him to face the ninjas from the sound village.

Ino takes off her sandals to show how smooth and clean her feet are. Something that she should really be thanking Naruto for.
Both girls are impressed at what good condition Ino's feet are in. They look at her enviously. Ino shows her insoles to them
"They do look comfortable" Kin said jealously.
"I wish I had a pair" Tayuya complained.
"Well actually you can take mine" Ino told them. "It's too bad I only have one pair so I'm gonna have to pick between you two."
Both sound ninjas looked up hopefully, they each desperately wanted the extra support for their feet.

Who does Ino chose?

125121112211111112211121222.content:
As much as Ino wanted to put on Naruto right away, She thought it would be more fun for her if Naruto experienced her feet at their worst. Plus there would be the added bonus of the mental torture Naruto would go through waiting for the ax to fall. Ino began jogging barefoot around the gym. Naruto had no choice but to continue waiting for Ino's feet to enter her sandals which was a cruel torture in itself. After 30 minutes, Ino had achieved the results she wanted. Her feet were now very dirty and sweaty. She looked at Naruto’s sandal prison. “I hope you appreciate all the extra effort I go through for you” She told him. "Enjoy tasting my sweaty feet!"
She lifted up her left sandal and slowly began to put it on her foot.
Naruto felt his environment shake as Ino’s sandal was lifted off the ground. He watched with anticipation as Ino’s giant toes entered the boot. He watched them slowly move forward and tasted them as they brushed against him. He realized that when Ino had changed him, the top of his body had become like a giant tongue and he could taste everything that touched him.As Ino’s sole slid forward, Naruto felt and tasted the ball of her foot. Ino’s effort in getting her feet dirty and sweaty had paid off, Naruto had to endure the salty taste as her dirty sweat dropped off her feet.
If Ino intended to put her sandals on by pulling it on her foot, it would take a while for her foot to shift into place. However, Ino used her normal method of getting her sandals on the rest of the way. She stomped her foot.
For Naruto that sudden movement was quite an experience. He felt a brief wave of nausea as the sandal moved rapidly downward and a sudden amount of pain as Ino’s heel banged against him hard. The pressure had suddenly increased as Ino’s foot was now pressing hard against him marking him as her property.
Ino next put on her right sandal. Naruto experienced many of the sensations he felt before only this time he had to endure Ino standing on half his body. He once again felt anticipation as he saw the toes of Ino’s right foot enter her sandal, the pain of Ino’s heel smashing against him as she stomped, and the pressure of being a cushion for Ino’s feet as she stood on him.
“Wow I have to admit you make a comfortable pair of insoles Naruto. I might have to keep you like this for a long time” Ino teased. Slowly she began to walk around.
Naruto felt the pressure of one foot lift off him only to come down and smash half his body a second later. Then he felt her other foot repeat the process. He was in constant pain as each of Ino's feet took turns smashing against him. Naruto realized too late that Ino was right, becoming both insoles made it more difficult for him. If he had chosen to be a single insole, he would at least be given a short reprieve whenever Ino lifted the foot he was under. Now that he was both insoles he was constantly suffering under his owner’s feet. At worst he felt both feet press against him as she stood on him and even at best he felt half his body crushed under her.
Ino smiled as she realized how much her casual motions were torturing Naruto.
"I think I'm going to go on a nice long walk." She announced laughing.

Where does she go?
125121112211111112211121222.title: Sweaty Initiation

choices: Naruto suffers as he is forced to watch Ino enjoy a yummy meal.
1251211122111111122111212222.content:
For an hour, Ino walked around the village breaking in her new insoles. Gradually, Naruto become used to the pattern of Ino’s feet as she moved around. He could feel the changes in the pressure of the foot that was pressing into him and knew when Ino was about to lift her foot or bring it down. This gave him a little bit of time to brace half his body in preparation of supporting Ino’s foot. Already used to splitting his mind in multiple directions from his signature technique, he was able to relax half his body as Ino lifted one of her feet and mentally prepare the other half of his body to support the weight of her other foot at the same time. The hardest part for Naruto was when Ino had both her feet on the ground pressing against him but he managed to withstand it by concentrating on how beautiful her feet were. Naruto was amazed as he realized just how much power Ino's feet had over him in this form. Now even the way he thought was regulated by the casual movements of her feet.

Being Ino’s insoles was a double edged kunai for Naruto. On the one hand he loved being pressed up against Ino’s feet and he liked the idea of providing comfort for her soles. On the other hand, he wasn’t too crazy about feeling his body squish under her as her foot smashed against him and it was tough not being able to communicate his feelings to Ino.
Naruto noticed that the more Ino walked around, the hotter her foot became. The sandals he was inside of had started off relatively cool…but Ino’s feet had now warmed it to over 100 degrees. The hotter Ino’s feet got, the more her feet began to sweat and drip onto Naruto. Functioning the way good insoles would, Naruto (without any choice in the matter) absorbed her sweat into himself tasting the salty taste of her feet in the process. It wasn't long before Naruto was soaked in foot sweat.

After walking around a little bit more, Ino was sure she had given Naruto a sense of what being her insoles were like. She could feel how sweaty her feet had become and was sure she had filled up Naruto with enough of her footsweat to last a lifetime. She also noticed how much her insoles had softened since she began walking and decided she had done a good job of breaking her new insoles in.

Pounding her feet into her insoles as she walked was fun, but Ino wondered if there were other ways she could torment the inanimate objects under her feet. She tried to think of activities Naruto enjoyed but wouldn't be able to do while he was acting as her insoles. Suddenly she thought of something really evil. Everybody in Konoha knew about Naruto’s love for ramen and Ino knew about his favorite restaurant. She thought about how devastating it would be for him if she were to eat a bowl of his favorite food in front of him without offering any to him. Ino realized this was the perfect way to rub in the fact that he was now just a pair of insoles.She grinned as she brought her plan into motion.

“Gee breaking in my insoles sure works up an appetite.” Ino announced aloud for Naruto’s benefit. “I wonder where should I go to get a bite to eat?”

Ino’s talk about food made Naruto think about how hungry he was. He hadn’t eaten since that morning and had been burning a lot of energy.

“Hmm…maybe I should try the Ichiraku? The ramen there is out of this world.” Ino continued giggling. “I’m so hungry I might even order 5 bowls for myself”

Normally Naruto would have been thrilled at the suggestion of going to his favorite noodle shop but it didn’t take a genius like Shikamaru to figure out what Ino had planned for him. The thought of being excluded from a ramen meal was enough to make him cry. He wanted to scream at Ino that this was too much torture even for him but of course he couldn’t speak.

Ino smiled as she reached the restaurant. This was going to be fun.
1251211122111111122111212222.title: Ino breaks in her insoles.

12512111221111111221112122221.content:
As Ino entered the restaurant, Naruto heard two voices that he recognized well. Old man Ichiraku (the restaurant owner) was talking with his daughter (one of the waitresses in the shop). Naruto felt cold inside as he realized Ino really was going through with this. He admired how devious Ino was at torturing him but he knew he wasn't going to enjoy this torture at all.

Ino definitely didn’t visit the Ichiraku ramen shop as often as Naruto but she went there often enough that the owner knew who she was.
“Hi Ino, Chouji’s not with you today I see?” the owner said.
Chouji was usually the reason why she came there so much. He knew all the best food spots in Konoha and was always dragging his teammates with him to get food. Actually Ino was glad that her teamate was not with her today. It meant she might actually get to eat something.

1251211122121222211.content:
As she entered her house, Kurenai casually tossed Naruto on the ground. Naruto grunted as he hit the floor but Kurenai didn’t notice. She was too busy looking over her team’s mission assignment for the next day. Naruto watched as his sensei kicked off her sandals and walked around the house putting her ninja equipment away. After that Kurenai leaned back, stretched out her legs and relaxed on the couch. During that time, she didn’t pay any attention to Naruto at all. The young ninja knew that he couldn’t really blame Kurenai for ignoring him (After all she thought he was just a punching bag), but he couldn’t help feeling abandoned his sensei. He definitely didn’t want to take any more of her kicks but he was bored being left alone. To pass the time Naruto stared at Kurenai’s sexy soles as she leaned back. He noticed her toes wiggle a couple of times and figured she must be happy to be out of her sandals. Naruto didn’t find the teacher’s feet as pretty as Ino were but they still looked pretty nice.

As it turned out…he didn’t have to wait long for Kurenai to notice him again. The Jounin teacher was pretty eager to see how her new punching bag would hold up to her workout routine. After an hour of resting up, Kurenai picked Naruto up and carried him to a dojo in the back of her house. Once inside, she dropped the punching bag Naruto was tied to on the floor again.

Kurenai giggled as she noticed that what was left of her old punching bag hanging in the center of the room. “Oops looks like I have to dispose of my old one first!”

Naruto was horrified by what he saw. The old punching bag had been pounded to shreds. There was barely any stuffing left inside and it remains looked more like swiss cheese than an actual punching bag. Kurenai’s feet were really destructive.

“Hard to believe that this bag was brand new a couple of days ago,” Kurenai wondered aloud.

Sensei did that in a few days!!!!!!!! Naruto thought. I’m in serious trouble!!!

Kurenai stroked her new kickbag lightly.
“I’m afraid you don’t have a long future ahead of you!!” She joked. She liked pretending her new punching bag was an actual person. “Let me just clear your predecessor away and than I’ll set you up for an extra long practice session.”

Kurenai picked up the what was left of the old punching bag and carried it away.

Oh hell no!!! Naruto thought. I really need to get out of here now!!
The poor ninja began to struggle against his chains with all his might but they wouldn’t give at all. Ino apparently had chosen chains that were strong enough to hold him. No matter how much he struggled, he couldn’t escape.

It wasn’t long before Kurenai returned ready for an extra long workout session. She picked her new kickbag up and attached it to a hook dangling from the ceiling. Then she assumed a fighting stance.

“You know…when Ino was there you only got a small taste of what being my kickbag would be like,” Kurenai said. “I only spent a couple of minutes demonstrating my moves on you! Normally I spend two hours practicing my kicks.”

Two hours!!!! Naruto thought. If she does that on me, even with the demon fox's healing ability, I’ll be dead for sure.

Naruto basically had two choices now. He could reveal himself to Kurenai and try to explain how he got chained to a punching bag, or he could try to withstand a two hour workout session as Kurenai’s kickbag.

What does he decide to do?

12512111221212222111.content:
Kurenai lined up to start her workout, when Naruto gives in, and exclaims "No wait! Stop!"

She looked around in confusion, "Who is that? Come back in a couple hours, I'm busy" She swung through with a quick warm up kick, and jumped back when she heard the kickbag yelp in pain. She moved up to it and ran her hand over it, inspecting "What the heck?..."

Naruto watched her hands move over the solid illusion hiding his body "No really, it's me, Naruto! Ino and I were just messing around, and you walked in, and we didn't want you to know, so I stayed quiet, but I can't go through your workout! It'd kill me"

Kurenai kept inspecting "Seems a pretty stupid game to play, but i'll give you credit. You make an excellent kickbag. Heck, if you were real, you'd probably last me for a few weeks, maybe even months!" her eyes unfocused a bit as she kept inspecting him "yeah, at least one month, maybe two..."

Naruto decided to take a comment in jest, "Haha, well, yeah. I try to be the best, even if it's the best kickbag, but this is a tad much. If you could just take me down, I'll drop the illusion and you can find another one to kick the stuffing out of"

With a wicked curl of her lip, Kurenai shook her head "No can do. I'm already late starting my work out. I don't have time to go hunting for another bag. But you do have one good point..." she started flashing through hand signs. Naruto started sputtering questions and struggling against the chains, but found his voice getting quieter, and his struggles weaker, until he was completely silent and motionless. He watched her reach out and gives him a squeeze. He felt his body give slightly under her grip, and could taste the sweat on her palm. She gave him a few playful slaps, and he realized he feeled much, well, more dense than usual. With a proud nod, she grinned at him "You do make the best kickbag, but all those organs and bones would get in the way. You work much better as an inanimate object."

He tried to yell a protest, but he could no longer talk. She gave a strong side kick, and kept her sole pressed against him. She moved her foot around a bit on him. It almost felt like she was making another jutsu sign. he also noticed he could taste her foot no matter where it was pressed against him, and figured his senses, minus his sight, were spread all the way across his surface. Finally she nodded again, "There, and that's the finishing touch. I apply that to all my workout equipment. It makes them last ten times longer. For a normal kickbag, that's two or three days. For you, well..." She leaned in, grinning devilishly, "Lets just say you might have been assigned a much more long term mission"

She stepped back and stretched, and Naruto could only watch in silent horror as her firm, strong, sweat foot swung right at his face.
